atk-s0511a:32_0: Tattha “buddhavaṃsasaṃvaṇṇanā hessati sārabhūtā”ti vuttattā buddhavaṃso tāva vavatthapetabbo.
atk-s0511a:32_2: ito heṭṭhā kappasatasahassādhikesu catūsu asaṅkhyeyyesu uppannānaṃ pañcavīsatiyā buddhānaṃ uppannakappādiparicchedavasena

atk-s0511a:42_0: Tattha kenāyaṃ desitoti ayaṃ buddhavaṃso kena desito?
atk-s0511a:42_1: Sabbadhammesu appaṭihatañāṇacārena dasabalena catuvesārajjavisāradena dhammarājena dhammassāminā tathāgatena sabbaññunā sammāsambuddhena desito.
atk-s0511a:43_1: Kapilavatthumahānagare nigrodhārāmamahāvihāre paramarucirasandassane devamanussanayananipātabhūte ratanacaṅkame caṅkamantena desito.
atk-s0511a:44_0: Kassatthāya ca desitoti? Dvāsītiyā ñātisahassānaṃ anekakoṭīnañca devamanussānaṃ atthāya desito.
atk-s0511a:46_0: Kadā desitoti bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a:46_2: Paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ isipatane dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā aṭṭhārasa brahmakoṭiyo amatapānaṃ pāyetvā bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya isipatane migadāye vasi.
atk-s0511a:46_3: Dutiyaṃ vassaṃ rājagahaṃ upanissāya veḷuvane mahāvihāre.
atk-s0511a:46_16: Soḷasamaṃ āḷavakaṃ dametvā caturāsītipāṇasahassāni amatapānaṃ pāyetvā āḷaviyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:46_19: Tathā ekūnavīsatimaṃ vīsatimaṃ pana vassaṃ rājagaheyeva vasi.
atk-s0511a:46_21: “bhagavā hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassāni anibaddhavāso hutvā yattha yattha phāsukaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a:46_23: Tato paṭṭhāya pana sāvatthiṃyeva upanissāya jetavanamahāvihāre ca pubbārāme ca dhuvaparibhogavasena vasi.
atk-s0511a:47_0: Yadā pana satthā buddho hutvā bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatane migadāye paṭhamaṃ vassaṃ vasitvā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā
atk-s0511a:47_1: uruvelaṃ gantvā tattha tayo māse vasanto tebhātikajaṭile dametvā bhikkhusahassehi kataparivāro phussamāsapuṇṇamāyaṃ
atk-s0511a:47_2: rājagahaṃ gantvā dve māse tattheva vasi,
atk-s0511a:47_3: tadā bārāṇasito nikkhantassa panassa pañca māsā jātā.
atk-s0511a:47_10: So evaṃ cintetvā kulanagaragamanatthāya saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi gamanavaṇṇaṃ vaṇṇesi.
atk-s0511a:47_11: Atha satthā cassa vacanaṃ sutvā ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātukāmo hutvā aṅgamagadhavāsīnaṃ kulaputtānaṃ dasahi sahassehi
atk-s0511a:47_12: kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto rājagahato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:47_13: divase divase yojanaṃ gacchanto rājagahato saṭṭhiyojanaṃ kapilavatthupuraṃ dvīhi māsehi sampāpuṇitvā
atk-s0511a:48_0: Kassa vacananti? Sāvakapaccekabuddhānaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ sammāsambuddhasseva vacanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:49_2: Ayañhi sāriputtatthero bhaddajī tisso kosiyaputto siggavo moggaliputto sudatto dhammiko dāsako soṇako
atk-s0511a:49_4: tato uddhampi tesaṃyeva sissānusissehīti evaṃ tāva ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjakālā ābhatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0511a:52_0: Kimatthāya kadā kassa, vacanaṃ kena cābhato”ti. –
atk-s0511a:56_0: Evaṃ ābhatassa panassa idāni atthavaṇṇanā hoti,

atk-s0511a:57_0: Tattha ādito paṭṭhāya tāva tesaṃ nidānānaṃ paricchedo veditabbo.

atk-s0511a:57_9: etasmiṃ antare bhagavā yattha yattha vihāsi,
atk-s0511a:57_11: Ettāvatā saṅkhepeneva tiṇṇaṃ dūrāvidūrasantikenidānānaṃ vasena bāhiranidānavaṇṇanā samattā hotīti.

atk-s0511a:65_3: upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ apucchī”ti evamādinā nayena nidānaṃ avatvā kasmā “brahmā ca lokādhipatī sahampatī,

atk-s0511a:68_3: mahāpuriso kira katābhinīhāro mahābhinikkhamanadivase vivaṭapākaṭabībhacchasayanāsanaceṭikā nāṭakitthiyo

atk-s0511a:68_6: nagaradvāre adhivatthāya devatāya nagaradvāre vivaṭe nagarato nikkhamitvā tīṇi rajjāni tena rattāvasesena
atk-s0511a:68_7: atikkamitvā anomasatto anomāya nāma nadiyā tīre ṭhatvā channamevamāha – “channa,

atk-s0511a:68_9: vissajjetvā asitoraganīluppalasadisenāsinā sakesamakuṭaṃ chinditvā ākāse ukkhipitvā devadattiyaṃ pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0511a:68_10: gahetvā sayameva pabbajitvā anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno anilabalasamuddhutataraṅgabhaṅgaṃ asaṅgaṃ gaṅgaṃ
atk-s0511a:68_11: nadiṃ uttaritvā maṇigaṇaraṃsijālavijjotitarājagahaṃ rājagahaṃ nāma nagaraṃ pavisitvā tattha issariyamadamattaṃ
atk-s0511a:68_12: janaṃ parihāsento viya ca uddhatavesassa janassa lajjamuppādayamāno viya ca vayakantīhi nāgarajanahadayāni
atk-s0511a:68_13: attani bandhanto viya ca dvatiṃsavaramahāpurisalakkhaṇavirājitāya rūpasiriyā sabbajananayanāni vilumpamāno
atk-s0511a:68_14: viya ca rūpīpādasañcaro puññasañcayo viya ca pabbato viya ca gamanena nissaṅgo santindriyo santamānaso
atk-s0511a:68_15: yugamattaṃ pekkhamāno rājagahaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yāpanamattaṃ bhattaṃ gahetvā nagarato nikkhamitvā paṇḍavapabbatapasse

atk-s0511a:68_19: na mayhaṃ rajjenattho ahaṃ rajjaṃ pahāya lokahitatthāya padhānamanuyuñjitvā loke vivaṭacchado buddho
atk-s0511a:68_20: bhavissāmīti nikkhanto”ti vatvā tena ca “buddho hutvā sabbapaṭhamaṃ mama vijitaṃ osareyyāthā”ti vutto
atk-s0511a:68_21: ‘sādhū’ti tassa paṭiññaṃ datvā āḷārañca udakañca upasaṅkamitvā tesaṃ dhammadesanāya sāraṃ avindanto tato
atk-s0511a:68_22: pakkamitvā uruvelāyaṃ chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontopi amataṃ adhigantuṃ asakkonto oḷārikāhārapaṭisevanena
atk-s0511a:69_0: Tadā pana uruvelāyaṃ senānigame senānigamakuṭumbikassa dhītā sujātā nāma dārikā vayappattā ekasmiṃ nigrodharukkhe patthanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a:69_1: “sacāhaṃ samajātikaṃ kulagharaṃ gantvā paṭhamagabbhe puttaṃ labhissāmi,
atk-s0511a:69_4: Sā vesākhapuṇṇamadivase “ajja balikammaṃ karissāmī”ti pātova pāyāsaṃ anāyāsaṃ paramamadhuraṃ sampaṭipādesi.
atk-s0511a:69_5: Bodhisattopi tadaheva katasarīrapaṭijaggano bhikkhācārakālaṃ āgamayamāno pātova gantvā tasmiṃ nigrodharukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:69_6: Atha kho puṇṇā nāma dāsī tassā dhātī rukkhamūlasodhanatthāya gatā bodhisattaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokayamānaṃ
atk-s0511a:69_9: Sarīrato cassa nikkhantāhi pabhāhi sakalañca taṃ rukkhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ disvā tassā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:69_10: “ajja amhākaṃ devatā rukkhato oruyha sahattheneva baliṃ paṭiggahetukāmā hutvā nisinnā”ti.
atk-s0511a:69_11: Sā vegena gantvā sujātāya etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0511a:70_0: Tato sujātā sañjātasaddhā hutvā sabbālaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā satasahassagghanikaṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ paramamadhurassa
atk-s0511a:70_1: madhupāyāsassa pūretvā aparāya suvaṇṇapātiyā pidahitvā sīsenādāya nigrodharukkhābhimukhī agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:70_2: Sā gacchantī dūratova taṃ bodhisattaṃ rukkhadevatamiva sakalaṃ taṃ rukkhaṃ sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:70_3: katvā puññasañcayamiva rūpavantaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā pītisomanassajātā sujātā “rukkhadevatā”ti saññāya diṭṭhaṭṭhānato
atk-s0511a:70_4: paṭṭhāya onatonatā gantvā sīsato taṃ suvaṇṇapātiṃ otāretvā mahāsattassa hatthe ṭhapetvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena
atk-s0511a:71_0: Atha kho bodhisattopi suvaṇṇapātiṃ gahetvā nerañjarāya nadiyā tīraṃ gantvā suppatiṭṭhitassa nāma titthassa
atk-s0511a:71_1: tīre suvaṇṇapātiṃ ṭhapetvā nhatvā paccuttaritvā ekūnapaññāsapiṇḍe karonto taṃ pāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā –
atk-s0511a:71_4: Sā pāti paṭisotaṃ gantvā kāḷassa nāma nāgarājassa bhavanaṃ pavisitvā tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ thālakāni ukkhipitvā tesaṃ heṭṭhā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:72_0: Mahāsatto tattheva vanasaṇḍe divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sotthiyena nāma tiṇahārakena mahāpurisassa
atk-s0511a:72_1: ākāraṃ ñatvā dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā bodhimaṇḍamāruyha dakkhiṇadisābhāge aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:72_2: So pana padeso paduminipatte udakabindu viya akampittha.
atk-s0511a:72_4: “ayaṃ padeso mama guṇaṃ dhāretuṃ asamattho”ti pacchimadisābhāgamagamāsi.
atk-s0511a:72_11: “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ kilesaviddhaṃsanaṭṭhāna”nti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tāni tiṇāni agge gahetvā cālesi.
atk-s0511a:72_14: “bodhiṃ apatvāva imaṃ pallaṅkaṃ na bhindissāmī”ti caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0511a:73_0: Taṅkhaṇaññeva sabbalokābhihāro māro bāhusahassaṃ māpetvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ himagirisikharasadisaṃ
atk-s0511a:73_1: girimekhalaṃ nāma arivaravāraṇaṃ varavāraṇaṃ abhiruyha navayojanikena dhanuasipharasusarasattisabalenātibahalena
atk-s0511a:73_2: mārabalena samparivuto samantā pabbato viya ajjhottharanto mahāsapattaṃ viya mahāsattaṃ samupāgami.
atk-s0511a:73_3: Mahāpuriso sūriye dharanteyeva atitumūlaṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā vikasitajayasumanakusumasadisassa cīvarassa
atk-s0511a:73_4: upari patamānehi rattapavālaṅkurasadisaruciradassanehi bodhirukkhaṅkurehi pītiyā viya pūjiyamāno eva
atk-s0511a:73_5: paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ labhitvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme paṭiccasamuppāde
atk-s0511a:73_6: ñāṇaṃ otāretvā vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ sammasanto aruṇodaye buddho hutvā –
atk-s0511a:77_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
atk-s0511a:79_0: Imaṃ udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ vimuttisukhapaṭisevanena vītināmetvā aṭṭhame divase samāpattito vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:79_1: devatānaṃ kaṅkhaṃ ñatvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhāvidhamanatthaṃ ākāse uppatitvā yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā tāsaṃ kaṅkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:79_2: vidhamitvā pallaṅkato īsakaṃ pācīnanissite uttaradisābhāge ṭhatvā –
atk-s0511a:79_3: “imasmiṃ vata me pallaṅke sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdha”nti cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pūritānaṃ
atk-s0511a:79_4: pāramīnaṃ phalādhigamaṭṭhānaṃ pallaṅkañceva bodhirukkhañca animisehi akkhīhi olokayamāno sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a:80_0: Atha pallaṅkassa ca ṭhitaṭṭhānassa ca antare puratthimapacchimato āyate ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi,
atk-s0511a:80_2: Tato pacchimadisābhāge devatā ratanagharaṃ nāma māpesuṃ,
atk-s0511a:80_3: tattha pallaṅkena nisīditvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ visesato cettha anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a:80_5: Evaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva cattāri sattāhāni vītināmetvā pañcame sattāhe bodhirukkhamūlā yena ajapālanigrodho tenupasaṅkami;
atk-s0511a:80_6: tatthāpi dhammaṃ vicinantoyeva vimuttisukhañca paṭisaṃvedento ajapālanigrodhe sattāhaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a:81_1: Tassa nisinnamattasseva bhagavato sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ pūrento mahāakālamegho udapādi.
atk-s0511a:81_2: Tasmiṃ pana uppanne mucalindo nāgarājā cintesi –
atk-s0511a:81_3: “ayaṃ mahāmegho satthari mayhaṃ bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhamatte uppanno vāsāgāramassa laddhuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:81_4: So sattaratanamayaṃ devavimānasadisaṃ dibbavimānaṃ nimminituṃ samatthopi evaṃ kate –
atk-s0511a:81_6: dasabalassa kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ karissāmī”ti atimahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā satthāraṃ sattakkhattuṃ bhogehi
atk-s0511a:81_7: parikkhipitvā upari mahantaṃ phaṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:81_8: Atha bhagavā parikkhepassa antova mahati okāse sabbaratanamaye paccagghapallaṅke upari viniggalantavividhasurabhikusumadāmavitāne
atk-s0511a:81_10: Evaṃ bhagavā taṃ sattāhaṃ tattha vītināmetvā tato aparaṃ sattāhaṃ rājāyatane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:81_13: Etthantare bhagavā jhānasukhena phalasukhena ca vītināmesi.
atk-s0511a:82_4: Tato bhagavā dantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotattadahodakena mukhaṃ dhovitvā rājāyatanamūle nisīdi.

atk-s0511a:169_0: Tesu aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā suttapariyosāne aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.

atk-s0511a:169_2: Eteneva upāyena sabbe te sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpetvā puna pañcamiyaṃ pakkhassa pañcapi te there sannipātetvā anattalakkhaṇasuttantaṃ desesi,
atk-s0511a:170_0: Atha satthā tattheva yasassa kulaputtassa upanissayaṃ disvā gehaṃ pahāya nikkhantaṃ disvā –

atk-s0511a:170_3: Evaṃ loke ekasaṭṭhiyā arahantesu jātesu satthā vuṭṭhavasso pavāretvā bhikkhū āmantetvā etadavoca –
atk-s0511a:176_0: Santi atthāya sattānaṃ, subbatā vacanaṃ mama.
atk-s0511a:185_0: Evañca pana vatvā bhagavā te bhikkhū disāsu vissajjetvā sayaṃ uruvelaṃ gacchanto antarāmagge kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiyakumāre vinesi.

atk-s0511a:185_6: dassetvā uruvelakassapādayo sahassajaṭilaparivāre tebhātikajaṭile dametvā ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā

atk-s0511a:190_0: “Rūpe ca sadde ca atho rase ca, kāmitthiyo cābhivadanti yaññā;

atk-s0511a:192_0: Imaṃ gāthaṃ vatvā attano sāvakabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ tathāgatassa pādesu sirasā nipatitvā –
atk-s0511a:192_3: sattatālappamāṇaṃ vehāsaṃ sattakkhattuṃ abbhuggantvā pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā ākāsato oruyha bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.

atk-s0511a:193_2: evaṃ thāmagatadiṭṭhiko attānaṃ ‘arahā aha’nti maññamāno uruvelakassapopi diṭṭhijālaṃ bhinditvā tathāgatena damito”ti dasabalassa guṇakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0511a:193_6: Atha kho so mahājano uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā sirasi añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamāha – “bhante,

atk-s0511a:193_10: Tato satthu dhammakathaṃ sutvā rājā bimbisāro ekādasanahutehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi,

atk-s0511a:194_2: Rājā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā bhojanapariyosāne bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0511a:194_3: tīṇi ratanāni vinā vasituṃ na sakkhissāmi,
atk-s0511a:194_4: velāya vā avelāya vā bhagavato santikaṃ āgamissāmi,
atk-s0511a:194_6: idaṃ pana amhākaṃ veḷuvanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ pavivekakāmānaṃ nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ
atk-s0511a:194_9: bhagavā paṭiggaṇhātu navatapanaṅgārasaṅkāsena suvaṇṇabhiṅgārena surabhikusumavāsitaṃ maṇivaṇṇaudakaṃ
atk-s0511a:194_10: gahetvā veḷuvanārāmaṃ pariccajanto dasabalassa hatthe udakaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0511a:194_11: Tasmiṃ ārāmapaṭiggahaṇe “buddhasāsanassa mūlāni otiṇṇānī”ti pītivasaṃ gatā naccantī viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī kampi.

atk-s0511a:195_0: “Āvāsadānassa panānisaṃsaṃ, ko nāma vattuṃ, puriso samattho;
atk-s0511a:196_0: Aññatra buddhā pana lokanāthā, yutto mukhānaṃ nahutena cāpi.
atk-s0511a:197_0: “Āyuñca vaṇṇañca sukhaṃ balañca, varaṃ pasatthaṃ paṭibhānameva;
atk-s0511a:198_0: Dadāti nāmāti pavuccate so, yo deti saṅghassa naro vihāraṃ.
atk-s0511a:200_0: Pāleti āyuṃ pana tassa yasmā, āyuppado hoti tamāhu santo.
atk-s0511a:201_0: “Accuṇhasīte vasato nivāse, balañca vaṇṇo paṭibhā na hoti;
atk-s0511a:202_0: Tasmā hi so deti vihāradātā, balañca vaṇṇaṃ paṭibhānameva.
atk-s0511a:204_0: Nivāraṇā nekavidhassa niccaṃ, sukhappado hoti vihāradātā.
atk-s0511a:206_0: Yasmā nivāreti vihāradātā, tasmā sukhaṃ vindati so parattha.
atk-s0511a:208_0: Yo deti sīlādiguṇoditānaṃ, sabbaṃ dado nāma pavuccate so.
atk-s0511a:210_0: Khittova so tattha parehi sagge, yathābhataṃ jāyati vītasoko.
atk-s0511a:211_0: “Vare cārurūpe vihāre uḷāre, naro kāraye vāsaye tattha bhikkhū;
atk-s0511a:212_0: Dadeyyannapānañca vatthañca nesaṃ, pasannena cittena sakkacca niccaṃ.
atk-s0511a:213_0: “Tasmā mahārāja bhavesu bhoge, manorame paccanubhuyya bhiyyo;
atk-s0511a:214_0: Vihāradānassa phalena santaṃ, sukhaṃ asokaṃ adhigaccha pacchā”ti.
atk-s0511a:215_0: Iccevaṃ munirājā nararājassa bimbisārassa vihāradānānumodanaṃ katvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0511a:215_1: paramadassanīyāya attano sarīrappabhāya suvaṇṇarasasekapiñcharāni viya nagaravanavimānādīni kurumāno
atk-s0511a:215_2: anopamāya buddhalīḷāya anantāya buddhasiriyā veḷuvanamahāvihārameva pāvisīti.
atk-s0511a:218_0: Athevaṃ bhagavati tasmiṃ viharante suddhodanamahārājā “putto me chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ katvā paramābhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:218_1: patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko rājagahaṃ patvā veḷuvanamahāvihāre viharatī”ti sutvā aññataraṃ mahāmaccaṃ
atk-s0511a:218_3: purisasahassaparivāro rājagahaṃ gantvā mama vacanena ‘pitā vo suddhodanamahārājā taṃ daṭṭhukāmo’ti vatvā puttaṃ me gaṇhitvā ehī”ti.
atk-s0511a:218_5: devā”ti rañño paṭissuṇitvā purisasahassaparivāro saṭṭhiyojanamaggaṃ gantvā dhammadesanavelāya vihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0511a:218_6: So “tiṭṭhatu tāva raññā pahitasāsana”nti parisapariyante ṭhito satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā yathāṭhitova
atk-s0511a:218_7: saddhiṃ purisasahassena arahattaṃ patvā pabbajjaṃ yāci. Bhagavā – “etha,
atk-s0511a:218_9: Te sabbe taṅkhaṇaññeva iddhimayapattacīvaradharā vassasaṭṭhikattherā viya ākappasampannā hutvā bhagavantaṃ parivāresuṃ.
atk-s0511a:218_11: na ca sāsanaṃ suyyatī”ti cintetvā teneva nīhārena navakkhattuṃ amacce pesesi.
atk-s0511a:218_12: Tesu navasu purisasahassesu ekopi rañño nārocesi,
atk-s0511a:219_1: “ko nu kho mama vacanaṃ karissatī”ti sabbarājabalaṃ olokento udāyiṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a:219_2: So kira rañño sabbatthasādhako amacco abbhantariko ativissāsiko bodhisattena saddhiṃ ekadivaseyeva jāto sahapaṃsukīḷito sahāyo.
atk-s0511a:219_5: ahaṃ mama puttaṃ daṭṭhukāmo navapurisasahassāni pesesiṃ,
atk-s0511a:219_12: tvaṃ pabbajitvā vā apabbajitvā vā mayhaṃ puttaṃ dassehī”ti.
atk-s0511a:219_14: devā”ti rañño sāsanaṃ ādāya rājagahaṃ gantvā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saddhiṃ purisasahassena arahattaṃ
atk-s0511a:219_20: kālo dasabalassa ñātisaṅgahaṃ kātu”nti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā saṭṭhimattāhi gāthāhi bhagavato
atk-s0511a:220_0: “Aṅgārino dāni dumā bhadante, phalesino chadanaṃ vippahāya;
atk-s0511a:221_0: Te accimantova pabhāsayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:225_0: Rukkhā virocanti ubhosu passesu, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:227_0: Khuddaṃ pipāsampi vinodayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:229_0: Rukkhā virocanti ubhosu passesu, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:233_0: Tosenti satte maṇimaṇḍapāva, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:234_0: “Latā anekā dumanissitāva, piyehi saddhiṃ sahitā vadhūva;
atk-s0511a:235_0: Palobhayantī hi sugandhagandhā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:237_0: Tosenti mañjussaratā ratīhi, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:238_0: “Migā ca nānā suvirājamānā, uttuṅgakaṇṇā ca manuññanettā;
atk-s0511a:239_0: Disā samantā mabhidhāvayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:240_0: “Manuññabhūtā ca mahī samantā, virājamānā haritāva saddalā;
atk-s0511a:243_0: Virocayanteva disā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:245_0: Virājamānaṃ sucimañca sobhaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:247_0: Sugandhabhūtaṃ pavanaṃ surammaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:253_0: Modanti bhariyāhi samaṅgino te, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:255_0: Madhumhi gandho vidisaṃ pavāyati, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:256_0: “Abhinnanādā madavāraṇā ca, girīhi dhāvanti ca vāridhārā;
atk-s0511a:257_0: Savanti najjo suvirājitāva samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:259_0: Disā rajindāva virocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:263_0: Girimhi ṭhatvā abhinādayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:265_0: Girī virocanti disā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:267_0: Savanti najjo suvirājamānā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:269_0: Najjo virocanti susandamānā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:271_0: Vibhūsitaggā surasundarī ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:273_0: Manobhirāmaṃ satataṃ gatīnaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:275_0: Pathesu gāme sulabhā manuññā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:279_0: Bahūhi tattheva janā samantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:281_0: Bhisehi khīraṃva rasaṃ pavāyati, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:289_0: Visālasālā ca sabhā ca bahū, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:292_0: “Vāto mudūsītalasādhurūpo, nabhā ca abbhā vigatā samantā;
atk-s0511a:293_0: Disā ca sabbāva virocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:295_0: Nabhe ca sūro mudukova tāpo, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:297_0: Disā vidhāvanti ca gajjayantā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:301_0: Disā ca sabbā atirocayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:303_0: Caranti tasmiṃ pavane suramme, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:308_0: “Nisevitaṃ nekadijehi niccaṃ, gāmena gāmaṃ satataṃ vasantā;
atk-s0511a:309_0: Pure pure gāmavarā ca santi, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:311_0: Tahiṃ samiddhā janatā bahū ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:312_0: “Puññiddhiyā sabbayasaggapattā, janā ca tasmiṃ sukhitā samiddhā;
atk-s0511a:313_0: Pahūtabhogā vividhā vasanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:314_0: “Nabhe ca abbhā suvisuddhavaṇṇā, disā ca cando suvirājitova;
atk-s0511a:315_0: Rattiñca vāto mudusītalo ca, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:317_0: Piyehi saddhiṃ abhimodayanti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:318_0: “Candassa raṃsīhi nabhaṃ viroci, mahī ca saṃsuddhamanuññavaṇṇā;
atk-s0511a:319_0: Disā ca sabbā parisuddharūpā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:320_0: “Dūre ca disvā varacandaraṃsiṃ, pupphiṃsu pupphāni mahītalasmiṃ;
atk-s0511a:324_0: “Kucanti hatthīpi madena mattā, vicittapiñchā ca dijā samantā;
atk-s0511a:325_0: Karonti nādaṃ pavane suramme, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:326_0: “Pathañca sabbaṃ paṭipajjanakkhamaṃ, iddhañca raṭṭhaṃ sadhanaṃ sabhogaṃ;
atk-s0511a:329_0: Yatīna pītiṃ satataṃ janeti, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:331_0: Kulanagaraṃ idha sassirikaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:333_0: Vicittaparikhāhi puraṃ surammaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:337_0: Surindaloke iva devaputtā, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:339_0: Balena saddhiṃ mahatā muninda, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:343_0: Tosehi taṃ muninda guṇaseṭṭhaṃ, samayo mahāvīra aṅgīrasānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:346_0: Yāya āsāya tiṭṭhāmi, sā me āsā samijjhatu.
atk-s0511a:348_0: Saddalā haritā bhūmi, esa kālo mahāmunī”ti.
atk-s0511a:350_1: kapilavatthuvāsīnaṃ dasahi sahassehīti sabbeheva vīsatiyā khīṇāsavabhikkhusahassehi parivuto rājagahā
atk-s0511a:350_2: nikkhamitvā divase divase yojanaṃ yojanaṃ gacchanto dvīhi māsehi kapilavatthupuraṃ sampāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a:350_4: “amhākaṃ ñātiseṭṭhaṃ passissāmā”ti bhagavato vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vīmaṃsamānā “nigrodhasakkassārāmo ramaṇīyo”ti
atk-s0511a:350_5: sallakkhetvā sabbaṃ paṭijagganavidhiṃ kāretvā gandhapupphahatthā paccuggamanaṃ karontā sabbālaṅkārehi
atk-s0511a:350_6: samalaṅkatagattā gandhapupphacuṇṇādīhi pūjayamānā bhagavantaṃ purakkhatvā nigrodhārāmameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:351_0: Tatra bhagavā vīsatiyā khīṇāsavasahassehi parivuto paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:351_8: Tesvevaṃ nisinnesu bhagavā tesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0511a:351_9: “ime ñātakā attano moghajiṇṇabhāvena na maṃ vandanti,
atk-s0511a:351_14: handāhaṃ attano buddhabalaṃ iddhibalañca dassento pāṭihāriyañca kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0511a:351_15: ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷavitthataṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ caṅkamaṃ māpetvā tattha caṅkamanto mahājanassa ajjhāsayaṃ oloketvā dhammañca deseyya”nti cintesi.
atk-s0511a:353_0: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ kīdisako naruttamo;
atk-s0511a:354_0: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca kīdisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa kīdisaṃ.
atk-s0511a:356_0: “Na hete jānanti sadevamānusā, buddho ayaṃ edisako naruttamo;
atk-s0511a:357_0: Iddhibalaṃ paññābalañca edisaṃ, buddhabalaṃ lokahitassa edisaṃ.
atk-s0511a:361_0: Tattha na hete jānantīti na hi ete jānanti. Na-
atk-s0511a:361_3: Yasmā panete mama ñātiādayo devamanussā mayā buddhabale ca iddhibale ca anāvikate na jānanti “ediso buddho,
atk-s0511a:361_5: tasmā ahaṃ mama buddhabalañca iddhibalañca dasseyyanti attho.
atk-s0511a:361_7: Saha devehīti sadevā. Ke te? Mānusā,
atk-s0511a:361_13: sadevā sasuddhodanā mānusā sadevamānusā sarājāno vā ete mama ñātimānusā mama balaṃ na vijānantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:361_17: Atha vā devā ca mānusā ca devamānusā,
atk-s0511a:361_20: Buddhoti catusaccadhamme buddho anubuddhoti buddho. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:363_0: Pahātabbaṃ pahīnaṃ me, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇā”ti. ;
atk-s0511a:364_1: Adhigatavisesehi devamanussehi “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā”ti evaṃ buddhattā ñātattā buddho.
atk-s0511a:364_6: Kīdisakoti kīdiso kiṃsarikkhako kiṃsadiso kiṃvaṇṇo kiṃsaṇṭhāno dīgho vā rasso vāti attho.
atk-s0511a:365_0: Naruttamoti narānaṃ naresu vā uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti naruttamo.
atk-s0511a:365_1: Iddhibalanti ettha ijjhanaṃ iddhi nipphattiatthena paṭilābhaṭṭhena ca iddhi.
atk-s0511a:365_2: Atha vā ijjhanti tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi.
atk-s0511a:367_2: sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā āvajjitvā ñāṇena adhiṭṭhāti “bahuko homī”ti evaṃ vibhajitvā dassitā iddhi adhiṭṭhānavasena nipphannattā adhiṭṭhānā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:367_4: abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya sace sataṃ icchati “sataṃ homi,
atk-s0511a:367_5: sataṃ homī”ti kāmāvacaraparikammacittehi parikammaṃ katvā puna abhiññāpādakaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya puna āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0511a:368_0: Tattha pādakajjhānacittaṃ nimittārammaṇaṃ parikammacittāni satārammaṇāni vā sahassādīsu aññatarārammaṇāni vā,
atk-s0511a:368_4: taṃ pana appanācittaṃ viya gotrabhuanantarameva uppajjati rūpāvacaracatutthajhānikaṃ.
atk-s0511a:368_5: So pana pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā kumāravaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti nāgavaṇṇaṃ vā dasseti.
atk-s0511a:368_7: vividhampi senābyūhaṃ vā dassetīti evaṃ āgatā iddhi pakativaṇṇavijahanavikāravasena pavattattā vikubbaniddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:369_0: “Idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ ahīnindriya”nti
atk-s0511a:369_1: iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrasseva abbhantare aññassa manomayassa sarīrassa nipphattivasena pavattattā
atk-s0511a:370_0: Ñāṇuppattito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā tena attabhāvena paṭilabhitabbaarahattañāṇānubhāvena nibbatto viseso ñāṇavipphāro iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:370_1: Āyasmato bākulassa ca āyasmato saṃkiccassa ca ñāṇavipphārā iddhi,
atk-s0511a:371_0: Samādhito pubbe vā pacchā vā taṅkhaṇe vā samathānubhāvena nibbatto viseso samādhivipphārā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:371_5: sāmāvatiyā upāsikāya samādhivipphārā iddhīti tesaṃ vatthūnettha kathetabbāni,
atk-s0511a:372_1: Idha bhikkhu sace ākaṅkhati “paṭikkūle appaṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya”nti appaṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati,
atk-s0511a:372_2: sace ākaṅkhati “appaṭikkūle paṭikkūlasaññī vihareyya”nti paṭikkūlasaññī tattha viharati…pe…
atk-s0511a:372_4: Ayañhi cetovasippattānaṃ ariyānaṃyeva sambhavato ariyā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:373_1: Sabbesaṃ pakkhīnaṃ sabbesaṃ devānaṃ paṭhamakappikānaṃ manussānaṃ ekaccānañca vinipātikānaṃ vehāsagamanādikā kammavipākajā iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:373_3: Rājā cakkavattī vehāsaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāya.
atk-s0511a:373_6: Ghosakassa gahapatino sattasu ṭhānesu māraṇatthāya upakkame katepi arogabhāvo puññavato iddhi.
atk-s0511a:373_7: Meṇḍakaseṭṭhissa aṭṭhakarīsamatte padese sattaratanamayānaṃ meṇḍakānaṃ pātubhāvo puññavato iddhi.
atk-s0511a:374_5: Taṃ taṃ kammaṃ katvā nibbatto viseso ‘sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhī’ti ayaṃ tattha tattha sammāpayogapaccayā ijjhanaṭṭhena iddhi nāma.
atk-s0511a:374_6: Imissā dasavidhāya iddhiyā balaṃ iddhibalaṃ nāma,
atk-s0511a:374_7: idaṃ mayhaṃ iddhibalaṃ na jānantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:376_3: Yasmā panete mama ñātakā buddhabalaṃ vā buddhaguṇe vā na jānanti,
atk-s0511a:376_4: kevalaṃ attano moghajiṇṇabhāvaṃ nissāya mānavasena sabbalokajeṭṭhaseṭṭhaṃ maṃ na vandanti.
atk-s0511a:376_6: taṃ bhañjitvā vandanatthaṃ buddhabalaṃ dasseyyanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a:376_18: Sabbaratanamaṇḍitanti sabbehi ratijananaṭṭhena ratanehi muttā- maṇi- veḷuriya- saṅkha- silā- pavāḷa- rajata- suvaṇṇa-
atk-s0511a:376_20: lohitaṅkehi dasahi dasahi maṇḍito alaṅkato sabbaratanamaṇḍito,
atk-s0511a:377_0: Athevaṃ bhagavatā cintitamatte dasasahassacakkavāḷavāsino bhummādayo devā pamuditahadayā sādhukāramadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:379_0: “Bhummā mahārājikā tāvatiṃsā, yāmā ca devā tusitā ca nimmitā;
atk-s0511a:380_0: Paranimmitā yepi ca brahmakāyikā, ānanditā vipulamakaṃsu ghosa”nti. –
atk-s0511a:382_29: tato akaniṭṭhā devatā saddaṃ sutvā mahantaṃ saddaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:382_30: Asaññino ca arūpāvacarasatte ca ṭhapetvā sotāyatanapavattiṭṭhāne sabbe devamanussanāgādayo pītivasaṃ gatahadayā ukkuṭṭhisaddamakaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0511a:383_2: Tena adhiṭṭhānacittena saheva āloko ahosi pathavito paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā.
atk-s0511a:385_0: “Obhāsitā ca pathavī sadevakā, puthū ca lokantarikā asaṃvutā;
atk-s0511a:386_0: Tamo ca tibbo vihato tadā ahu, disvāna accherakaṃ pāṭihīra”nti.
atk-s0511a:387_8: Yaṃ ajjhattaṃ paccattaṃ kakkhaḷaṃ kharigata”ntiādīsu vuttā ayaṃ kakkhaḷapathavī nāma.
atk-s0511a:387_9: “Yo pana bhikkhu pathaviṃ khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya vā”tiādīsu vuttā sasambhārapathavī,
atk-s0511a:387_12: sāpi vaṇṇādīhi sambhārehi saddhiṃ pathavīti sasambhārapathavī nāma.
atk-s0511a:387_14: Pathavīkasiṇajhānalābhī devaloke nibbatto āgamanavasena “pathavīdevo”ti nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0511a:388_5: tā pana tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekā lokantarikā hoti,
atk-s0511a:388_6: tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya ekeko lokantarikanirayo,
atk-s0511a:388_13: Tadāti yadā pana bhagavā sattesu kāruññataṃ paṭicca pāṭihāriyakaraṇatthaṃ ālokaṃ phari,
atk-s0511a:388_14: tadā so tamo tibbo lokantarikāsu ṭhito,
atk-s0511a:389_3: Paṭiharati sattānaṃ diṭṭhimānopagatāni cittānīti vā pāṭihīraṃ,
atk-s0511a:389_4: appasannānaṃ sattānaṃ pasādaṃ paṭiāharatīti vā pāṭihīraṃ.
atk-s0511a:389_8: Disvāna accherakaṃ pāṭihīranti ettha devā ca manussā ca lokantarikāsu nibbattasattāpi ca taṃ bhagavato
atk-s0511a:389_9: pāṭihāriyaṃ disvā paramappītisomanassaṃ agamaṃsūti idaṃ vacanaṃ āharitvā attho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a:390_0: Idāni na kevalaṃ manussalokesuyeva āloko atthi,
atk-s0511a:390_1: sabbattha tividhepi saṅkhārasattokāsasaṅkhāte loke ālokoyevāti dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:395_0: Adho ca uddhaṃ tiriyañca vitthata”nti. – ayaṃ gāthā vuttā;
atk-s0511a:396_0: Tattha devāti sammutidevā upapattidevā visuddhidevāti sabbepi devā idha saṅgahitā.
atk-s0511a:396_1: Devā ca gandhabbā ca manussā ca rakkhasā ca devagandhabbamanussarakkhasā.
atk-s0511a:396_8: Tathā hesa “uḷārāni khādanīyabhojanīyāni khādanti bhuñjantī”tiādīsu madhure dissati.
atk-s0511a:396_9: “Uḷārāya kho pana bhavaṃ vacchāyano pasaṃsāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pasaṃsatī”tiādīsu seṭṭhe.
atk-s0511a:396_10: “Atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ appamāṇo uḷāro obhāso”tiādīsu vipule.
atk-s0511a:396_14: Imasmiṃ loke parasmiñcāti imasmiṃ manussaloke ca parasmiṃ devaloke cāti attho.
atk-s0511a:396_21: Andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā vuttappakāraṃ lokañca padesañca ajjhottharitvā ābhā pavattitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:396_22: Atha vā tiriyañca vitthatanti tiriyato vitthataṃ mahantaṃ,
atk-s0511a:396_23: appamāṇaṃ padesaṃ ābhā pharitvā aṭṭhāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a:397_0: Atha bhagavā dasasahassacakkavāḷesu ālokapharaṇaṃ katvā abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato
atk-s0511a:397_1: vuṭṭhāya āvajjitvā adhiṭṭhānacittena ākāsamabbhuggantvā tesaṃ ñātīnaṃ sīsesu pādapaṃsuṃ okiramāno viya
atk-s0511a:398_1: Idha tathāgato yamakapāṭihīraṃ karoti asādhāraṇaṃ sāvakehi uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a:398_45: channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ nīlānaṃ pītakānaṃ lohitakānaṃ odātānaṃ mañjiṭṭhānaṃ pabhassarānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:399_1: nimmito tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_3: nimmito caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_5: nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_7: nimmito caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā.
atk-s0511a:399_9: bhagavā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_11: bhagavā caṅkamati vā nisīdati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_13: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā seyyaṃ vā kappeti.
atk-s0511a:399_15: bhagavā caṅkamati vā tiṭṭhati vā nisīdati vā,
atk-s0511a:400_0: Tassa pana bhagavato tejokasiṇasamāpattivasena uparimakāyato aggikkhandho pavattati.
atk-s0511a:400_1: Āpokasiṇasamāpattivasena heṭṭhimakāyato udakadhārā pavattatīti puna udakadhārāya pavattaṭṭhānato aggikkhandho pavattati,
atk-s0511a:400_8: Rasmīsu pana dutiyā dutiyā rasmi purimāya purimāya yamakā viya ekakkhaṇe pavattati.
atk-s0511a:400_9: Dvinnañca cittānaṃ ekakkhaṇe pavatti nāma natthi,
atk-s0511a:400_10: buddhānaṃ pana bhavaṅgaparivāsassa lahukatāya pañcahākārehi ciṇṇavasitāya etā rasmiyo ekakkhaṇe viya pavattanti,
atk-s0511a:401_0: Evaṃ bhagavato yamakapāṭihīre kayiramāne sakalassāpi dasasahassacakkavāḷassa alaṅkārakaraṇakālo viya ahosi.
atk-s0511a:405_0: Tattha sattuttamoti attano sīlādīhi guṇehi sabbesu sattesu uttamo pavaro seṭṭhoti sattuttamo,
atk-s0511a:405_7: Na panesa bhedo aniyamato bahulavacanato ca naruttamapurisuttamanaravarādi-
atk-s0511a:405_9: Atha vā sattaṃ uttamaṃ yassa so sattuttamo,
atk-s0511a:405_12: Uttamasattoti visesanassa pubbanipātapāṭhato “cittagū paddhagū”ti ettha viyāti nāyaṃ doso.
atk-s0511a:405_14: Vināyakoti bahūhi vinayanūpāyehi satte vineti dametīti vināyako.
atk-s0511a:405_15: Satthāti diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthehi yathārahaṃ satte anusāsatīti satthā.
atk-s0511a:405_17: Devamanussapūjitoti dibbehi pañcakāmaguṇehi dibbanti kīḷantīti devā.
atk-s0511a:405_29: Satapuññalakkhaṇoti anantesu cakkavāḷesu sabbe sattā ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ satakkhattuṃ kareyyuṃ ettakehi
atk-s0511a:405_30: janehi katakammaṃ bodhisatto sayameva ekako sataguṇaṃ katvā nibbatto.
atk-s0511a:405_32: Keci pana “satena satena puññakammena nibbattaekekalakkhaṇo”ti vadanti.
atk-s0511a:405_33: “Evaṃ sante yo koci buddho bhaveyyā”ti taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0511a:405_34: Dassesīti sabbesaṃ devamanussānaṃ ativimhayakaraṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0511a:406_0: Atha satthā ākāse pāṭihāriyaṃ katvā mahājanassa cittācāraṃ oloketvā tassa ajjhāsayānukūlaṃ dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0511a:406_1: caṅkamanto kathetukāmo ākāse dasasahassacakkavāḷavitthataṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0511a:408_0: “So yācito devavarena cakkhumā, atthaṃ samekkhitvā tadā naruttamo;
atk-s0511a:410_1: Yācitoti paṭhamameva aṭṭhame sattāhe dhammadesanāya yācitoti attho.
atk-s0511a:410_16: Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā tīṇi ca phalāni,
atk-s0511a:410_24: ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti ettha pubbenivāsādiñāṇaṃ paññācakkhūti āgataṃ.
atk-s0511a:411_0: Maṃsacakkhu nāma “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti ettha pasādamaṃsacakkhu vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:411_3: Tesu yvāyaṃ akkhikūpake akkhipattakehi parivārito maṃsapiṇḍo yattha catasso dhātuyo vaṇṇagandharasojā
atk-s0511a:411_4: sambhavo jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti saṅkhepato terasa sambhārā honti.
atk-s0511a:411_5: Vitthārato pana sambhavamānāni catusamuṭṭhānāni chattiṃsa jīvitaṃ bhāvo cakkhupasādo kāyapasādoti ime kammasamuṭṭhānā cattāro cāti sasambhārā honti,
atk-s0511a:411_7: Yaṃ pana setamaṇḍalaparicchinnena kaṇhamaṇḍalena parivārite diṭṭhamaṇḍale sanniviṭṭhaṃ rūpadassanasamatthaṃ pasādamattaṃ,
atk-s0511a:411_15: Iccevametāni vuttappakārāni cakkhūni assa bhagavato santīti bhagavā cakkhumāti vuccati.
atk-s0511a:411_17: dhammadesanānimittaṃ devamanussānaṃ hitatthaṃ upaparikkhitvā upadhāretvāti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a:414_0: “Iddhī ca ādesanānusāsanī, tipāṭihīre bhagavā vasī ahu;
atk-s0511a:415_0: Caṅkamaṃ māpayi lokanāyako, suniṭṭhitaṃ sabbaratananimmita”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:416_1: Taṃ pana ekopi hutvā bahudhā hoti,
atk-s0511a:416_3: Ādesanāti parassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā kathanaṃ ādesanāpāṭihāriyaṃ,
atk-s0511a:419_4: Tatra yaṃ yaṃ jhānaṃ yathicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ āvajjati āvajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti sīghaṃ āvajjetuṃ samatthatā āvajjanavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a:419_6: samāpajjati samāpajjanāya dandhāyitattaṃ natthīti sīghaṃ samāpajjanasamatthatā samāpajjanavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a:419_7: Dīghaṃ kālaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a:419_8: Tatheva lahuṃ vuṭṭhātuṃ samatthatā vuṭṭhānavasī nāma.
atk-s0511a:419_9: Paccavekkhaṇavasī pana paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva honti tāni āvajjanānantarāneva hutvā uppajjantīti āvajjanavasiyā eva vuttāni.
atk-s0511a:419_10: Iti imāsu pañcasu vasīsu ciṇṇavasitā vasī nāma hoti.
atk-s0511a:423_0: Thambheva dassesi paṭipāṭiyā, caṅkame ratanāmaye”ti. – ādigāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a:424_2: Thambhevāti thambhe viya dasacakkavāḷasahassesu ye sinerupabbatā,
atk-s0511a:424_3: te paṭipāṭiyā ṭhite suvaṇṇathambhe viya katvā tesaṃ upari caṅkamaṃ māpetvā dassesīti attho.
atk-s0511a:425_1: Dasasahassī atikkammāti ratanacaṅkamaṃ pana bhagavā māpento tassa ekaṃ koṭiṃ sabbapariyantaṃ pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ
atk-s0511a:425_2: ekaṃ koṭiṃ pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitaṃ katvā māpesi.
atk-s0511a:428_1: Sabbasoṇṇamayā passeti tassa pana evaṃ nimmitassa caṅkamassa ubhayapassesu suvaṇṇamayā paramaramaṇīyā mariyādabhūmi ahosi,
atk-s0511a:429_6: Vedikā sabbasovaṇṇāti vedikā pana sabbāpi suvaṇṇamayā,
atk-s0511a:429_8: sā ekāva aññehi ratanehi asammissāti attho.
atk-s0511a:429_9: Dubhato passesu nimmitāti ubhosu passesu nimmitā. Da-
atk-s0511a:430_2: Atha vā maṇayo ca muttā ca vālukā ca maṇimuttāvālukā.
atk-s0511a:430_7: Obhāseti disā sabbāti sabbāpi dasa disā obhāseti pakāseti.
atk-s0511a:430_10: Yathā pana abbhuggato sahassaraṃsi sabbāpi dasa disā obhāseti,
atk-s0511a:430_11: evameva esopi sabbaratanamayo caṅkamo obhāsetīti attho.
atk-s0511a:431_0: Idāni pana niṭṭhite caṅkame tattha bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:440_0: Namassamānā nipatanti, tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā”ti. – gāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a:441_3: Pārichattakanti devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ koviḷārarukkhassa nissandena samantā yojanasataparimāṇo paramadassanīyo pāricchattakarukkho nibbatti.
atk-s0511a:441_4: Yasmiṃ pupphite sakalaṃ devanagaraṃ ekasurabhigandhavāsitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0511a:441_5: tassa kusumareṇuokiṇṇāni navakanakavimānāni piñjarāni hutvā khāyanti.
atk-s0511a:441_6: Imassa pana pāricchattakarukkhassa pupphañca pāricchattakanti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:441_8: tena vuttappakārena pupphena tasmiṃ caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ bhagavantaṃ pūjentīti attho.
atk-s0511a:441_11: Taṃ bhagavantaṃ ratanacaṅkamane caṅkamantaṃ sakesu ālayesupi passantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:441_17: Pamoditāti idāni vattabbehi tāvatiṃsādidevehi saddhinti sambandho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a:441_19: Atha vā pamoditā taṃ bhagavantaṃ passanti,
atk-s0511a:441_20: tuṭṭhahaṭṭhā pamoditā tahiṃ tahiṃ sannipatantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:442_0: Idāni ye passiṃsu ye sannipatiṃsu, te sarūpato dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a:444_0: “Tāvatiṃsā ca yāmā ca, tusitā cāpi devatā;
atk-s0511a:455_0: Bhamenti celāni ca ambare tadā, aho jino lokahitānukampako”ti. –
atk-s0511a:457_4: Nabheva accuggatacandamaṇḍalanti ettha ākāse abhinavoditaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ sabbopaddavavinimuttaṃ saradasamaye
atk-s0511a:457_5: candamaṇḍalaṃ viya buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ nayanānandakaraṃ passantīti attho.
atk-s0511a:458_3: tasmā parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhāparittādibhedena tatiyajjhānena nibbattā sabbeva gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a:458_8: Cakkhusotānamabhāvato asaññasattā ca arūpino ca idha na uddiṭṭhā.
atk-s0511a:458_9: Akaniṭṭhā ca devatāti idhāpi ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavaseneva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:458_10: Tasmā avihātappasudassāsudassiakaniṭṭhasaṅkhātā pañcapi suddhāvāsā gahitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0511a:458_11: Susuddhasukkavatthavasanāti suṭṭhu suddhāni susuddhāni sukkāni odātāni.
atk-s0511a:458_12: Susuddhāni sukkāni vatthāni nivatthāni ceva pārutāni ca yehi te susuddhasukkavatthavasanā,
atk-s0511a:458_15: Pañjalīkatāti katapañjalikā kamalamakulasadisaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0511a:459_9: Aho jino lokahitānukampakoti “aho jino lokahito aho ca lokahitānukampako aho kāruṇiko”ti evamādīni thutivacanāni uggirantā.
atk-s0511a:460_0: Idāni tehi payuttāni thutivacanāni dassetuṃ imā gāthāyo vuttā –
atk-s0511a:462_0: “Tuvaṃ satthā ca ketū ca, dhajo yūpo ca pāṇinaṃ;
atk-s0511a:463_0: Parāyano patiṭṭhā ca, dīpo ca dvipaduttamo.
atk-s0511a:489_0: “Saṅkhā ca paṇavā ceva, athopi ḍiṇḍimā bahū;
atk-s0511a:499_0: Pajā ca vividhā gagane, vattanti pañjalīkatā.
atk-s0511a:501_0: “Gāyanti seḷenti ca vādayanti ca, bhujāni pothenti ca naccayanti ca;
atk-s0511a:502_0: Muñcanti pupphaṃ pana pañcavaṇṇikaṃ, mandāravaṃ candanacuṇṇamissitaṃ.
atk-s0511a:506_1: Ketūti ketuno apacitikātabbaṭṭhena ketu viyāti ketu.
atk-s0511a:506_2: Dhajoti indadhajo samussayaṭṭhena dassanīyaṭṭhena ca tuvaṃ dhajo viyāti dhajoti.
atk-s0511a:506_3: Atha vā yathā hi loke yassa kassaci dhajaṃ disvāva –
atk-s0511a:506_5: evameva bhagavā paññānibbānādhigamāya bhagavantaṃ disvāva nibbānādhigamo paññāyati.
atk-s0511a:506_8: Kūṭadantasutte vuttānaṃ dānādiāsavakkhayañāṇapariyosānānaṃ sabbayāgānaṃ yajanatthāya samussito yūpo tuvanti attho.
atk-s0511a:506_10: Patiṭṭhāti yathā mahāpathavī sabbapāṇīnaṃ ādhārabhāvena patiṭṭhā nissayabhūtā,
atk-s0511a:506_13: Yathā caturaṅge tamasi vattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ āropito padīpo rūpasandassano hoti.
atk-s0511a:506_14: Evaṃ avijjandhakāre vattamānānaṃ sattānaṃ paramatthasandassano padīpo tuvanti attho.
atk-s0511a:506_15: Atha vā mahāsamudde bhinnanāvānaṃ sattānaṃ samuddadīpo yathā patiṭṭhā hoti,
atk-s0511a:506_16: evaṃ tuvampi saṃsārasāgare alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhe osīdantānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ dīpo viyāti dīpoti attho.
atk-s0511a:507_1: ettha pana niddhāraṇalakkhaṇassa abhāvato chaṭṭhīsamāsassa paṭisedho natthi,
atk-s0511a:507_3: Sammāsambuddho pana apadānaṃ dvipadānaṃ catuppadānaṃ bahuppadānaṃ rūpīnaṃ arūpīnaṃ saññīnaṃ asaññīnaṃ nevasaññīnāsaññīnaṃ uttamova.
atk-s0511a:507_6: Imasmiñhi loke seṭṭho nāma uppajjamāno apadacatuppadabahuppadesupi nuppajjati.
atk-s0511a:507_10: Manussesu uppajjamāno tisahassimahāsahassilokadhātu vase kattuṃ samattho buddho hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0511a:507_11: Devesu uppajjamāno dasasahassilokadhātu vasavattī mahābrahmā hutvā nibbattati.
atk-s0511a:507_12: So tassa kappiyakārako vā ārāmiko vā sampajjati.
atk-s0511a:508_6: Aho acchariyanti ettha andhassa pabbatārohanaṃ viya niccaṃ na hotīti acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0511a:508_8: idaṃ vimhaya”nti accharaṃ paharituṃ yuttanti attho.
atk-s0511a:508_12: Na medisaṃ bhūtapubbanti na mayā īdisaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ,
atk-s0511a:509_2: Devatāti idaṃ pana vacanaṃ devānampi devadhītānampi sādhāraṇavacananti veditabbaṃ.

atk-s0511a:511_4: Abbhuto vata noti acchariyo vata nu.

atk-s0511a:533_7: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha paṭalatthe dissati.

atk-s0511a:541_7: Sabbanti sabbampi taṃ vuttappakāraṃ sakkāravisesaṃ tuvaṃ arahasi yuttoti attho.

atk-s0511a:541_9: Yeti ye pana loke vandanaṃ arahanti.

atk-s0511a:542_0: Atha bhagavati yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ dassetvā ratanacaṅkamaṃ māpetvā tatra caṅkamamāne āyasmā sāriputto rājagahe
atk-s0511a:542_2: Atha thero bhagavantaṃ olokento addasa kapilapure ākāse ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:546_0: Tattha sāriputtoti rūpasāriyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā puttoti sāriputto.
atk-s0511a:546_1: Mahāpaññoti mahatiyā soḷasavidhāya paññāya samannāgatoti mahāpañño.
atk-s0511a:546_2: Samādhijjhānakovidoti ettha samādhīti cittaṃ samaṃ ādahati ārammaṇe ṭhapetīti samādhi.
atk-s0511a:546_3: So tividho hoti savitakkasavicāro avitakkavicāramatto avitakkaavicāro samādhīti.
atk-s0511a:546_4: Jhānanti paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ tatiyajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānanti imehi paṭhamajjhānādīhi mettājhānādīnipi saṅgahitāneva honti,
atk-s0511a:546_7: Paṭhamajjhānādikaṃ pana ārammaṇūpanijjhānato paccanīkajhāpanato vā jhānanti vuccati.
atk-s0511a:546_8: Samādhīsu ca jhānesu ca kovidoti samādhijjhānakovido,
atk-s0511a:546_10: Gijjhakūṭeti evaṃnāmake pabbate ṭhitoyeva passatīti passi.
atk-s0511a:547_2: sālarājaṃ viya sīlamūlaṃ samādhikkhandhaṃ paññāsākhaṃ abhiññāpupphaṃ vimuttiphalaṃ dasabalasālarājaṃ
atk-s0511a:547_4: Candaṃva gagane yathāti abbhāhimadhūmarajorāhupasaggavinimuttaṃ tāragaṇaparivutaṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:547_8: Majjhanhikeva sūriyanti majjhanhikasamaye siriyā paṭutarakiraṇamālinaṃ aṃsumālinamiva virocamānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:548_2: saradasamayaṃ paripuṇṇacandasassirikacāruvadanasobhaṃ lakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatavarasarīraṃ paramāya buddhasiriyā virocamānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:548_6: Sūriyassa taruṇabhāvo pana udayaṃ paṭicca vuccati.
atk-s0511a:548_7: Na hi candassa viya hānivuddhiyo atthi.
atk-s0511a:548_9: Dhīraṃ passati lokanāyakanti sabbalokekadhīraṃ passati nāyakanti attho.
atk-s0511a:549_1: paramaruciracittakūṭe gijjhakūṭe pabbate ṭhatvāva dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi āgatehi devabrahmagaṇehi
atk-s0511a:549_2: parivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ anuttarāya buddhasiriyā anopamāya buddhalīḷāya sabbaratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a:549_3: “handāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā buddhaguṇaparidīpanaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ yāceyya”nti cintetvā attanā
atk-s0511a:553_2: Katakiccānanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena pariniṭṭhitasoḷasakiccānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:554_0: Idāni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāte gamane ca kāraṇaṃ dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:557_0: Amhepi tattha gantvāna, vandissāma mayaṃ jinaṃ.
atk-s0511a:560_0: Kaṅkhaṃ vinodayissāma, passitvā lokanāyaka”nti. – imā gāthāyo vuttā;
atk-s0511a:561_0: Tattha lokappasādanaṃ nāmāti lokassa pasādakaraṇato lokappasādanaṃ pāṭihīraṃ vuccati.
atk-s0511a:561_3: Taṃ pana uddhaṃ akaniṭṭhabhavanato heṭṭhā yāva avīci etthantare ekālokaṃ katvā etthantare sabbesampi
atk-s0511a:561_9: Vandissāmāti mayaṃ bhagavato pāde sirasā vandissāma.
atk-s0511a:561_11: mayanti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ saddānaṃ purimassa gamanakiriyāya sambandho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0511a:562_2: khīṇāsavānaṃ pana kaṅkhā nāma kācipi natthi,

atk-s0511a:565_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū therassa vacanaṃ sutvā attano attano pattacīvaramādāya suvammitā viya mahānāgā pabhinnakilesā
atk-s0511a:569_6: bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
atk-s0511a:572_2: Tasmā sādhu suṭṭhūti therassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:573_1: Idāni dhammasenāpatissa pavattiṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi “khīṇāsavehi vimalehī”tiādigāthāyo vuttā tattha dantehīti kāyena ca cittena ca dantehi.
atk-s0511a:573_5: Mahāgaṇīti sīlādīhi ca saṅkhyāvasena ca mahanto gaṇo assa atthīti mahāgaṇī,
atk-s0511a:573_6: nānāpadavasena vā sīlādīhi guṇehi mahanto gaṇoti mahāgaṇo,
atk-s0511a:573_8: Laḷanto devova gaganeti iddhivilāsena vilāsento devo viya gaganatale bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamīti attho.
atk-s0511a:574_1: Idāni “te itthambhūtā upasaṅkamiṃsū”ti upasaṅkamavidhānadassanatthaṃ “ukkāsitañca khipita”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
atk-s0511a:575_1: Sayambhunti sayameva aññāpadesaṃ vinā pāramiyo pūretvā adhigatabuddhabhāvanti attho.
atk-s0511a:575_4: nabhe jalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ gagane candaṃ viya passantīti evaṃ padasambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:576_2: Yadi ciraṭṭhitikā acirappabhā assa tādisanti attho.

atk-s0511a:578_1: Atha te bhikkhū dhammasenāpatippamukhā añjaliṃ sirasi katvā dasabalassa cakkālaṅkatatalesu pādesu nipatiṃsūti attho.
atk-s0511a:578_7: Cakkalakkhaṇeti cakkaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ yasmiṃ pāde so pādo cakkalakkhaṇo,
atk-s0511a:579_1: Idāni tesaṃ kesañci therānaṃ nāmaṃ dassentehi “sāriputto mahāpañño,
atk-s0511a:580_2: Kālamegho vāti nīlasaliladharo viya gajjitā iddhivisayeti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a:581_1: Mahākassapopi cāti uruvelakassapanadīkassapagayākassapakumārakassape khuddānukhuddake there upādāya ayaṃ mahā,
atk-s0511a:581_5: Dhutaguṇeti ettha kilesadhunanato dhammo dhuto nāma,
atk-s0511a:581_12: idamaṭṭhikatāti ime dhutaṅgacetanāya parivārabhūtā pañca dhammā “appicchaṃyeva nissāyā”tiādivacanato dhutadhammā nāma.
atk-s0511a:581_13: Atha vā kilese dhunanato ñāṇaṃ dhutaṃ nāma,
atk-s0511a:581_18: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhutavādānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākassapo”ti ṭhānantare ṭhapitoti attho.
atk-s0511a:581_24: āvarāmi dāraṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ nigaṇṭhīna”ntiādīsu ādimhi dissati.
atk-s0511a:581_29: vihāraggena vā pariveṇaggena vā bhājetu”ntiādīsu koṭṭhāse. “Yāvatā,
atk-s0511a:581_35: Thero attano ṭhāne seṭṭho ceva koṭibhūto ca.
atk-s0511a:581_42: candūpamo kulāni upasaṅkamati apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavako kulesu appagabbho”ti evamādīhi anekehi suttanayehi vaṇṇito pasattho,
atk-s0511a:582_1: Dibbacakkhūnanti dibbaṃ cakkhu yesaṃ atthi te dibbacakkhū,
atk-s0511a:582_2: tesaṃ dibbacakkhūnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aggo seṭṭhoti attho. Yathāha –
atk-s0511a:582_5: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ yadidaṃ anuruddho”ti.
atk-s0511a:582_6: Anuruddhatthero bhagavato cūḷapituno amitodanassa nāma sakkassa putto mahānāmassa kaniṭṭhabhātā mahāpuñño paramasukhumālo,
atk-s0511a:582_7: so attasattamo nikkhamitvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
atk-s0511a:583_15: Thero kira tathāgatasseva santike vinayapiṭakaṃ uggaṇhitvā bhārukacchakavatthuṃ,
atk-s0511a:583_17: kumārakassapavatthunti imāni tīṇi vatthūni sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā kathesi.
atk-s0511a:583_18: Tasmā thero vinayadharānaṃ aggoti evamādinā nayena satthārā vaṇṇitoti vutto.
atk-s0511a:584_6: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ yadidaṃ puṇṇo mantāṇiputto”ti etadaggapāḷiyaṃ āropito.
atk-s0511a:584_9: Therassa kira santike pabbajitā kulaputtā pañcasatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:584_10: Sabbepi te dasabalassa jātabhūmikā jātaraṭṭhavāsino sabbeva khīṇāsavā sabbeva dasakathāvatthulābhino.
atk-s0511a:584_12: Isīti esati gavesati kusale dhammeti isi.
atk-s0511a:584_13: Mantāṇiyā puttoti mantāṇiyā nāma brāhmaṇiyā putto.
atk-s0511a:585_0: Aññāsikoṇḍaññatthero pana satthari abhisambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakke anupubbena āgantvā rājagahaṃ
atk-s0511a:585_1: upanissāya viharante kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā attano bhāgineyyaṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ pabbājetvā bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:585_2: vanditvā āpucchitvā nivāsatthāya sayaṃ chaddantadahaṃ gato.
atk-s0511a:585_3: Puṇṇo pana bhagavantaṃ dassanāya therena saddhiṃ āgantvā –
atk-s0511a:585_4: “mayhaṃ pabbajitakiccaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvāva dasabalassa santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti kapilapureyeva ohīno,
atk-s0511a:585_5: so yonisomanasikāraṃ karonto nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0511a:585_6: Ettha pana anuruddhatthero ca upālitthero ca ime dve therā bhagavato kapilavatthupuraṃ pavisitvā ñātisamāgamadivase pabbajitā viya dassitā,
atk-s0511a:585_7: taṃ pana khandhakapāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāya ca na sameti.
atk-s0511a:586_0: Atha satthā sāriputtattherādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ cittācāramaññāya attano guṇe kathetumārabhi.
atk-s0511a:590_0: Tattha opammakusaloti upamāya kusalo. Kaṅkhacchedoti sabbasattānaṃ saṃsayacchedako.
atk-s0511a:591_0: Idāni te attano guṇe kathesi, te dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a:593_0: “Cattāro te asaṅkhyeyyā, koṭi yesaṃ na nāyati;
atk-s0511a:595_0: Buddhañāṇaṃ appameyyaṃ, na sakkā ete vijānitu”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:596_7: Idāni te vuttappakāre cattāro asaṅkhyeyye dassetuṃ “sattakāyo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:596_13: Na sakkā ete vijānitunti yasmā panete anantā,
atk-s0511a:597_1: Idāni satthā attano iddhivikubbane sañjātacchariyabbhutānaṃ devamanussādīnaṃ kinnāmetaṃ acchariyaṃ,
atk-s0511a:599_0: Aññe bahū acchariyā, abbhutā lomahaṃsanā”ti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a:600_0: Tattha kinti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ.Etanti idaṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0511a:600_3: aññaṃ taṃ pucchāma tadiṅgha brūhī”tiādīsu upayogavacane dissati.
atk-s0511a:600_7: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā”ti ettha kāraṇavacane.
atk-s0511a:600_8: “Yaṃ vipassī bhagavā kappe udapādī”ti ettha bhumme.
atk-s0511a:600_10: devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sammukhā sutaṃ sammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ,
atk-s0511a:600_13: Aññe bahū mama acchariyā abbhutavisesā santīti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a:604_0: Dasasahassī samāgamma, yācanti pañjalī mama”nti. – ādimāha;
atk-s0511a:605_3: Yadā panāhaṃ samattiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāge pariccajitvā ñātatthacariyalokatthacariyabuddhatthacariyānaṃ
atk-s0511a:605_4: koṭiṃ patvā sattasatakamahādānāni datvā sattakkhattuṃ pathaviṃ kampetvā vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā
atk-s0511a:605_5: dutiye cittavāre tusitabhavane nibbatto tadāpi santusito nāma devarājā ahosiṃ.
atk-s0511a:605_6: Dasasahassī samāgammāti dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:605_8: tayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena na sakkasampattiṃ na māra na brahma na cakkavattisampattiṃ patthentena pūritā,
atk-s0511a:609_5: Tārayantoti ettha pāramiyo pūrentopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a:609_7: vessantarattabhāvato cavitvā tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikāni sattapaṇṇāsavassakoṭiyo tattha tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a:609_8: devatāhi yācito pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā mahāmāyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi dasamāse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a:609_9: ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi tārayati nāma.
atk-s0511a:609_10: Rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ āruyha nikkhamantopi tīṇi rajjāni atikkamitvā anomāya nāma nadiyā tīre pabbajantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a:609_11: chabbassāni padhānaṃ karontopi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0511a:609_12: pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā pacchimayāme dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
atk-s0511a:609_13: anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi tārayati nāma,
atk-s0511a:611_0: Atha mahāsatto devatāhi yāciyamānopi devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ adatvāva kāladīpadesakulajanettiāyuparicchedavasena pañcavidhaṃ mahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi.
atk-s0511a:611_3: Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a:611_5: buddhānañca dhammadesanā nāma tilakkhaṇamuttā nāma natthi,
atk-s0511a:611_6: tesaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti kathentānaṃ “kinnāmete kathentī”ti na saddahanti,
atk-s0511a:611_10: Vassasatato ūno āyukālopi kālo na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0511a:611_12: ussannakilesānañca dinno ovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a:611_14: Vassasatasahassato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma.
atk-s0511a:611_15: Idāni vassasatāyukā manussāti atha bodhisatto “nibbattitabbakālo”ti addasa.
atk-s0511a:612_0: Tato dīpaṃ olokento “jambudīpeyeva buddhā nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a:612_2: katarasmiṃ nu kho padese buddhā nibbattantī”ti desaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi.
atk-s0511a:612_3: Tato kulaṃ vilokento “buddhā nāma lokasammate kule nibbattanti,
atk-s0511a:612_6: suddhodano nāma me rājā pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a:612_7: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti,
atk-s0511a:612_8: akhaṇḍapañcasīlāti ayañca mahāmāyā nāma devī edisā,
atk-s0511a:612_9: ayaṃ me mātā bhavissatīti kittakaṃ assā āyū”ti āvajjento dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari sattadivasāni passi.
atk-s0511a:612_10: Iti imaṃ pañcavidhavilokanaṃ viloketvā – “kālo me, mārisa,
atk-s0511a:612_11: buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ paṭiññaṃ datvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā tato cavitvā sakyarājakule māyādeviyā kucchiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:616_3: kampitthāti sato sampajāno pana bodhisatto mātukucchiṃ okkamanto ekūnavīsatiyā paṭisandhicittesu mettāpubbabhāgassa
atk-s0511a:616_6: Tadā dasasahassīlokadhātu sakalāpi kampi saṅkampi sampakampīti attho.
atk-s0511a:616_7: Dharaṇīti dhāreti sabbe thāvarajaṅgameti dharaṇī, pathavī.
atk-s0511a:617_1: Sampajānova nikkhaminti ettha yadā panāhaṃ sato sampajānova mātukucchito dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko
atk-s0511a:617_2: viya nisseṇito otaranto puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca pāde ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena
atk-s0511a:617_7: okkamanepi mātukucchito nikkhamanepi dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:618_1: Atha bhagavā gabbhokkantiādīsu attanā samasamaṃ adisvā gabbhokkantiādīsu attano acchariyadassanatthaṃ “okkanti me samo natthī”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0511a:618_7: Jātitoti ettha jāyati etāya mātuyāti mātā “jātī”ti vuccati,
atk-s0511a:618_9: Abhinikkhameti mātukucchito abhinikkhamane pasave satīti attho.
atk-s0511a:618_10: Sambodhiyanti ettha pasatthā sundarā bodhi sambodhi.
atk-s0511a:618_14: “antarā ca gayaṃ antarā ca bodhi”nti ca āgataṭṭhāne hi rukkho bodhīti vuccati.
atk-s0511a:618_15: “Bodhi vuccati catūsu maggesu ñāṇa”nti āgataṭṭhāne maggo.
atk-s0511a:619_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā sambodhiṃ paṭicca attānaṃ pasaṃsatīti?
atk-s0511a:619_2: Bhagavato hi sambodhi sabbaguṇadāyikā sabbepi niravasese buddhaguṇe dadāti,
atk-s0511a:619_4: Aññesaṃ pana kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti,
atk-s0511a:619_11: Tasmā bhagavā sabbaguṇadāyakattā “sambodhiyaṃ ahaṃ seṭṭho”ti attānaṃ pasaṃsati.
atk-s0511a:619_12: Api ca bhūmiṃ cāletvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇi,
atk-s0511a:619_14: Dhammacakkappavattaneti ettha dhammacakkaṃ pana duvidhaṃ hoti –
atk-s0511a:620_1: Idāni bhagavato gabbhokkamaneva pathavikampanādikaṃ pavattiṃ sutvā “aho acchariyaṃ loke”ti devatāhi ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0511a:620_2: Tattha buddhānaṃ guṇamahantatāti aho buddhānaṃ guṇamahantabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:620_4: chappakāraṃ pakampathāti dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu mahāpathavī chappakāraṃ pakampittha calittha. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0511a:620_10: pariyantato unnamati majjhimato onamatīti evaṃ chappakāraṃ anilabalacalitajalataraṅgabhaṅgasaṅghaṭṭitā
atk-s0511a:620_11: viya nāvā catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā pathavisandhārakajalapariyantā acetanāpi samānā sacetanā
atk-s0511a:620_12: viya ayaṃ mahāpathavī pītiyā naccantī viya akampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:620_13: Obhāso ca mahā āsīti atikkammeva devānaṃ devānubhāvaṃ uḷāro obhāso ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:620_14: Accheraṃ lomahaṃsananti accherañca lomahaṃsanañca ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:621_1: Idāni pathavikampanālokapātubhāvādīsu acchariyesu vattamānesu bhagavato pavattidassanatthaṃ “bhagavā tamhi samaye”tiādigāthāyo vuttā.
atk-s0511a:622_1: Caṅkamantovāti dasalokadhātusahassāni ajjhottharitvā ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanamaye caṅkame caṅkamamānova kathesi.
atk-s0511a:622_2: Lokanāyakoti atha satthā manosilātale sīhanādaṃ nadanto sīho viya gajjanto pāvussakamegho viya ca ākāsagaṅgaṃ
atk-s0511a:622_3: otārento viya ca aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena savanīyena kamanīyena brahmassarena nānānayavicittaṃ catusaccapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ
atk-s0511a:623_1: catuhatthe caṅkame yathāti ettha satthārā pana nimmitassa tassa caṅkamassa ekā koṭi pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ
atk-s0511a:623_2: ekā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ evaṃ ṭhite tasmiṃ ratanacaṅkame caṅkamamāno satthā ubho koṭiyo patvāva
atk-s0511a:623_4: antarā ubho koṭiyo apatvā na nivattati.
atk-s0511a:623_5: Yathā catuhatthappamāṇe caṅkame caṅkamamāno ubho koṭiyo sīghameva patvā nivattati,
atk-s0511a:623_7: Kiṃ pana bhagavā dasasahassayojanappamāṇāyāmaṃ caṅkamaṃ rassamakāsi,
atk-s0511a:623_16: Yathā sabbe devamanussā pakatiyā caṅkamamānaṃ passanti,
atk-s0511a:623_18: Bhagavā pana caṅkamantova dhammaṃ deseti antarāsamāpattiñca samāpajjati.
atk-s0511a:624_1: varasarīraṃ saradasamaye paripuṇṇaṃ viya rajanikaraṃ sabbaphāliphullaṃ viya ca yojanasatubbedhaṃ pāricchattakaṃ
atk-s0511a:624_2: aṭṭhārasaratanubbedhaṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepasassirikaṃ varakanakagirimiva jaṅgamaṃ anopamāya buddhalīḷāya
atk-s0511a:624_3: anopamena buddhasirivilāsena caṅkamantaṃ dasasahassidevagaṇaparivutaṃ bhagavantaṃ addasa.
atk-s0511a:624_4: Disvāna ayaṃ pana sakalāpi dasasahassī lokadhātu sannipatitā,
atk-s0511a:624_7: yaṃnūnāhaṃ dasabalassa abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya buddhavaṃsaṃ paripuccheyya”nti cintetvā ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ
atk-s0511a:624_8: katvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā dasanakhasamujjalaṃ jalajāmalāvikala- kamala-
atk-s0511a:624_9: makulasadisaṃ añjaliṃ sirasi katvā bhagavantaṃ “kīdiso te mahāvīrā”tiādikaṃ paripucchi.
atk-s0511a:630_0: Kamhi kāle tayā dhīra, patthitā bodhimuttamā”ti. –
atk-s0511a:631_5: Tattha “evaṃ vutte aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0511a:631_7: orimaṃ tīraṃ kiṃ pārimaṃ tīra”nti evaṃ pucchantānaṃ bhagavatā vissajjitasuttavasena pucchānusandhi veditabbā.
atk-s0511a:632_0: “Atha kho aññatarassa bhikkhuno evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi ‘iti kira, bho,
atk-s0511a:632_7: Atha kho bhagavā tassa bhikkhuno cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya bhikkhū āmantesi –
atk-s0511a:632_10: yaṃ idhekacco moghapuriso avidvā avijjāgato taṇhādhipateyyena cetasā satthusāsanaṃ atidhāvitabbaṃ maññeyya ‘iti kira, bho,
atk-s0511a:632_19: rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā bhagavatā vuttavasena ajjhāsayānusandhi veditabbā.
atk-s0511a:633_0: Yena pana dhammena ādimhi desanā uṭṭhitā,
atk-s0511a:633_1: tassa dhammassa anurūpadhammavasena vā paṭikkhepavasena vā yesu suttesu uparidesanā āgacchati,
atk-s0511a:634_0: Tattha paññāya pāramippattoti sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patto.
atk-s0511a:634_9: dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānañca kappasatasahassopacitapuññasambhārānaṃ sesamahāsāvakānaṃ vā avisayo,
atk-s0511a:635_3: Abhinīhāroti abhinīhāro nāma buddhabhāvatthaṃ mānasaṃ bandhitvā “buddhabyākaraṇaṃ aladdhā na uṭṭhahissāmī”ti vīriyamadhiṭṭhāya nipajjanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:637_2: “buddho bodheyyaṃ mutto moceyya”ntiādinā nayena buddhabhāvāya paṇidhānaṃ kadā katanti apucchi.
atk-s0511a:644_0: Kathaṃ upapāramī puṇṇā, paramatthapāramī katha”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a:645_0: Tattha dānapāramiyaṃ tāva bāhirabhaṇḍapariccāgo pāramī nāma,
atk-s0511a:645_4: Evaṃ dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo honti.
atk-s0511a:645_5: Tattha bodhisattassa dānapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a:647_0: Dānena me samo natthi, esā me dānapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:648_0: Evaṃ paraṃ jīvitapariccāgaṃ karontassa dānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:649_0: Tathā sīlapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekanteneva panassa saṅkhapālajātake –
atk-s0511a:651_0: Bhojaputte na kuppāmi, esā me sīlapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:652_0: Evaṃ attapariccāgaṃ karontassa sīlapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:653_0: Tathā mahārajjaṃ pahāya nekkhammapāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a:655_0: Cajato na hoti lagganaṃ, esā me nekkhammapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:656_0: Evaṃ nissaṅgatāya rajjaṃ chaḍḍetvā nikkhamantassa nekkhammapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:657_0: Tathā mahosadhapaṇḍitakālādīsu paññāpāramiyā pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0511a:659_0: Paññāya me samo natthi, esā me paññāpāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:660_0: Antobhastagataṃ sappaṃ dassentassa paññāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:661_0: Tathā vīriyapāramitāya pūritattabhāvānaṃ parimāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Ekantena panassa mahājanakajātake –
atk-s0511a:663_0: Cittassa aññathā natthi, esā me vīriyapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:664_0: Evaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ tarantassa vīriyapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:667_0: Kāsirāje na kuppāmi, esā me khantipāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:668_0: Evaṃ acetanabhāvena viya mahādukkhaṃ adhivāsentassa khantipāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:671_0: Mocesiṃ ekasataṃ khattiye, esā me saccapāramī”ti. –
atk-s0511a:672_0: Evaṃ jīvitaṃ cajitvā saccaṃ anurakkhantassa saccapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:674_0: “Mātā pitā na me dessā, attā me na ca dessiyo;
atk-s0511a:675_0: Sabbaññutaṃ piyaṃ mayhaṃ, tasmā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahi”nti. –
atk-s0511a:676_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi pariccajitvā vataṃ adhiṭṭhahantassa adhiṭṭhānapāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:678_0: “Na maṃ koci uttasati, napi bhāyāmi kassaci;
atk-s0511a:680_0: Evaṃ jīvitampi anoloketvā mettāyantassa mettāpāramī paramatthapāramī nāma jātā.
atk-s0511a:684_0: Evaṃ gāmadārakesu niṭṭhubhanādīhi ceva mālāgandhūpahārādīhi ca sukhadukkhaṃ uppādentesupi upekkhaṃ anativattantassa
atk-s0511a:685_0: Idāni therena puṭṭhassa bhagavato byākaraṇaṃ dassentehi saṅgītikārakehi –
atk-s0511a:691_0: Pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā, pakāsayī lokahitaṃ sadevake”ti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:692_0: Tattha tassa puṭṭho viyākāsīti tena dhammasenāpatinā puṭṭho hutvā tassa byākāsi,
atk-s0511a:692_1: attano abhinīhārato paṭṭhāya abhisambodhipariyosānaṃ sabbaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesīti attho.
atk-s0511a:692_2: Karavīkamadhuragiroti karavīkasakuṇassa viya madhurā girā yassa so karavīkamadhuragiro,
atk-s0511a:692_5: karavīkasakuṇā kira madhurarasaṃ ambapakkaṃ mukhatuṇḍakena paharitvā paggharitaṃ phalarasaṃ pivitvā pakkhena
atk-s0511a:692_6: tāḷaṃ datvā vikūjamāne catuppadā madamattā viya laḷituṃ ārabhanti,
atk-s0511a:692_7: gocarapasutāpi catuppadagaṇā mukhagatānipi tiṇāni chaḍḍetvā taṃ nādaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0511a:692_8: vāḷamigā khuddakamige anubandhamānā ukkhittaṃ pādaṃ anikkhipitvā cittakatā viya tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0511a:692_10: ākāse pakkhandantā pakkhinopi pakkhe pasāretvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0511a:692_11: udake macchāpi kaṇṇapaṭalaṃ acālentā taṃ saddaṃ suṇamānā tiṭṭhanti.
atk-s0511a:692_13: Nibbāpayanto hadayanti kilesaggisantattasabbajanamānasaṃ dhammakathāmatadhārāya sītibhāvaṃ janayantoti attho.
atk-s0511a:693_1: Amhākaṃ bhagavato abhinīhārassa purato pana taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā ekasmiṃ kappe nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:693_2: Tesaṃ aparabhāge koṇḍaññādayo tevīsati buddhāti sabbe dīpaṅkarādayo catuvīsati buddhā idha “atītabuddhā”ti adhippetā,
atk-s0511a:693_8: Buddhaparamparāgatanti dīpaṅkaradasabalato paṭṭhāya yāva kassapaparamparato āgataṃ desitaṃ nikīlitaṃ vāti attho.
atk-s0511a:693_9: Pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyāti ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ vibhattaṃ pubbe nivuṭṭhakkhandhasantānasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0511a:693_10: pubbenivāsaṃ anugatā upagatā tāya pubbenivāsānugatāya buddhiyā,
atk-s0511a:694_1: Atha bhagavā karuṇāsītalena hadayena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ savane niyojento “pītipāmojjajanana”ntiādimāha.
atk-s0511a:694_2: Tattha pītipāmojjajanananti pītipāmojjakaraṃ pītiyā pubbabhāgaṃ pāmojjaṃ,
atk-s0511a:694_5: Sabbasampattipaṭilābhanti sabbāpi devamanussasampattiādayo sampattiyo paṭilabhanti etenāti sabbasampattipaṭilābho,
atk-s0511a:695_2: Sokanudanti soko nāma ñātibyasanādīhi phuṭṭhassa cittasantāpo.
atk-s0511a:696_13: na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇitaṃ yāva dukkhā nirayā”tiādīsu dukkhaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0511a:696_14: Idha panāyaṃ dukkhavatthusmiṃ dukkhapaccayepi ca daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:696_17: kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggoti buddhavaṃsadesanā vuccati,
atk-s0511a:696_23: Atha vā pītipāmojjajananaṃ sokasallavinodanaṃ sabbasampattipaṭilābhahetubhūtaṃ imaṃ buddhavaṃsadesanaṃ
atk-s0511a:696_24: sutvā idāni madanimmadanādiguṇavisesāvahaṃ sabbadukkhakkhayaṃ buddhabhāvamaggaṃ paṭipajjathāti sabbesaṃ
atk-s0511a:705_1: Sā panesā buddhavaṃsavaṇṇanā yasmā suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvā vuccamānā pākaṭā hoti,
atk-s0511a:705_3: Cattāro hi suttanikkhepā attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayo pucchāvasiko aṭṭhuppattikoti.
atk-s0511a:705_4: Tattha yāni suttāni bhagavā parehi anajjhiṭṭho kevalaṃ attano ajjhāsayena kathesi.
atk-s0511a:706_0: Yāni vā pana “paripakkā kho rāhulassa vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā,
atk-s0511a:706_1: yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyya”nti evaṃ paresaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ khantiṃ manaṃ bujjhanakabhāvañca oloketvā parajjhāsayavasena kathitāni.
atk-s0511a:707_0: Bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā te te devamanussā pañhaṃ pucchanti.
atk-s0511a:707_1: Evaṃ puṭṭhena pana bhagavatā yāni kathitāni devatāsaṃyutta bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttādīni tesaṃ pucchāvasiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0511a:708_0: Yāni vā pana uppannaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca desitāni dhammadāyāda-
atk-s0511a:708_3: Evametesu catūsu suttanikkhepesu imassa buddhavaṃsassa pucchāvasiko nikkhepo.
atk-s0511a:713_0: Tattha kappe ca satasahasseti ettha kappa-
atk-s0511a:713_3: Yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”tiādīsu abhisaddahane dissati.
atk-s0511a:713_6: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāre.
atk-s0511a:713_10: tayā kataṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassā”ti ca evamādīsu paññattiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:713_21: mayaṃ sāvakena saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimhā”ti ettha paṭibhāge.
atk-s0511a:713_25: Tasmā kappe ca satasahasseti mahākappānaṃ satasahassānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:713_26: Caturo ca asaṅkhiyeti “catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake”ti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:713_28: Amaraṃ nāma nagaranti “amara”nti ca “amaravatī”ti ca laddhanāmaṃ nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:713_29: Keci panettha aññenāpi pakārena vaṇṇayanti, kiṃ tehi,
atk-s0511a:713_37: ca samiddhattā devamanussādīnaṃ mano ramayatīti manoramaṃ.
atk-s0511a:714_0: Dasahi saddehi avivittanti hatthisaddena assasaddena rathasaddena bherisaddena saṅkhasaddena mudiṅgasaddena
atk-s0511a:714_1: vīṇāsaddena gītasaddena sammatāḷasaddena “bhuñjatha pivatha khādathā”ti dasamena saddenāti;
atk-s0511a:714_4: Annapānasamāyutanti annena catubbidhenāhārena ca pānena ca suṭṭhu āyutaṃ annapānasamāyutaṃ,
atk-s0511a:715_0: Idāni te dasa sadde vatthuto dassanatthaṃ –
atk-s0511a:717_0: Khādatha pivatha ceva, annapānena ghosita”nti. – vuttaṃ;
atk-s0511a:718_3: Bherisaṅkharathāni cāti bherisaddena ca saṅkhasaddena ca rathasaddena cāti attho.
atk-s0511a:718_5: ‘khādatha pivathā’ti evamādinayappavattena annapānapaṭisaṃyuttena ghositaṃ abhināditanti attho. Etthāha –
atk-s0511a:718_8: Na ekadeso sakalo dasavidho dassitova. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0511a:719_0: Evaṃ ekena pariyāyena nagarasampattiṃ vaṇṇetvā puna tameva dassetuṃ –
atk-s0511a:723_8: Devanagaraṃ vāti devanagaraṃ viya ālakamandā viya amaravatī samiddhanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0511a:723_9: Āvāsaṃ puññakamminanti āvasanti ettha puññakammino janāti āvāso.
atk-s0511a:723_14: Sabbakusalamalarajāpavāhakattā puññaṃ kammaṃ yesaṃ atthi te puññakammino,
atk-s0511a:724_0: Tattha sumedho nāma brāhmaṇo paṭivasati ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca,
atk-s0511a:724_1: saṃsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādena,
atk-s0511a:724_2: abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato,
atk-s0511a:724_3: so tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṃ sākkharappabhedānaṃ itihāsapañcamānaṃ padako veyyākaraṇo anavayo lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu.
atk-s0511a:724_5: Athassa rāsivaḍḍhako amacco āyapotthakaṃ āharitvā suvaṇṇarajatamaṇimuttādivividharatanabharite gabbhe vivaritvā –
atk-s0511a:724_9: etthakaṃ ayyakapayyakāna”nti yāva sattamā kulaparivaṭṭā dhanaṃ ācikkhitvā –
atk-s0511a:724_11: So “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā puññāni karonto agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a:730_0: Lakkhaṇe itihāse ca, sadhamme pāramiṃ gato”ti.
atk-s0511a:731_2: Sā tassa sundarā pasatthāti sumedhoti paññāyittha.
atk-s0511a:732_5: ‘ajjhāyakā ajjhāyakā’ tveva tatiyaṃ akkharaṃ upanibbatta”nti evaṃ paṭhamakappikakāle jhānavirahitānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ garahavacanaṃ uppannaṃ.
atk-s0511a:732_7: mante parivattetīti iminā atthena pasaṃsavacanaṃ katvā voharanti.
atk-s0511a:732_18: Pāragūti tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ oṭṭhapahatakaraṇamattena pāraṃ gatoti pāragū.
atk-s0511a:733_0: Athekadivasaṃ so dasaguṇagaṇārādhitapaṇḍito sumedhapaṇḍito uparipāsādavaratale rahogato hutvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno cintesi –
atk-s0511a:733_7: evaṃbhūtena mayā ajātiṃ ajaraṃ abyādhiṃ amaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ sivaṃ nibbānaṃ pariyesituṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0511a:733_8: avassaṃ bhavacārakato muccitvā nibbānagāminā ekena maggena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0511a:736_0: Dukkho punabbhavo nāma, sarīrassa ca bhedanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:744_0: “Atthi hehiti so maggo, na so sakkā na hetuye;
atk-s0511a:746_0: Ettha pana gāthāsambandhañca anuttānapadānamatthañca vatvāva gamissāma.
atk-s0511a:746_6: “Evaṃ cintesaha”nti bhagavā iminā attanā saddhiṃ sumedhapaṇḍitaṃ ekattaṃ karoti.
atk-s0511a:746_7: Tasmā tadā so sumedho ahamevāti pakāsento “evaṃ cintesahaṃ tadā”ti bhagavā uttamapurisavasenāha.
atk-s0511a:747_10: Na so sakkā na hetuyeti tena maggena na sakkā na bhavituṃ.
atk-s0511a:747_11: So pana maggo hetuyeti hetubhāvāya na na hoti,
atk-s0511a:748_1: Yathā hi loke dukkhassa paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ sukhaṃ nāma atthi,
atk-s0511a:748_2: evaṃ bhave sati tappaṭipakkhena vibhavenāpi bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a:748_3: yathā ca uṇhe sati tassa vūpasamabhūtaṃ sītalampi atthi,
atk-s0511a:748_5: Yathā ca pāpassa lāmakassa dhammassa paṭipakkhabhūto kalyāṇo anavajjadhammopi atthiyeva,
atk-s0511a:748_6: evameva pāpikāya jātiyā sati sabbajātikhepanato ajātisaṅkhātena nibbānenāpi bhavitabbamevāti.
atk-s0511a:758_6: Tividhaggi vijjanteti tividhe rāgādike aggimhi vijjamāneti attho.
atk-s0511a:758_7: Nibbānanti tassa tividhassa rāgādiaggissa nibbāpanaṃ upasamanaṃ nibbānañca icchitabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:759_1: “yathā nāma gūtharāsimhi nimuggena purisena dūratova kamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ vimalasalilaṃ taḷākaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a:759_2: ‘katarena nu kho maggena tattha gantabba’nti taḷākaṃ gavesituṃ yuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:759_6: Evameva kilesamaladhovane amatamahātaḷāke vijjamāne yaṃ tassa agavesanaṃ,
atk-s0511a:759_9: Yathā pana corehi saṃparivārito puriso palāyanamagge vijjamānepi sace so na palāyati,
atk-s0511a:759_12: Evameva kilesacorehi parivāretvā gahitassa purisassa vijjamāneyeva nibbānamahānagaragāmimhi sive mahāmagge
atk-s0511a:759_13: tassa maggassa agavesanaṃ nāma na maggassa doso,
atk-s0511a:759_15: Yathā byādhipīḷito puriso vijjamāne byādhitikicchake vejje sace taṃ vejjaṃ gavesitvā taṃ byādhiṃ na tikicchāpeti,
atk-s0511a:759_18: Evameva pana yo kilesabyādhiparipīḷito kilesavūpasamamaggakovidaṃ vijjamānameva ācariyaṃ na gavesati,
atk-s0511a:762_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso taḷākassa so.
atk-s0511a:765_0: Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe.
atk-s0511a:768_0: Na palāyati so puriso, na doso añjasassa so.
atk-s0511a:771_0: Na gavesati taṃ maggaṃ, na doso sivamañjase.
atk-s0511a:774_0: Na tikicchāpeti taṃ byādhiṃ, na doso so tikicchake.
atk-s0511a:777_0: Na gavesati taṃ ācariyaṃ, na doso so vināyake”ti.
atk-s0511a:778_12: So purisoti so corehi pariruddho puriso.
atk-s0511a:780_0: Nāvā uttarasetu ca, kullo ca bhisi saṅkamo”ti. –
atk-s0511a:781_6: Na doso so tikicchaketi tikicchakassa doso natthi,
atk-s0511a:782_0: Evaṃ panāhaṃ cintetvā uttarimpi evaṃ cintesiṃ –
atk-s0511a:782_1: “yathāpi maṇḍanakajātiko puriso kaṇṭhe āsattaṃ kuṇapaṃ chaḍḍetvā sukhī gaccheyya,
atk-s0511a:782_2: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhena nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisitabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:782_3: Yathā ca naranāriyo ukkārabhūmiyaṃ uccārapassāvaṃ katvā na taṃ ucchaṅgena vā ādāya dasante vā veṭhetvā ādāya gacchanti,
atk-s0511a:782_4: atha kho jigucchamānā oloketumpi anicchantā anapekkhā chaḍḍetvā gacchanti,
atk-s0511a:782_5: evaṃ mayāpi imaṃ pūtikāyaṃ anapekkhena chaḍḍetvā amataṃ nibbānanagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0511a:782_6: Yathā ca nāvikā nāma jajjaraṃ nāvaṃ udakagāhiniṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkhāva gacchanti,
atk-s0511a:782_7: evamahampi imaṃ navahi vaṇamukhehi paggharantaṃ kāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā anapekkho nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisissāmi.
atk-s0511a:782_8: Yathā ca koci puriso muttāmaṇiveḷuriyādīni nānāvidhāni ratanāni ādāya corehi saddhiṃ maggaṃ gacchanto
atk-s0511a:782_9: attano ratanavināsabhayena te core chaḍḍetvā khemaṃ maggaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0511a:782_13: tasmā mayā imaṃ mahācorasadisaṃ karajakāyaṃ chaḍḍetvā nibbānamahānagaraṃ pavisituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:794_0: Chaḍḍayitvāna gacchissaṃ, vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭiṃ.
atk-s0511a:807_0: Tattha yathāpi kuṇapaṃ purisoti yathāpi daharo yuvā maṇḍanakajātiko puriso ahikuṇapena vā kukkurakuṇapena
atk-s0511a:807_1: vā manussakuṇapena vā kaṇṭhe āsattena aṭṭīyitvā harāyitvā jigucchitvā taṃ kuṇapaṃ mocetvā gaccheyya.
atk-s0511a:808_0: Uccāraṭṭhānamhīti uccārenti vaccaṃ karonti etthāti uccāro,
atk-s0511a:808_1: uccāro ca so ṭhānaṃ ceti uccāraṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0511a:808_7: Vaccaṃ katvā yathā kuṭinti vaccaṃ katvā kuṭiṃ naranāriyo viyāti attho.
atk-s0511a:809_5: Navacchiddanti cakkhusotādīhi navahi vaṇamukhehi chiddāvacchiddehi yuttattā navacchiddaṃ.
atk-s0511a:810_1: Bhaṇḍacchedabhayaṃ disvāti bhaṇḍassa acchindanena bhayaṃ disvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:810_2: Evamevāti so bhaṇḍamādāya gacchanto puriso viya.
atk-s0511a:810_3: Ayaṃ kāyoti ayaṃ pana kucchitānaṃ paramajegucchānaṃ āyoti kāyo.
atk-s0511a:810_8: Mahācorasamo viyāti cakkhuādīhi rūpādīsu piyarūpesu sārajjanādivasena pāṇātipātādinnādānādicoro hutvā sabbakusalaṃ vilumpatīti mahācorasamo.
atk-s0511a:810_9: Tasmā yathā so ratanabhaṇḍamādāya corehi saddhiṃ gacchanto puriso te core pahāya gacchati,
atk-s0511a:810_10: evamevāhampi imaṃ mahācorasamaṃ kāyaṃ pahāya attano sotthibhāvakaraṃ maggaṃ gavesituṃ gamissāmīti atthasambandho veditabbo.
atk-s0511a:811_0: Athevaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito nānāvidhāhi upamāhi nekkhammakāraṇaṃ cintetvā punapi cintesi –
atk-s0511a:811_1: “imaṃ mahādhanarāsiṃ saṃharitvā mayhaṃ pitupitāmahādayo paralokaṃ gacchantā ekakahāpaṇampi gahetvā na gatā,
atk-s0511a:811_2: mayā pana gahetvā gamanakāraṇaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi – “ahaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0511a:812_0: So ca “sādhu devā”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpetvā mahājanassa dānaṃ datvā vatthukāme ca kilesakāme ca pahāya
atk-s0511a:812_1: amaravaranagarasadisato amaranagarato nikkhamitvā ekakova nānāmigagaṇavante himavante dhammikaṃ nāma
atk-s0511a:812_2: pabbataṃ nissāya assamaṃ katvā tattha paṇṇasālaṃ katvā pañcadosavivajjitaṃ caṅkamaṃ māpetvā aṭṭhaguṇasamupetaṃ
atk-s0511a:812_3: abhiññābalaṃ samāharituṃ navadosasamannāgataṃ sāṭakaṃ pajahitvā dvādasaguṇamupāgataṃ vākacīraṃ nivāsetvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:812_4: Evaṃ pana so pabbajito aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇaṃ paṇṇasālaṃ pahāya dasaguṇasamannāgataṃ rukkhamūlaṃ upagantvā
atk-s0511a:812_5: sabbadhaññavikatiṃ pahāya pavattaphalabhojano hutvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkamanavasena padhānaṃ padahanto sattāhabbhantareyeva
atk-s0511a:812_6: aṭṭhannaṃ samāpattīnaṃ pañcannañca abhiññānaṃ lābhī ahosi.
atk-s0511a:834_2: Nāthānāthānanti sanāthānamanāthānañca aḍḍhānañceva daliddānañca “atthikā gaṇhantū”ti saha koṭṭhāgārehi datvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:834_6: Yebhuyyena pana bodhisattā isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā taṃ pabbataṃ upanissāya abhiññāyo nibbattetvā samaṇadhammaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:834_8: Assamo sukato mayhantiādinā sumedhapaṇḍitena assamapaṇṇasālā caṅkamā sahatthā māpitā viya vuttā,
atk-s0511a:834_10: kintu sakkena devena pesite vissakammunā devaputtena nimmitā.
atk-s0511a:834_11: Bhagavā pana tadā attano puññānubhāvena nibbattaṃ taṃ sampadaṃ sandhāya –
atk-s0511a:837_9: Ukkaṭṭhaparicchedena dīghato saṭṭhiratano vitthārato diyaḍḍharatano caṅkamo vutto.
atk-s0511a:837_10: Atha vā pañcadosavivajjitanti pañcahi nīvaraṇadosehi vivajjitaṃ parihīnaṃ abhiññābalamāharinti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:837_11: Aṭṭhaguṇasamupetanti “evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye
atk-s0511a:837_12: ṭhite āneñjappatte”ti evaṃ vuttehi aṭṭhaguṇehi samannāgataṃ abhiññābalaṃ āhariṃ ānesinti attho.
atk-s0511a:838_4: raṭṭhaṃ pīḷetvā dhanadhaññādīsu gaṇhantesu rājapurisesu raṭṭhapīḷanakilesābhāvo,
atk-s0511a:838_8: catūsu disāsu appaṭihatabhāvoti imehi aṭṭhahi samaṇasukhehi upetaṃ samupetaṃ assamaṃ māpesi”nti assamena sambandhaṃ katvā vadanti,
atk-s0511a:839_4: tattha vasanto attano nivatthapārutaṃ mahagghasāṭakaṃ pajahiṃ pariccajiṃ.
atk-s0511a:839_5: Sāṭakaṃ pajahanto ca tattha nava dose disvā pajahinti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a:839_6: Tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbajitānañhi sāṭakasmiṃ nava dosā pakāsitā.
atk-s0511a:839_11: kiliṭṭho ca dhovitabbo puna rajitabbo ca hoti paribhogena jīraṇabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:839_12: jiṇṇassa puna tunnakaraṇaṃ vā aggaḷadānaṃ vā kātabbaṃ hoti puna pariyesanāya durabhisambhavabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:839_17: gahetvā carantassa mahicchabhāvoti etehi navahi dosehi upagataṃ sāṭakaṃ pahāya vākacīraṃ nivāsesinti dīpeti.
atk-s0511a:839_18: Vākacīranti muñjatiṇaṃ hīrāhīraṃ katvā ganthetvā kataṃ vākamayacīraṃ nivāsanapārupanatthāya ādiyinti attho.
atk-s0511a:839_21: saddo ānisaṃsaṭṭho “sataguṇā dakkhiṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”tiādīsu viya. Ma-
atk-s0511a:839_33: vākacīre naṭṭhepi anapekkhabhāvoti imehi dvādasahi guṇehi sampannaṃ.
atk-s0511a:840_0: Atha sumedhapaṇḍito tattha paṇṇasālāyaṃ viharanto paccūsasamaye paccuṭṭhāya attano nikkhamanakāraṇaṃ paccavekkhamāno evaṃ kira cintesi –
atk-s0511a:840_4: idha pana me paṇṇasālāya vāso dutiyo gharāvāso viya hoti,
atk-s0511a:843_0: Tattha aṭṭhadosasamākiṇṇanti aṭṭhahi dosehi samākiṇṇaṃ saṃyuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:843_4: senāsanaṃ nāma mahallakassa pāpuṇātīti avelāya vuṭṭhāpiyamānassa cittekaggatā na hotīti vuṭṭhāpanīyabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:843_6: gharaṃ paviṭṭhena yaṃ kiñci pāpaṃ sakkā kātunti garahapaṭicchādanakaraṇabhāvo,
atk-s0511a:843_9: ūkāmaṅgulagharagoḷikādīnaṃ sādhāraṇatāya bahusādhāraṇabhāvoti iti ime aṭṭha ādīnave disvā mahāsatto paṇṇasālaṃ pajahiṃ.
atk-s0511a:844_0: Guṇe dasahupāgatanti channaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dasahi guṇehi upetaṃ,
atk-s0511a:844_7: tattha hi pāpaṃ karonto lajjatīti pāpakaraṇārahābhāvo,
atk-s0511a:844_12: rukkhamūlasenāsanassa gatagataṭṭhāne sulabhatāya anapekkhabhāvoti iti ime dasa guṇe disvā rukkhamūlaṃ upagatosmīti vadati. Āha ca –
atk-s0511a:853_0: Atha sumedhapaṇḍito paṇṇasālāya diṭṭhadoso hutvā rukkhamūlasenāsane laddhānisaṃso viharanto uttaripi cintesi –
atk-s0511a:853_2: nāhaṃ kenaci pārijuññena nikkhamitvā āhāratthāya pabbajito,
atk-s0511a:856_3: taṃ duvidhampi attano appicchatāya pahāya pavattaphalena yāpesiṃ.
atk-s0511a:861_0: Evaṃ pavattamāno sumedhapaṇḍito nacirasseva antosattāhe aṭṭha samāpattiyo pañca abhiññāyo ca pāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a:861_6: Nissajjaṭṭhānacaṅkameti nisajjāya ca ṭhānena ca caṅkamena ca.
atk-s0511a:862_0: Sumedhapaṇḍito pana seyyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjaṭṭhānacaṅkameheva rattindivaṃ vītināmetvā sattāhabbhantareyeva abhiññābalaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0511a:862_1: Evaṃ pana abhiññābalaṃ patvā sumedhatāpase samāpattisukhena vītināmente tadā sabbajanasaṅgahakaro mārabalabhayaṃkaro
atk-s0511a:862_2: ñāṇadīpaṅkaro dīpaṅkaro nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a:863_1: ayaṃ kira dīpaṅkaro nāma mahāsatto samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā vessantarattabhāvasadise attabhāve ṭhito
atk-s0511a:863_2: pathavikampanādīni mahādānāni datvā āyupariyosāne tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatāhi
atk-s0511a:866_0: Vutte tato so devatānaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā ca pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā tato cuto rammavatīnagare attano
atk-s0511a:866_1: yasavibhūtiyā vijitavāsudevassa naradevassa sudevassa nāma rañño kule sumedhāya deviyā kucchismiṃ āsāḷhipuṇṇamiyā
atk-s0511a:866_2: uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā mahatā parivārena parihariyamāno mahādeviyā kucchimhi maṇikūṭagato
atk-s0511a:866_3: viya kenaci asucinā amakkhito dasa māse vasitvā saliladharavivaragato saradakālacando viya tassā udarato nikkhami.

atk-s0511a:868_2: imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dvattiṃsa pāṭihāriyāni pavattanteva.

atk-s0511a:870_0: Pakampi saṅkampi tadā samantā, sahassasaṅkhyā dasalokadhātu.

atk-s0511a:882_0: Nibbāyi ghore niraye hutāso, nadīsu toyampi ca nappavatti.

atk-s0511a:892_0: Mahājane neva khudā pipāsā, pīḷesi lokaṃ kira kañci kañci.
