atk-s0511a:894_0: Kākā ulūkehi cariṃsu saddhiṃ, koṇā varāhehi akaṃsu keḷiṃ.
atk-s0511a:895_0: “Ghorāpi sappānamukhāpi sappā, kīḷiṃsu kāmaṃ nakulehi saddhiṃ;
atk-s0511a:898_0: Khujjā ahesuṃ samacārukāyā, mūgā ca vācaṃ madhuraṃ lapiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:900_0: Assā ca hesiṃsu pahaṭṭhacittā, gajjiṃsu mattā varavāraṇāpi.
atk-s0511a:903_1: devatānaṃ ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahāreneva sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggahaṇassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a:903_2: paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a:903_3: pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a:903_4: cammanaddhadundubhīnaṃ sayameva vajjanaṃ mahantiyā dhammabheriyā anusāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0511a:905_2: khagānaṃ nagādīhi pathavigamanaṃ ovādaṃ sutvā mahājanassa pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa,
atk-s0511a:905_4: devatānaṃ sakasakabhavanesveva ṭhatvā naccādīhi kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānudānassa,
atk-s0511a:906_0: Atha dīpaṅkarakumāro mahatiyā sampattiyā paricāriyamāno anukkamena bhaddaṃ yobbanaṃ patvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ
atk-s0511a:906_1: anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu devalokasiriṃ viya rajjasirimanubhavanto uyyānakīḷāya gamanasamaye anukkamena
atk-s0511a:906_2: jiṇṇabyādhimatasaṅkhāte tayo devadūte disvā sañjātasaṃvego nivattitvā sudassananagarasadisavibhavasobhaṃ
atk-s0511a:906_4: Nagaraṃ pavisitvā puna catutthavāre hatthācariyaṃ pakkosāpetvā etadavoca – “ahaṃ, tāta,
atk-s0511a:906_8: Atha vissakammo nāma devaputto bodhisattaṃ nānāvirāgavasananivāsanaṃ āmukkamuttāhārakeyūraṃ ruciranavakanakakaṭakamakuṭakuṇḍaladharaṃ
atk-s0511a:906_10: Atha dīpaṅkarakumāro devakumāro viya caturāsītiyā hatthisahassehi parivuto hatthikkhandhavaragato mahatā
atk-s0511a:906_11: balakāyena parivuto ratijananaṃ uyyānaṃ pavisitvā hatthikkhandhato oruyha taṃ uyyānamanusañcaritvā paramaruciradassane
atk-s0511a:906_12: sakahadayasītale silātale nisīditvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0511a:906_13: Taṅkhaṇaññeva suddhāvāsakhīṇāsavo mahābrahmā aṭṭha samaṇaparikkhāre ādāya mahāpurisassa cakkhupathe pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a:907_2: “samaṇaparikkhāro”ti sutvā alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ omuñcitvā pasādhanabhaṇḍāgārikassa hatthe datvā maṅgalakhaggamādāya
atk-s0511a:907_3: saddhiṃ makuṭena kese chinditvā antalikkhe ākāse ukkhipi.
atk-s0511a:907_4: Atha sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena taṃ kesamakuṭaṃ ādāya sinerumuddhani tiyojanappamāṇaṃ indanīlamaṇimayaṃ makuṭacetiyaṃ nāma akāsi.
atk-s0511a:907_5: Atha mahāpuriso devadattiyaṃ arahattadhajaṃ kāsāvaṃ paridahitvā sāṭakayugaṃ ākāse khipi.
atk-s0511a:907_6: Taṃ brahmā paṭiggahetvā brahmaloke dvādasayojanikaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ cetiyamakāsi.
atk-s0511a:907_7: Dīpaṅkarakumāraṃ pana pabbajantaṃ ekā purisakoṭi anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a:907_8: Tāya pana parisāya parivuto bodhisatto dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ acari.
atk-s0511a:907_9: Atha visākhapuṇṇamāya aññataraṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0511a:908_0: Tasmiṃ kira nagare taṃdivasaṃ devatānaṃ balikaraṇatthāya nirudakapāyāsaṃ paciṃsu.
atk-s0511a:908_1: Tassa pana mahāsattassa saparisassa piṇḍāya paviṭṭhassa manussā adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:908_2: Taṃ kira sabbesaṃ koṭisaṅkhyāyānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pariyattaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:908_3: Mahāpurisassa pana patte devatā dibbojaṃ pakkhipiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:908_4: Taṃ paribhuñjitvā tattheva sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhāya gaṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:908_5: vissajjetvā sunandena nāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā pipphalibodhirukkhamūlaṃ gantvā tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a:908_6: santharitvā navutihatthaṃ bodhikkhandhaṃ piṭṭhito katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0511a:909_0: Tato mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā rattiyā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā
atk-s0511a:909_1: pacchimayāme anulomapaṭilomavasena paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:909_2: pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ
atk-s0511a:909_3: vaḍḍhetvā aruṇodaye ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā buddhasīhanādaṃ naditvā sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:909_4: bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammadesanaṃ paṭiññāya sunandārāme dhammacakkaṃ pavattetvā koṭisatānaṃ
atk-s0511a:909_5: devamanussānaṃ dhammāmataṃ pāyetvā catuddīpikamahāmegho viya dhammavassaṃ vassento mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:910_0: Tadā kira sumedhapaṇḍito samāpattisukhena vītināmento neva pathavikampanamaddasa na tāni nimittāni.
atk-s0511a:918_6: dhammacakkappavattanesu catūsu ṭhānesu dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīni nimittānīti attho. Etthāha –
atk-s0511a:918_11: catūsu ṭhānesu pana pavattattā “caturo nimitte”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:918_13: Idāni tesaṃ catunnaṃ nimittānaṃ adassane kāraṇaṃ niddisanto “jhānaratisamappito”ti āha.
atk-s0511a:918_15: Jhānaratiyā samappitattā samaṅgībhūtattā tāni nimittāni nāddasanti attho.
atk-s0511a:919_0: Atha tasmiṃ kāle dīpaṅkaradasabalo catūhi khīṇāsavasatasahassehi parivuto anupubbena cārikaṃ caramāno
atk-s0511a:919_1: paramarammaṃ rammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a:919_2: Rammanagaravāsino “dīpaṅkaro kira dasabalo anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko anupubbena
atk-s0511a:919_3: cārikaṃ caramāno rammanagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasatī”ti sutvā sappiādīni bhesajjāni gahetvā
atk-s0511a:919_4: bhuttapātarāsā suddhuttarāsaṅgā pupphadhūpagandhahatthā yena buddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0511a:919_5: upasaṅkamitvā satthāraṃ vanditvā pupphādīhi pūjetvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā atimadhuraṃ dhammakathaṃ sutvā
atk-s0511a:919_6: svātanāya bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā dasabalaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:920_0: Te punadivase asadisamahādānaṃ sajjetvā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā vimalakomalehi nīluppalehi chādetvā catujjātigandhena
atk-s0511a:920_1: paribhaṇḍaṃ kāretvā lājapañcamāni surabhikusumāni vikiritvā maṇḍapassa catūsu koṇesu sītalamadhuravāripuṇṇā
atk-s0511a:920_2: cāṭiyo ṭhapetvā kadalipaṇṇehi pidahitvā maṇḍapopari jayasumanakusumasadisaṃ paramaruciradassanaṃ celavitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:920_3: bandhitvā suvaṇṇamaṇirajatatārakāhi racayitvā tattha gandhadāmapupphadāmapattadāmaratanadāmāni olambetvā
atk-s0511a:920_4: dhūpehi duddinaṃ katvā sakalañca taṃ rammaṃ rammanagaraṃ sammaṭṭhaṃ saphalakadaliyo ca pupphasamalaṅkate
atk-s0511a:920_5: puṇṇaghaṭe ca ṭhapāpetvā nānāvirāgā dhajapaṭākāyo ca samussāpetvā mahāvīthiyā ubhosu passesu sāṇipākārehi
atk-s0511a:920_6: parikkhipitvā dīpaṅkaradasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ alaṅkarontā udakaparibhinnaṭṭhānesu paṃsuṃ pakkhipitvā
atk-s0511a:920_7: cikkhallakampi pathaviṃ asamaṃ samaṃ katvā muttāsadisāhi vālukāhi ākiranti,
atk-s0511a:921_0: Atha tasmiṃ kāle sumedhatāpaso attano assamapadato uggantvā rammanagaravāsīnaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ uparibhāgena
atk-s0511a:921_1: ākāsena gacchanto te haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe maggaṃ sodhente ca alaṅkaronte ca disvā –
atk-s0511a:921_2: “kiṃ nu kho kāraṇa”nti cintetvā sabbesaṃ passantānaññeva ākāsato oruyha ekamante ṭhatvā te manusse pucchi –
atk-s0511a:934_0: Tattha paccantadesavisayeti majjhimadesasseva ekapasse paccantadesasaññite janapade.
atk-s0511a:934_1: Tassa āgamanaṃ magganti tena āgantabbaṃ magganti attho.
atk-s0511a:934_2: Ahaṃ tena samayenāti ahaṃ tasmiṃ samaye,
atk-s0511a:934_7: “tadā” cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ ekatthattā purimassa nikkhamanakiriyāya pacchimassa ca gamanakiriyāya saddhiṃ sambandho veditabbo,
atk-s0511a:935_1: Tuṭṭhahaṭṭhaṃ pamoditanti imāni tīṇi padāni aññamaññavevacanāni aññamaññassa atthadīpanāni.
atk-s0511a:935_11: Tattha ayaṃ mahājano tuṭṭhahaṭṭho pamoditahadayo hutvā maggaṃ sodheti,
atk-s0511a:936_0: Evaṃ tena sumedhatāpasena puṭṭhā te manussā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0511a:936_2: kiṃ na jānātha dīpaṅkaro nāma buddho anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ patvā pavattitavaradhammacakko janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0511a:936_3: caramāno anukkamena amhākaṃ nagaraṃ patvā sudassanamahāvihāre paṭivasati,
atk-s0511a:936_4: mayaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantayitvā tasseva buddhassa bhagavato āgamanamaggaṃ sodhemā”ti.
atk-s0511a:936_8: tena hi mayāpi imehi manussehi saddhiṃ dasabalassa āgamanamaggaṃ sodhetuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:936_12: ahampi tumhehi saddhiṃ buddhassa maggaṃ sodhessāmī”ti.
atk-s0511a:936_14: “ayaṃ sumedhapaṇḍito mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti jānamānā dubbisodhanaṃ udakasambhinnaṃ ativiya visamaṃ ekaṃ okāsaṃ sallakkhetvā –
atk-s0511a:936_15: “imaṃ okāsaṃ tumhe sodhetha alaṅkarotha cā”ti adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:936_16: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ uppādetvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a:936_17: “ahaṃ pana imaṃ okāsaṃ iddhiyā paramadassanīyaṃ kātuṃ pahomi,
atk-s0511a:936_18: evaṃ kate pana maṃ na paritosessati.
atk-s0511a:936_19: Ajja pana mayā kāyaveyyāvaccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti paṃsuṃ āharitvā taṃ padesaṃ pūreti.
atk-s0511a:937_0: Tassa pana tasmiṃ padese asodhite vippakateyeva rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavato kālamārocesuṃ –
atk-s0511a:937_3: Evaṃ tehi kāle ārocite dasabalo jayasumanakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ dupaṭṭacīvaraṃ timaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetvā
atk-s0511a:937_4: nivāsetvā tassupari suvaṇṇapāmaṅgena jayasumanakusumakalāpaṃ parikkhipanto viya vijjulatāsassirikaṃ kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0511a:937_5: bandhitvā kanakagirisikharamatthake lākhārasaṃ parisiñcanto viya suvaṇṇacetiyaṃ pavāḷajālena parikkhipanto
atk-s0511a:937_6: viya ca suvaṇṇagghikaṃ rattakambalena paṭimuñcanto viya ca saradasamayarajanikaraṃ rattavalāhakena paṭicchādento
atk-s0511a:937_7: viya ca lākhārasena tintakiṃsukakusumasadisavaṇṇaṃ rattavarapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ pārupitvā gandhakuṭidvārato
atk-s0511a:937_8: kañcanaguhato sīho viya nikkhamitvā gandhakuṭipamukhe aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:937_9: Atha sabbe bhikkhū attano attano pattacīvaramādāya bhagavantaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:937_10: Te pana parivāretvā ṭhitā bhikkhū evarūpā ahesuṃ –
atk-s0511a:944_0: Iti bhagavā sayaṃ vītarāgo vītarāgehi vītadoso vītadosehi vītamoho vītamohehi parivuto ativiya virocittha.
atk-s0511a:944_1: Atha satthā mahānubhāvānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ chaḷabhiññānaṃ catūhi satasahassehi parivuto marugaṇaparivuto
atk-s0511a:944_2: dasasatanayano viya brahmagaṇaparivuto hāritamahābrahmā viya ca aparimitasamayasamupacitakusalabalajanitāya
atk-s0511a:944_3: anopamāya buddhalīḷāya tārāgaṇaparivuto saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca gaganatalaṃ taṃ maggaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ
atk-s0511a:946_0: Suvaṇṇavaṇṇe kusume karonto, suvaṇṇavaṇṇo paṭipajji maggaṃ”.
atk-s0511a:947_0: Sumedhatāpasopi tena alaṅkatapaṭiyattena maggena āgacchantassa dīpaṅkarassa bhagavato dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0511a:947_1: asītiyā anubyañjanehi anurañjitaṃ byāmappabhāya parikkhepaṃ sassirikaṃ indanīlamaṇisadisaṃ ākāse nānappakārā

atk-s0511a:1232_6: Yathā hi nikujjito udakakumbho nissesaṃ katvā udakaṃ vamatiyeva na paccāharati,
atk-s0511a:1232_7: evameva dhanaṃ vā yasaṃ vā puttadāraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ vā anoloketvā sabbattha yācakānaṃ sabbaṃ icchiticchitaṃ
atk-s0511a:1232_8: nissesaṃ katvā dadamāno bodhimūle nisīditvā buddho bhavissasī”ti paṭhamaṃ dānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1235_0: Uddhaṃ adho dasa disā, yāvatā dhammadhātuyā.
atk-s0511a:1240_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1243_0: “Yathāpi kumbho sampuṇṇo, yassa kassaci adho kato;
atk-s0511a:1247_0: Dadāhi dānaṃ nissesaṃ, kumbho viya adho kato”ti.
atk-s0511a:1248_2: Buddhattakarā nāma dhammā dānapāramitādayo dasa dhammā.
atk-s0511a:1248_11: kattha nu kho te buddhakārakadhammā uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ disāsu vidisāsūti adhippāyo.
atk-s0511a:1249_4: ajja paṭṭhāya ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ dānapāramī pūretabbā mayāti evaṃ samādiyāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1249_7: Yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasīti bodhimūlamupagantvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ pattuṃ icchasi ce.
atk-s0511a:1249_8: Yassa kassacīti udakassa vā khīrassa vā yassa kassaci sampuṇṇo.
atk-s0511a:1249_13: Na tattha parirakkhatīti tasmiṃ vamane na parirakkhati,
atk-s0511a:1249_17: Kumbho viya adho katoti heṭṭhāmukhīkato viya kumbho.
atk-s0511a:1249_21: jīvitapariccāgena paramatthapāramiñca pūrehī”ti evaṃ attanāva attānaṃ ovadi.
atk-s0511a:1250_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1250_3: Yathā camarī migo nāma jīvitampi anoloketvā attano vālameva rakkhati,
atk-s0511a:1250_4: evaṃ tvampi ito paṭṭhāya jīvitampi anoloketvā sīlameva rakkhanto buddho bhavissasī”ti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1258_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dutiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1262_0: Upeti maraṇaṃ tattha, na vikopeti vāladhiṃ.
atk-s0511a:1265_0: Parirakkha sabbadā sīlaṃ, camarī viya vāladhi”nti.
atk-s0511a:1266_0: Tattha na heteti na hi eteyeva.
atk-s0511a:1266_2: Dutiyaṃ sīlapāraminti sīlaṃ nāma sabbesaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ patiṭṭhā,
atk-s0511a:1266_5: Tasmā sīlapāramī pūretabbāti dutiyaṃ sīlapāramiṃ addakkhinti attho.
atk-s0511a:1268_0: Catūsu bhūmīsu sīlānīti catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattasīlāni,
atk-s0511a:1268_2: Bhūmivasena pana dvīsuyeva bhūmīsu pariyāpannaṃ tampi catusīlamevāti.
atk-s0511a:1269_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakehi dhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1269_3: Yathāpi suciraṃ bandhanāgāre vasamāno puriso na tattha sinehaṃ karoti,
atk-s0511a:1269_5: evameva tvampi sabbabhave bandhanāgārasadise katvā passa,
atk-s0511a:1269_6: sabbabhavehi ukkaṇṭhito muccitukāmo hutvā nekkhammābhimukhova hoti,
atk-s0511a:1269_7: evaṃ buddho bhavissasī”ti tatiyaṃ nekkhammapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1277_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ tatiyaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1281_0: Na tattha rāgaṃ janeti, muttiṃyeva gavesati.
atk-s0511a:1285_3: Na tattha rāgaṃ janetīti tattha andughare rāgaṃ sinehaṃ na janeti na uppādeti.
atk-s0511a:1285_4: “Imaṃ andugharaṃ muñcitvā nāhaṃ aññattha gamissāmī”ti evaṃ tattha rāgaṃ na janeti,
atk-s0511a:1286_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1286_3: Hīnamajjhimukkaṭṭhesu kañci avajjetvā sabbepi paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ puccheyyāsi.
atk-s0511a:1286_4: Yathāpi piṇḍacāriko bhikkhu hīnādibhedesu kulesu kiñci kulaṃ avivajjetvā paṭipāṭiyā piṇḍāya caranto khippaṃ yāpanamattaṃ labhati,
atk-s0511a:1286_5: evameva tvampi sabbe paṇḍite upasaṅkamitvā pucchanto buddho bhavissasī”ti catutthaṃ paññāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1294_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ catutthaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1298_0: Kulāni na vivajjento, evaṃ labhati yāpanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1302_6: Yāpananti yāpanamattaṃ pāṇadhāraṇaṃ āhāraṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1302_10: kiṃ anavajja”ntiādinā nayena tattha tattha abhiññāte paṇḍite jane upasaṅkamitvā paripucchantoti attho.
atk-s0511a:1303_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1303_3: Yathāpi sīho migarājā sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo hoti,
atk-s0511a:1303_4: evaṃ tvampi sabbabhavesu sabbairiyāpathesu daḷhavīriyo anolīnavīriyo samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti pañcamaṃ vīriyapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1311_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ pañcamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1320_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1320_4: Yathā hi pathaviyaṃ nāma sucimpi pakkhipanti asucimpi,
atk-s0511a:1320_5: na ca tena pathavī sinehaṃ vā paṭighaṃ vā karoti,
atk-s0511a:1320_7: evameva tvampi sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanesu khamo samāno buddho bhavissasī”ti chaṭṭhamaṃ khantipāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1328_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ chaṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1332_0: Sabbaṃ sahati nikkhepaṃ, na karoti paṭighaṃ tayā.
atk-s0511a:1336_11: tassa tena nikkhepena paṭighānurodhaṃ na karotīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1336_12: Sammānāvamānakkhamoti sabbesaṃ sammānanāvamānanasaho tvampi bhavāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1336_18: Ito paraṃ ettakampi avatvā yattha yattha viseso atthi,
atk-s0511a:1336_19: taṃ tameva vatvā pāṭhantaraṃ dassetvā gamissāmāti.
atk-s0511a:1337_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1337_3: asaniyā matthake patamānāyapi dhanādīnaṃ atthāya chandādīnaṃ vasena sampajānamusāvādaṃ nāma mā bhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1337_4: Yathāpi osadhītārakā nāma sabbautūsu attano gamanavīthiṃ vijahitvā aññāya vīthiyā na gacchati,
atk-s0511a:1337_6: evameva tvampi saccaṃ pahāya musāvādaṃ nāma avadantoyeva buddho bhavissasī”ti sattamaṃ saccapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1345_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ sattamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1349_0: Samaye utuvasse vā, na vokkamati vīthito.
atk-s0511a:1351_0: “Tatheva tvampi saccesu, mā vokkama hi vīthito;
atk-s0511a:1353_3: osadhagahaṇe osadhītārakaṃ uditaṃ disvā osadhaṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0511a:1353_11: Utuvaṭṭeti hemante ca vassāne cāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1353_12: Na vokkamati vīthitoti taṃ taṃ utumhi attano gamanavīthito na vokkamati na vigacchati,
atk-s0511a:1353_15: Atha vā osadhī nāmāti siṅgiverapipphalimaricādikaṃ osadhaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1353_16: Na vokkamatīti yaṃ yaṃ phaladānasamatthaṃ osadhaṃ,
atk-s0511a:1353_17: taṃ taṃ phaladānaṃ okkamma attano phalaṃ adatvā na nivattati.
atk-s0511a:1354_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1354_5: yathā pabbato nāma sabbadisāsu vāte paharantepi na kampati na calati,
atk-s0511a:1354_7: evameva tvampi attano adhiṭṭhāne niccalo hontova buddho bhavissasī”ti aṭṭhamaṃ adhiṭṭhānapāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsīti.
atk-s0511a:1362_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1363_0: Tattha tvaṃ acalo hutvā, sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0511a:1370_1: Acaloti niccalo suppatiṭṭhitoti acalattāva suṭṭhu patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0511a:1371_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1371_4: Yathāpi udakaṃ nāma pāpajanassapi kalyāṇajanassapi sītabhāvaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā pharati,
atk-s0511a:1371_5: evameva tvampi sabbasattesu mettacittena ekacittova hutvā buddho bhavissasī”ti navamaṃ mettāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsīti.
atk-s0511a:1379_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ navamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1380_0: Mettāya asamo hoti, yadi bodhiṃ pattumicchasi.
atk-s0511a:1387_0: Tattha asamo hohīti mettābhāvanāya asadiso hohi.
atk-s0511a:1388_0: Athassa “na ettakeheva buddhakārakadhammehi bhavitabba”nti uttarimpi upadhārayato dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ disvā etadahosi –
atk-s0511a:1388_4: Yathāpi pathavī nāma sucimpi asucimpi ca pakkhipamāne majjhattāva hoti,
atk-s0511a:1388_5: evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu majjhattova honto buddho bhavissasī”ti dasamaṃ upekkhāpāramiṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1396_0: “Imaṃ tvaṃ dasamaṃ tāva, daḷhaṃ katvā samādiya;
atk-s0511a:1404_0: Tattha tulābhūtoti majjhattabhāve ṭhito yathā tulāya daṇḍo samaṃ tulito samaṃ tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0511a:1404_2: evameva tvampi sukhadukkhesu tulāsadiso hutvā sambodhiṃ pāpuṇissasi.
atk-s0511a:1405_0: Tato sumedhapaṇḍito ime dasa pāramidhamme vicinitvā tato paraṃ cintesi –
atk-s0511a:1405_1: “imasmiṃ loke bodhisattehi paripūretabbā bodhipācanā buddhattakarā dhammā ettakāyeva,
atk-s0511a:1405_3: imā pana pāramiyo uddhaṃ ākāsepi natthi,
atk-s0511a:1405_7: Evaṃ tāsaṃ attano hadaye patiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ disvā sabbāpi tā daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya punappunaṃ sammasanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ sammasi,
atk-s0511a:1405_14: jīvitapariccāgo paramatthapāramiyo nāmāti dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa
atk-s0511a:1405_16: Tassa dasa pāramiyo sammasantassa dhammatejena catunahutādhikadviyojanasatasahassabahalā vipulā ayaṃ
atk-s0511a:1405_17: mahāpathavī hatthinā akkantanaḷakalāpo viya uppīḷiyamānaṃ ucchuyantaṃ viya ca mahāviravaṃ viravamānā
atk-s0511a:1405_19: Kulālacakkaṃ viya telayantacakkaṃ viya ca paribbhami.
atk-s0511a:1408_0: Tatuddhaṃ natthi aññatra, daḷhaṃ tattha patiṭṭhaha.
atk-s0511a:1414_0: Telayante yathā cakkaṃ, evaṃ kampati medanī”ti.
atk-s0511a:1415_0: Tattha ettakāyevāti niddiṭṭhānaṃ dasannaṃ pāramitānaṃ anūnādhikabhāvassa dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1415_4: Tato dasapāramito añño buddhakārakadhammo natthīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1416_6: taṃ dhāreti dhīyati vā etthāti vasudhā. Kā sā? Medanī.
atk-s0511a:1416_8: Sumedhapaṇḍite pana pāramiyo vicinante tassa ñāṇatejena dasasahassī pakampitthāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1418_0: Evaṃ mahāpathaviyā kampamānāya rammanagaravāsino manussā bhagavantaṃ parivisayamānā saṇṭhātuṃ asakkontā
atk-s0511a:1418_2: Ghaṭādīni kulālabhaṇḍāni pavaṭṭentāni aññamaññaṃ paharantāni cuṇṇavicuṇṇāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1418_5: bhūtayakkhadevatāsu aññatarāvaṭṭo vā’ti na hi mayaṃ etaṃ jānāma.
atk-s0511a:1418_6: Api ca kho sabbopi ayaṃ mahājano bhayena upadduto,
atk-s0511a:1418_7: kiṃ nu kho imassa lokassa pāpakaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0511a:1419_4: yo so mayā ajja sumedhapaṇḍito ‘anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī’ti byākato,
atk-s0511a:1419_6: tassa sammasantassa dhammatejena sakaladasasahassī lokadhātu ekappahārena kampati ceva viravati cā”ti āha.
atk-s0511a:1422_0: Pavedhamānā sā tattha, mucchitā seti bhūmiyaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1431_0: Sabbo upadduto loko, taṃ vinodehi cakkhuma.
atk-s0511a:1434_0: Vissatthā hotha mā bhātha, imasmiṃ pathavikampane.
atk-s0511a:1441_3: tassa yā tattha parisā ṭhitā āsīti attho.
atk-s0511a:1444_0: Tato mahājano tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sutvā haṭṭhatuṭṭho mālāgandhavilepanādīni ādāya rammanagarato nikkhamitvā
atk-s0511a:1444_1: bodhisattaṃ upasaṅkamitvā mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā rammanagarameva pāvisi.
atk-s0511a:1444_2: Atha kho bodhisatto dasa pāramiyo sammasitvā vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya nisinnāsanā vuṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:1447_0: Sabbe maṃ upasaṅkamma, punāpi maṃ abhivandisuṃ.
atk-s0511a:1451_0: Tattha mano nibbāyīti mahājanassa pathavikampane ubbiggahadayassa tattha kāraṇaṃ sutvā mano nibbāyi,
atk-s0511a:1452_0: Atha kho bodhisattaṃ dayitasabbasattaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhahantaṃ sakaladasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā dibbehi mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā –
atk-s0511a:1452_2: tayā ajja dīpaṅkaradasabalassa pādamūle mahati patthanā patthitā,
atk-s0511a:1452_4: mā te tattha bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā ahosi.
atk-s0511a:1452_5: Sarīre te appamattakopi rogo mā uppajjatu,
atk-s0511a:1452_7: Yathā pupphūpagaphalūpagā rukkhā samaye pupphanti ceva phalanti ca,
atk-s0511a:1452_8: tatheva tvampi taṃ samayaṃ anatikkamitvā khippaṃ sambodhiṃ phusassū”tiādīni thutimaṅgalāni payirudāhaṃsu,
atk-s0511a:1452_9: evaṃ payirudāhitvā bodhisattaṃ abhivādetvā attano attano devaṭṭhānameva agamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1452_11: “ahaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā kappasatasahassādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake buddho bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0511a:1452_12: vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā adhiṭṭhāya ākāsamabbhuggantvā isigaṇavantaṃ himavantaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:1457_0: “Vedayanti ca te sotthiṃ, devā mānusakā ubho;
atk-s0511a:1458_0: Mahantaṃ patthitaṃ tuyhaṃ, taṃ labhassu yathicchitaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1461_0: Mā te bhavantvantarāyā, phusa khippaṃ bodhimuttamaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1479_0: Tatheva lokā muccitvā, viroca siriyā tuvaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1485_0: Te dhamme paripūrento, pavanaṃ pāvisī tadā”ti.
atk-s0511a:1486_0: Tattha dibbanti mandāravapāricchattakasantānakusesayādikaṃ dibbakusumaṃ devā mānusakā ca mānusapupphaṃ gahetvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1487_3: Soko rogo vinassatūti socanasaṅkhāto soko rujanasaṅkhāto rogo ca vinassatu.
atk-s0511a:1488_0: Samayeti tassa tassa rukkhassa pupphanasamaye sampatteti attho.
atk-s0511a:1489_2: Lokā muccitvāti lokadhammehi alitto hutvāti attho.
atk-s0511a:1493_0: Rammanagaravāsinopi te upāsakā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā puna bhagavantaṃ bhuttāviṃ
atk-s0511a:1493_1: onītapattapāṇiṃ mālāgandhādīhi pūjetvā vanditvā dānānumodanaṃ sotukāmā upanisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:1493_2: Atha satthā tesaṃ paramamadhuraṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ dānānumodanamakāsi –
atk-s0511a:1505_0: Ko hi nāma naro loke, na dadeyya hite rato.
atk-s0511a:1507_0: Na dajjā sukhappadaṃ dānaṃ, dānaṃ cittappamodanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:1511_0: Kittimanantaṃ yāti ca dātā, vissasanīyo hoti ca dātā.
atk-s0511a:1512_0: “Datvā dānaṃ yāti naro so, bhogasamiddhiṃ dīghañcāyu;
atk-s0511a:1513_0: Sussaratampi ca vindati rūpaṃ, sagge saddhiṃ kīḷati devehi;
atk-s0511a:1516_0: Dadāti taṃ sāvakañāṇabhūmiṃ, paccekabhūmiṃ pana buddhabhūmi”nti. –
atk-s0511a:1517_0: Evamādinā nayena dānānumodanaṃ katvā dānānisaṃsaṃ pakāsetvā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi.
