atk-s0511a:2178_0: “So ca kāyo ratananibho, so ca dhammo asādiso;
atk-s0511a:2180_5: So ca kāyo ratananibhoti so ca tassa bhagavato kāyo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo.
atk-s0511a:2184_0: Tassa pana aparabhāge tassa sāsanepi antarahite sobhito nāma bodhisatto kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri
atk-s0511a:2184_1: asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devehi āyācito tusitapurato
atk-s0511a:2184_2: cavitvā sudhammanagare sudhammarājassa kule sudhammāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:2184_3: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sudhammuyyāne mātukucchito parisuddhavirājitaghanameghapaṭalato puṇṇacando viya nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2184_4: Tassa paṭisandhiyaṃ jātiyañca pāṭihāriyāni pubbe vuttappakārāni.
atk-s0511a:2185_0: So dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasitvā sattattiṃsanāṭakitthisahassānaṃ aggāya aggamahesiyā makhiladeviyā
atk-s0511a:2185_1: kucchismiṃ sīhakumāre nāma putte uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā sañjātasaṃvego pāsādeyeva pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:2185_2: tattheva ānāpānassatisamādhiṃ bhāvetvā cattāri jhānāni paṭilabhitvā sattāhaṃ tattheva padhānacariyamacari.
atk-s0511a:2185_3: Tato makhilamahādeviyā dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā abhinikkhamanatthāya cittamuppādesi –
atk-s0511a:2185_4: “ayaṃ pāsādo alaṅkatapaṭiyatto mahājanassa passantasseva ākāsena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ majjhekatvā pathaviyaṃ otaratu,
atk-s0511a:2185_5: imā ca itthiyo mayi bodhimūle nisinne avuttā sayameva pāsādato nikkhamantū”ti.
atk-s0511a:2185_6: Sahacittuppādā pāsādo ca sudhammarājabhavanato uppatitvā asitañjanasaṅkāsamākāsamabbhuggañchi.
atk-s0511a:2185_7: So samosaritasurabhikusumadāmasamalaṅkatapāsādatalo sakalampi gaganatalaṃ samalaṅkurumāno viya kanakarasadhārāsadisarucirakaranikaro
atk-s0511a:2185_8: divasakaro viya ca saradasamayarajanikaro viya ca virocamāno vilambamānavividhavicittakiṅkiṇikajālo yassa
atk-s0511a:2185_9: kira vāteritassa sukusalajanavāditassa pañcaṅgikassa turiyassa viya saddo vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2186_0: Dūrato paṭṭhāya suyyamānena madhurena sarena sattānaṃ sotāni odahamāno gharacaccaracatukkavīthiādīsu
atk-s0511a:2186_1: ṭhatvā pavattitakathāsallāpesu manussesu nātinīcena nātiuccena taruvaravanamatthakāvidūrenākāsena palobhayamāno
atk-s0511a:2186_2: viya taruvarasākhānānāratanajutivisarasamujjalena vaṇṇena jananayanāni ākaḍḍhento viya ca puññānubhāvaṃ
atk-s0511a:2186_4: Tattha nāṭakitthiyopi pañcaṅgikassa varaturiyassa madhurena sarena upagāyiṃsu ceva vilapiṃsu ca.
atk-s0511a:2186_8: surabhikusumavasanābharaṇasobhitā amaravarasenā viya paramaruciradassanā dharaṇī viya gaganatalena pāsādaṃ parivāretvā agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:2187_0: Tato pāsādo gantvā aṭṭhāsītihatthubbedhaṃ ujuvipulavaṭṭakkhandhaṃ kusumapallavamakulasamalaṅkataṃ nāgarukkhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2187_2: Nāṭakitthiyo ca kenaci avuttāva tato pāsādato otaritvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2187_3: Anekaguṇasobhito kira sobhitopi mahāpuriso mahājanakataparivāroyeva rattiyā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjāyo uppādesi.
atk-s0511a:2187_8: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmuno dhammajjhesanaṃ paṭijānitvā –
atk-s0511a:2187_9: “kassa nu kho paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti buddhacakkhunā olokento attano vemātike kaniṭṭhabhātike asamakumārañca sunettakumārañca disvā –
atk-s0511a:2187_10: “ime dve kumārā upanissayasampannā gambhīraṃ nipuṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā,
atk-s0511a:2187_11: handāhaṃ imesaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti ākāsenāgantvā sudhammuyyāne otaritvā dvepi kumāre uyyānapālena pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0511a:2187_12: tehi saparivārehi parivuto mahājanamajjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2200_3: sakagehe ṭhatvā sattadivasabbhantareyeva puthujjanabhāvato cittaṃ vinivattetvā buddhattaṃ pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2200_9: Ahūti gaṇanāya na vattabbā parisā ahosīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2201_0: Athāparena samayena sudassananagaradvāre cittapāṭaliyā mūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā navakanakamaṇimayabhavane
atk-s0511a:2201_1: tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilātale nisīditvā abhidhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a:2205_0: Athāparena samayena sudassananagare jayaseno nāma rājakumāro yojanappamāṇaṃ vihāraṃ kāretvā asokassakaṇṇacampakanāgapunnāgavakulasurabhicūtapanasāsanasālakunda-
atk-s0511a:2205_1: sahakārakaravīrāditaruvaranirantaraṃ ārāmaṃ ropetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātesi.
atk-s0511a:2205_2: Dānānumodanaṃ katvā yāgaṃ vaṇṇetvā bhagavā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a:2212_0: Puna uggato nāma rājā sunandanagare sunandaṃ nāma vihāraṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0511a:2212_1: Tasmiṃ dāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ koṭisataṃ arahantānaṃ sannipāto,
atk-s0511a:2212_2: tesaṃ majjhe sobhito bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a:2212_4: Puna mekhalānagare dhammagaṇo dhammagaṇārāmaṃ nāma pavarārāmaṃ mahāvihāraṃ kāretvā buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0511a:2212_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa datvā saha sabbaparikkhārehi dānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0511a:2212_6: Tasmiṃ samāgame ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbajitānaṃ navutiyā arahantakoṭīnaṃ sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a:2212_8: Yadā pana bhagavā dasasatanayanapure vassaṃ vasitvā pavāraṇāya suravaraparivuto otari,
atk-s0511a:2212_9: tadā asītiyā arahantakoṭīhi saddhiṃ caturaṅgike sannipāte pavāresi.
atk-s0511a:2217_0: “Uggato nāma so rājā, dānaṃ deti naruttame;
atk-s0511a:2225_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto rammavatīnagare ubhato sujāto ‘sujāto’ nāma brāhmaṇo hutvā sobhitassa bhagavato
atk-s0511a:2225_1: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa temāsaṃ mahādānamadāsi.
atk-s0511a:2225_2: Sopi naṃ “anāgate gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a:2237_2: “anāgate ayaṃ gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti vacanaṃ sutvā “avitathavacanā hi buddhā”ti buddhattappattiatthanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2238_0: Tassa pana sobhitassa bhagavato sudhammaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2238_3: asamo ca sunetto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2238_5: nakulā ca sujātā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2247_0: Bujjhamāno ca so buddho, nāgamūle abujjhatha.
atk-s0511a:2259_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2264_0: “So ca buddho asamasamo, tepi sāvakā balappattā;
atk-s0511a:2270_0: Sobhitabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa aparabhāge ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhuppādarahitaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2270_1: Atīte pana tasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye ekasmiṃ kappe tayo buddhā nibbattiṃsu anomadassī, padumo, nāradoti.
atk-s0511a:2270_2: Tattha anomadassī bhagavā soḷasa asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā
atk-s0511a:2270_3: devehi abhiyācito tato cavitvā candavatiyaṃ nāma rājadhāniyaṃ yasavā nāmassa rañño kule samussitacārupayodharāya
atk-s0511a:2270_4: yasodharāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:2270_5: Anomadassikumāre kira yasodharāya deviyā kucchigate tassa puññappabhāvena pabhā asītihatthappamāṇaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:2270_7: Sā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena bodhisattaṃ sucandanuyyāne vijāyi.
atk-s0511a:2271_1: yasmā jātiyaṃ ākāsato satta ratanāni patiṃsu,
atk-s0511a:2271_3: So anukkamena vuddhippatto dibbehi kāmaguṇehi paricāriyamāno dasavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi.
atk-s0511a:2271_4: Tassa kira siri upasiri sirivaḍḍhoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2271_6: So sirimāya deviyā upavāṇe nāma putte jāte cattāri nimittāni disvā sivikāyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2272_0: Tehi parivuto mahāpuriso dasa māse padhānacariyaṃ cari.
atk-s0511a:2272_1: Tato visākhapuṇṇamāya anupamabrāhmaṇagāme piṇḍāya caritvā anupamaseṭṭhidhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā
atk-s0511a:2272_2: sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā anomanāmājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā ajjunarukkhabodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2272_3: padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0511a:2272_4: ābhujitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ viddhaṃsetvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā –
atk-s0511a:2277_0: “So chetvā bandhanaṃ sabbaṃ, viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhave;
atk-s0511a:2284_0: Byāharantaṃ giraṃ sutvā, amataṃ pāpuṇanti te”ti.
atk-s0511a:2285_6: aññena devena vā mārena vā kenaci vā atikkamituṃ asakkuṇeyyoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2285_7: So chetvā bandhanaṃ sabbanti sabbaṃ dasavidhaṃ saṃyojanaṃ chinditvā.
atk-s0511a:2285_8: Viddhaṃsetvā tayo bhaveti tibhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ kammakkhayakarañāṇena viddhaṃsetvā,
atk-s0511a:2285_10: Anivattigamanaṃ magganti nivattiyā pavattiyā paṭipakkhabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ anivattīti vuccati,
atk-s0511a:2285_12: Taṃ anivattigamanaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ desesīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2286_1: Yathā hi samuddo caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro anekayojanasahassabhūtāvāso akkhobhiyo,
atk-s0511a:2286_3: Ākāsova anantoti yathā pana ākāsassa anto natthi,
atk-s0511a:2286_5: evaṃ bhagavāpi buddhaguṇehi ananto appameyyo apāro.
atk-s0511a:2286_7: Sālarājāva phullitoti sabbalakkhaṇānubyañjanasamalaṅkatasarīrattā suphullitasālarājā viya sobhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2286_8: Dassanenapi taṃ buddhanti tassa buddhassa dassanenāpīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2286_15: Teti ye tassa giraṃ dhammadesanaṃ suṇanti,
atk-s0511a:2287_0: Bhagavā pana bodhimūle sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito dhammadesanāya buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ
atk-s0511a:2287_1: olokento attanā saha pabbajite tikoṭisaṅkhe jane upanissayasampanne disvā –
atk-s0511a:2287_2: “kattha nu kho te etarahi viharantī”ti upadhārento subhavatīnagare sudassanuyyāne viharante disvā ākāsena gantvā sudassanuyyāne otari.
atk-s0511a:2287_3: So tehi parivuto sadevamanussāya parisāya majjhe dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2292_0: Athāparena samayena osadhīnagaradvāre asanarukkhamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā asurehi durabhibhavane
atk-s0511a:2292_1: tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisinno temāsaṃ abhidhammavassaṃ vassāpayi.
atk-s0511a:2296_0: Tattha vassanteti buddhamahāmeghe vassante. Dhammavuṭṭhiyoti dhammakathāvassavuṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0511a:2297_0: Tato aparena samayena maṅgalapañhāniddese aṭṭhasattati koṭiyo abhisamiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2302_1: Tattha soreyyanagare isidattassa rañño dhamme desiyamāne pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2302_4: Rādhavatīnagare sundarindharassa nāma rañño dhamme desiyamāne ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ sattannaṃ
atk-s0511a:2302_7: Puna soreyyanagareyeva soreyyaraññā saha ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ channaṃ arahantasatasahassānaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi.
atk-s0511a:2315_0: Tattha tassāpi ca mahesinoti tassa mahesino anomadassissāpi.
atk-s0511a:2316_3: Rāgo aṅgaṇaṃ doso aṅgaṇaṃ moho aṅgaṇa”nti.
atk-s0511a:2316_7: “tasseva rajassa vā aṅgaṇassa vā pahānāya vāyamatī”ti.
atk-s0511a:2316_12: Tapassinanti kilesakkhayakaro ariyamaggasaṅkhāto tapo yesaṃ atthi te tapassino,
atk-s0511a:2317_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto eko mahesakkho yakkhasenāpati ahosi mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo anekakoṭisatasahassānaṃ yakkhānaṃ adhipati.
atk-s0511a:2317_1: So “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā āgantvā paramaruciradassanaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ abhirucirarajanikaramaṇḍalasadisaṃ
atk-s0511a:2317_2: maṇḍapaṃ nimminitvā tattha sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa adāsi.
atk-s0511a:2317_3: Atha naṃ bhagavā bhattānumodanasamaye “anāgate kappasatasahassādhike ekasmiṃ asaṅkhyeyye atikkante gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a:2332_0: Tattha uttariṃ vatamadhiṭṭhāsinti pāramipūraṇatthāya bhiyyopi daḷhataraṃ parakkamamakāsīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2333_0: Tassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato candavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2333_3: nisabho ca anomo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2333_5: sundarī ca sumanā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2333_13: Sivikāyānena gamanaṃ pana sobhitabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya pāsādagamane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2348_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2353_0: “So ca satthā amitayaso, yugāni tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a:2355_0: Tattha pabhā niddhāvatīti tassa sarīrato pabhā nikkhamati.
atk-s0511a:2355_1: Sarīrappabhā panassa niccakālaṃ dvādasayojanappamāṇaṃ padesaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0511a:2355_3: Sabbaṃ tamantarahitanti vuttappakāraṃ sabbampi aniccamukhaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ vinaṭṭhanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2355_5: tassa nanu rittakā tucchakāyeva sabbe saṅkhārāti attho. Ma-
atk-s0511a:2356_0: Imassa pana anomadassissa bhagavato santike sāriputto ca mahāmoggallāno cāti ime dve aggasāvakā aggasāvakabhāvatthāya paṇidhānamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2356_1: Imesaṃ pana therānaṃ vatthu cettha kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2360_0: Anomadassissa pana bhagavato aparabhāge vassasatasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassāyukā
atk-s0511a:2360_1: hutvā puna anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā puna parihāyamānā vassasatasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2360_2: Tathā padumo nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0511a:2360_3: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā campakanagare asamassa nāma rañño kule rūpādīhi
atk-s0511a:2360_4: asamāya asamāya nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:2360_5: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena campakuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2360_6: Jāte pana kumāre ākāsato sakalajambudīpe samuddapariyante padumavassaṃ nipati.
atk-s0511a:2360_7: Tenassa nāmaggahaṇadivase nāmaṃ gaṇhantā nemittakā ca ñātakā ca “mahāpadumakumāro”tveva nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2361_0: Atha mahāsatto uttarāya nāma mahādeviyā rammakumāre nāma uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2361_2: So tehi parivuto aṭṭha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya dhaññavatīnagare sudhaññaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0511a:2361_3: dhītāya dhaññavatiyā nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā mahāsālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a:2361_4: titthakājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā mahāsoṇabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ
atk-s0511a:2361_5: tiṇasantharakaṃ paññapetvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā tīsu
atk-s0511a:2361_8: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmuno āyācanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2361_9: adhivāsetvā dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte puggale upaparikkhanto attanā saha pabbajite koṭisaṅkhe bhikkhū
atk-s0511a:2361_10: disvā taṅkhaṇeyeva anilapathena gantvā dhaññavatīnagarasamīpe dhanañjayuyyāne otaritvā tehi parivuto
atk-s0511a:2371_0: Tattha asamaṃ sīlanti aññesaṃ sīlena asadisaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2371_10: Tassa “tayo abhisamayā”ti iminā uttarapadena sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:2372_0: Athāparena samayena padumo bhagavā attano kaniṭṭhabhātaraṃ sālakumārañca upasālakumārañca ñātisamāgame
atk-s0511a:2372_1: saparivāre pabbājetvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desento navuti koṭiyo dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a:2379_0: Yadā pana subhāvitatto nāma rājā padumassa buddhassa buddhapadumavadanassa santike koṭisatasahassaparivāro ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajito,
atk-s0511a:2380_0: Athāparena samayena mahāpadumo munivasabho usabhasamagatī usabhavatīnagaraṃ upanissāya vassaṃ upagañchi.
atk-s0511a:2380_3: Tattha ca bahavo manussā pasannacittā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2380_4: Tato dasabalo tehi ca aññehi ca tīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāresi.
atk-s0511a:2380_7: te kathinānisaṃsaṃ sutvā pāṭipade pañcasu māsesu pañcānisaṃsadāyakaṃ kathinacīvaramadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2380_8: Tato taṃ bhikkhū dhammasenāpatiṃ aggasāvakaṃ visālamatiṃ sālattheraṃ kathinatthāratthaṃ yācitvā kathinacīvaraṃ tassādaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2380_9: Therassa kathinacīvare kayiramāne bhikkhū sibbane sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2380_10: Padumo pana sammāsambuddho sūcicchidde suttāni āvunitvā adāsi.
atk-s0511a:2380_11: Niṭṭhite pana cīvare bhagavā tīhi bhikkhusatasahassehi cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0511a:2381_0: Athāparena samayena sīhavikkantagāmī purisasīho viya buddhasīho gosiṅgasālavanasadise paramasurabhikusumaphalabhāravinamitasākhāviṭape
atk-s0511a:2381_1: vimalakamalakuvalayasamalaṅkate sisiramadhuravārivāhena paripūrite ruru- camara- sīha- byaggha- aja- haya- gavaya-
atk-s0511a:2381_3: samantato gumbagumbāyamāne phalarasapamuditahadayāhi kākalisadisamadhuravirutāhi kokilavadhūhi upagīyamāne
atk-s0511a:2381_4: paramaramaṇīye vivitte vijane yogānukūle pavane vassāvāsamupagañchi.
atk-s0511a:2381_5: Tasmiṃ viharantaṃ saparivārakaṃ dasabalaṃ tathāgataṃ dhammarājaṃ buddhasiriyā virocamānaṃ disvā manussā
atk-s0511a:2381_6: tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pasīditvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2394_9: “Tadā āsi samāgamo”tipi pāṭho yadi atthi sundaro bhaveyya.
atk-s0511a:2395_0: Tadā tathāgate tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe vasante amhākaṃ bodhisatto sīho hutvā sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0511a:2395_1: nisinnaṃ disvā pasannacitto hutvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā sañjātapītisomanasso tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā
atk-s0511a:2395_2: sattāhaṃ buddhārammaṇaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvā pītisukheneva gocarāya apakkamitvā jīvitapariccāgaṃ katvā payirupāsamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a:2395_3: Atha satthā tassa sattāhassa accayena nirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya narasīho sīhaṃ oloketvā –
atk-s0511a:2413_6: Manasā cintayitvānāti “sabbepi bhikkhū idha āgacchantū”ti manasāva cintetvā.
atk-s0511a:2414_0: Tassa pana padumassa bhagavato campakaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2414_3: sālo ca upasālo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2414_5: rādhā ca surādhā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2414_9: rūpādīhi guṇehi anuttarā uttarā nāmassa aggamahesī,
atk-s0511a:2426_0: Pabhā niddhāvatī tassa, asamā sabbato disā.
atk-s0511a:2429_0: Sabbāpi tā hatā honti, patvā jinapabhuttamaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2432_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2438_0: Jahitvā sabbasaṅkhāre, nibbuto so yathā sikhī”ti.
atk-s0511a:2439_0: Tattha ratanaggimaṇippabhāti ratanappabhā ca aggippabhā ca maṇippabhā ca.
atk-s0511a:2439_2: Jinapabhuttamanti jinassa sarīrappabhaṃ uttamaṃ patvā hatāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2439_9: Yathā sikhīti aggi viya nirupādāno nibbutiṃ sugato gatoti.
atk-s0511a:2443_0: Padumabuddhe pana parinibbute tassa sāsane ca antarahite vassasatasahassāyukā manussā anukkamena parihāyamānā dasavassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2443_1: Puna vaḍḍhitvā asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā parihāyamānā navutivassasahassāyukā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2443_2: Tadā dasabaladharo tevijjo catuvesārajjavisārado vimuttisārado nārado nāma narasattuttamo satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a:2443_3: So cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavane nibbattitvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0511a:2443_4: dhaññavatī nāma nagare sakavīriyavijitavāsudevassa sudevassa nāma rañño kule aggamahesiyā nirūpamāya
atk-s0511a:2443_5: anomāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:2443_6: So dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena dhanañjayuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2443_7: Nāmaggahaṇadivase pana nāmakaraṇe kayiramāne sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ upabhogakkhamāni anurūpāni ābharaṇāni ākāsato kapparukkhādīhi patiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2443_8: Tenassa narānaṃ arahāni ābharaṇāni adāsīti “nārado”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2444_1: Vijito vijitāvī vijitābhirāmoti tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2444_2: Tassa nāradakumārassa kulasīlācārarūpasampannaṃ manonukūlaṃ vijitasenaṃ nāma ativiya dhaññaṃ khattiyakaññaṃ aggamahesiṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2444_3: Taṃ ādiṃ katvā vīsatisahassādhikaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2444_4: Tassā vijitasenāya deviyā sabbalokānandakare nanduttarakumāre nāma jāte so cattāri nimittāni disvā caturaṅginiyā
atk-s0511a:2444_5: mahatiyā senāya parivuto nānāvirāgatanuvaravasananivasano āmukkamuttāhāramaṇikuṇḍalo varakeyūramakuṭakaṭakadharo
atk-s0511a:2444_6: paramasurabhigandhakusumasamalaṅkato padasāva uyyānaṃ gantvā sabbābharaṇāni omuñcitvā bhaṇḍāgārikassa
atk-s0511a:2444_9: Taṃ sakko devarājā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭakena paṭiggahetvā tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ netvā tiyojanubbedhaṃ sinerumuddhani sattaratanamayaṃ cetiyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0511a:2445_0: Mahāpuriso pana devadattāni kāsāyāni vatthāni paridahitvā tattheva uyyāne pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2445_2: So sattāhaṃ tattheva padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya vijitasenāya aggamahesiyā dinnaṃ pāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:2445_3: paribhuñjitvā tattheva uyyāne divāvihāraṃ katvā sudassanuyyānapālena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā
atk-s0511a:2445_4: mahāsoṇabodhiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā nisīditvā mārabalaṃ
atk-s0511a:2445_5: vidhamitvā tīsu yāmesu tisso vijjā uppādetvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā –
atk-s0511a:2445_7: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā brahmuno yācito paṭiññaṃ datvā dhanañjayuyyāne
atk-s0511a:2445_8: attanā saha pabbajitehi satasahassabhikkhūhi parivuto tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2460_0: Pāpuṇī kevalaṃ bodhiṃ, buddhañāṇe ca cuddasa.
atk-s0511a:2464_3: dayito orasi gahetvā lālito putto dayitaoraso nāma.
atk-s0511a:2465_0: Tatthāsi rukkhoti tasmiṃ uyyāne eko kira rukkho rattasoṇo nāma ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2465_1: So kira navutihatthubbedho samavaṭṭakkhandho sampannavividhaviṭapasākho nīlabahalavipulapalāso sandacchāyo
atk-s0511a:2465_2: devatādhivuṭṭhattā vigatavividhavihagagaṇasañcāro dharaṇītalatilakabhūto tarurajjaṃ viya kurumāno paramaramaṇīyadassano
atk-s0511a:2465_5: sabbalokavikhyāto attano sampattiyā sabbattha pākaṭo vissutoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2465_9: Tamajjhappatvāti taṃ soṇarukkhaṃ patvā adhipatvā upagammāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2466_4: Tena vicini saṅkhāreti tena vipassanāñāṇena rūpādike saṅkhāre vicini.
atk-s0511a:2466_5: Ukkujjamavakujjakanti saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca vicinīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2466_6: Tasmā paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena
atk-s0511a:2466_7: samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggānukkamena sakale buddhaguṇe
atk-s0511a:2467_5: Abhivāhayīti maggodhinā ca kilesodhinā ca sabbe kilese abhivāhayi,
atk-s0511a:2467_11: cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti evamimāni cuddasa buddhañāṇāni nāma, ca-
atk-s0511a:2467_13: tena aparānipi catasso paṭisambhidāñāṇāni catuvesārajjañāṇāni catuyoniparicchedakañāṇāni pañcagatiparicchedakañāṇāni
atk-s0511a:2467_14: dasabalañāṇāni sakale ca buddhaguṇe pāpuṇīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2468_0: Evaṃ buddhattaṃ patvā brahmāyācanaṃ adhivāsetvā dhanañjayuyyāne attanā saha pabbajite satasahassabhikkhū sammukhe katvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2468_2: Tadā kira mahādoṇanagare doṇo nāma nāgarājā gaṅgātīre paṭivasati mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo mahājanena sakkato garukato mānito pūjito.
atk-s0511a:2468_3: So yasmiṃ visaye janapadavāsino manussā tassa balikammaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0511a:2468_4: tesaṃ visayaṃ avassena vā ativassena vā sakkharavassena vā vināseti.
atk-s0511a:2469_0: Atha tīradassano nārado satthā doṇassa nāgarājassa vinayane bahūnaṃ pāṇīnaṃ upanissayaṃ disvā mahatā
atk-s0511a:2469_3: ettha ghoraviso uggatejo mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo nāgarājā paṭivasati,
atk-s0511a:2469_4: so taṃ mā viheṭhessati na gantabba”nti.
atk-s0511a:2469_5: Bhagavā pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ asuṇanto viya agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:2469_6: Gantvā ca tatthassa nāgarājassa sakkāratthāya kate paramasurabhigandhe pupphasanthare nisīdi.
atk-s0511a:2469_7: Mahājano kira “nāradassa ca munirājassa doṇassa ca nāgarājassa dvinnampi yuddhaṃ passissāmā”ti sannipati.
atk-s0511a:2470_0: Atha ahināgo munināgaṃ tathā nisinnaṃ disvā makkhaṃ asahamāno sandissamānakāyo hutvā padhūpāyi.
atk-s0511a:2470_4: Atha so nāgarājā dasabalassa sarīrato nikkhantāhi dhūmajālāhi ativiya kilantasarīro dukkhaṃ asahamāno “visavegena naṃ māressāmī”ti visaṃ vissajjesi.
atk-s0511a:2470_6: Taṃ pana visaṃ dasabalassa sarīre ekalomampi kampetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0511a:2470_8: “kā nu kho samaṇassa pavattī”ti olokento saradasamaye sūriyaṃ viya candaṃ viya ca paripuṇṇaṃ chabbaṇṇāhi
atk-s0511a:2470_11: mayā pana attano balaṃ ajānantena aparaddha”nti cintetvā tāṇaṃ gavesī bhagavantaṃyeva saraṇamupagañchi.
atk-s0511a:2470_12: Atha nārado munirājā taṃ nāgarājaṃ vinetvā tattha sannipatitassa mahājanassa cittappasādanatthaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0511a:2477_0: Tattha pāṭiheraṃ tadākāsīti akāsi yamakapāṭihāriyanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2478_0: Yadā pana attano puttaṃ nanduttarakumāraṃ ovadi,
atk-s0511a:2482_0: Yadā pana thullakoṭṭhitanagare bhaddasālo ca vijitamitto ca dve brāhmaṇasahāyakā amatarahadaṃ gavesamānā
atk-s0511a:2482_3: “ayaṃ loke vivaṭacchado sammāsambuddho”ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavati sañjātasaddhā saparivārā bhagavato santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2482_4: Tesu pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pattesu bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ koṭisatasahassamajjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2486_0: Yasmiṃ samaye nārado sammāsambuddho ñātisamāgame attano paṇidhānato paṭṭhāya buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0511a:2491_0: Yadā pana mahādoṇanāgarājassa vinayane pasanno verocano nāma nāgarājā gaṅgāya nadiyā tigāvutappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2491_1: sattaratanamayaṃ maṇḍapaṃ nimminitvā saparivāraṃ bhagavantaṃ tattha nisīdāpetvā saparivāro sajanapade
atk-s0511a:2491_2: attano dānaggadassanatthāya nimantetvā nāganāṭakāni ca tāḷāvacare vividhavesālaṅkāradhare sannipātetvā
atk-s0511a:2491_4: Bhojanāvasāne bhagavā mahāgaṅgaṃ otārento viya anumodanamakāsi.
atk-s0511a:2491_5: Tadā bhattānumodane dhammaṃ sutvā pasannānaṃ ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitānaṃ asītibhikkhusatasahassānaṃ majjhe pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2496_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā himavantapasse assamaṃ māpetvā pañcasu abhiññāsu aṭṭhasu samāpattīsu ca ciṇṇavasī hutvā paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a:2496_1: Atha tasmiṃ anukampāya nārado bhagavā asītiyā arahantakoṭīhi dasahi ca anāgāmiphalaṭṭhehi upāsakasahassehi parivuto taṃ assamapadaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:2496_2: Tāpaso bhagavantaṃ disvāva pamuditahadayo saparivārassa bhagavato nivāsatthāya assamaṃ māpetvā sakalarattiṃ
atk-s0511a:2496_3: satthuguṇaṃ kittetvā bhagavato dhammakathaṃ sutvā punadivase uttarakuruṃ gantvā tato āhāraṃ āharitvā
atk-s0511a:2496_5: Evaṃ sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā himavantato anagghaṃ lohitacandanaṃ āharitvā tena lohitacandanena bhagavantaṃ pūjesi.
atk-s0511a:2496_6: Tadā naṃ dasabalo amaranaraparivuto dhammakathaṃ kathetvā –
atk-s0511a:2511_5: tesu asamasamesu samo “asamasamasamo”ti vattabbe ekassa samasaddassa lopaṃ katvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a:2511_11: Bhiyyo hāsetva mānasanti uttarimpi hāsetvā tosetvā hadayaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2511_12: Adhiṭṭhahiṃ vataṃ ugganti uggaṃ vataṃ adhiṭṭhāsiṃ.
atk-s0511a:2512_0: Tassa pana bhagavato nāradassa dhaññavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2512_3: bhaddasālo ca jitamitto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2512_5: uttarā ca phaggunī ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2512_12: vijito vijitāvī vijitābhirāmoti tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2529_0: “Na keci tena samayena, samantā yojane janā;
atk-s0511a:2533_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2539_0: Dhammasetuṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, nibbuto so narāsabho.
atk-s0511a:2543_1: Dasasahassī virocatīti tassa pabhāya dasasahassīpi lokadhātu virocati,
atk-s0511a:2543_5: Tattha byāmappabhā kāyāti byāmappabhā viyāti byāmappabhā,
atk-s0511a:2544_5: Ukkā vā padīpe vā kecipi janā na ujjālenti na pajjālenti.
atk-s0511a:2545_2: tatheva tassa sāsanaṃ arahantehi vicittaṃ upasobhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2545_4: Sesake paṭipannaketi arahante ṭhapetvā kalyāṇaputhujjanehi saddhiṃ sese sekkhapuggaleti attho.
atk-s0511a:2545_6: sesapuggale saṃsārato tāretuṃ dhammasetuṃ ṭhapetvā katasabbakicco hutvā parinibbāyīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2549_2: Tato paraṃ kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ buddhā loke na uppajjiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2549_4: Tato kappesu ca asaṅkhyeyyesu vītivattesu ito kappasatasahassamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe eko vijitamāro ohitabhāro
atk-s0511a:2549_5: merusāro asaṃsāro sattasāro sabbalokuttaro padumuttaro nāma buddho loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a:2549_6: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā haṃsavatīnagare sabbajanānandakarassānandassa
atk-s0511a:2549_7: nāma rañño aggamahesiyā uditoditakule jātāya sujātāya deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0511a:2549_8: Sā devatāhi katārakkhā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena haṃsavatuyyāne padumuttarakumāraṃ vijāyi.
atk-s0511a:2549_9: Paṭisandhiyañcassa jātiyañca heṭṭhā vuttappakārāni pāṭihāriyāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2550_5: vasavattināmakā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikā tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2550_6: Vasudattādevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassāni vīsatisahassāni ca paccupaṭṭhitāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2550_7: So vasudattāya deviyā putte sabbaguṇānuttare uttarakumāre nāma uppanne cattāri nimittāni disvā –
atk-s0511a:2550_9: Tassa cintitamatteva vasavattināmako pāsādo kumbhakāracakkaṃ viya ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā devavimānamiva
atk-s0511a:2550_10: puṇṇacando viya ca gaganatalena gantvā bodhirukkhaṃ majjhekaronto sobhitabuddhavaṃsavaṇṇanāya āgatapāsādo
atk-s0511a:2551_0: Mahāpuriso kira tato pāsādato otaritvā arahattaddhajabhūtāni kāsāyāni vatthāni devadattiyāni pārupitvā tattheva pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2551_2: Mahāsattena sahagatāya parisāya ṭhapetvā itthiyo sabbe pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2551_3: Mahāpuriso tehi saha sattāhaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya ujjeninigame rucānandaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a:2551_4: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sāyanhasamaye sumittājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a:2551_5: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā salalabodhiṃ upagantvā taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā aṭṭhattiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_6: santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā caturaṅgavīriyaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā paṭhame yāme
atk-s0511a:2551_7: pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritvā dutiye yāme dibbacakkhuṃ visodhetvā tatiye yāme paccayākāraṃ sammasitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānato
atk-s0511a:2551_8: vuṭṭhāya pañcasu khandhesu abhinivisitvā udayabbayavasena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni disvā yāva gotrabhuñāṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2551_9: vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyamaggena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhāciṇṇaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāraṃ…pe…
atk-s0511a:2551_11: Tadā kira dasasahassacakkavāḷabbhantaraṃ sakalampi alaṅkarontaṃ viya padumavassaṃ vassi.
atk-s0511a:2556_0: “Maṇḍakappo vā so āsi, yamhi buddho ajāyatha;
atk-s0511a:2558_1: Maṇḍakappo vā so āsīti ettha yasmiṃ kappe dve sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a:2558_3: Duvidho hi kappo suññakappo asuññakappo cāti.
atk-s0511a:2559_2: Tattha guṇasārarahite kappe guṇasāruppādakassa guṇasārajananassa ekassa sammāsambuddhassa pātubhāvena “sārakappo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0511a:2559_3: Yasmiṃ pana kappe dve lokanāyakā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a:2559_8: tattha manussā pamuditahadayā attanā patthitapaṇidhānavasena varayanti.
atk-s0511a:2559_10: Yattha pana kappe cattāro buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a:2559_15: Tasmiṃ pana kappe yebhuyyena sattā kalyāṇasukhabahulā honti.
atk-s0511a:2561_0: Varakappe tayo buddhā, sāramaṇḍe caturo buddhā;
atk-s0511a:2562_0: Pañca buddhā bhaddakappe, tato natthādhikā jinā”ti.
atk-s0511a:2563_1: so sārakappopi samāno guṇasampattiyā maṇḍakappasadisattā “maṇḍakappo”ti vutto.
atk-s0511a:2564_0: Padumuttaro pana parisuttaro bhagavā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā –
atk-s0511a:2564_2: Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā vimalakomalakesarakaṇṇikāni jalajāmalāvikalavipulapalāsāni thalajāni jalajāni uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2564_3: Tesaṃ kira dhurapattāni navutihatthāni kesarāni tiṃsahatthāni kaṇṇikā dvādasahatthā ekekassa navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇavo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2564_5: Tassa ubhinnaṃ bāhānamantaraṃ aṭṭhārasahatthaṃ nalāṭaṃ pañcahatthaṃ hatthapādā ekādasahatthā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2564_6: Tassa ekādasahatthena pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇavo uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0511a:2564_7: aṭṭhapaṇṇāsahatthaṃ sarīrappadesaṃ uggantvā manosilācuṇṇavicuṇṇitaṃ viya katvā paccottharanti.
atk-s0511a:2564_8: Tadupādāya satthā padumuttarotveva loke paññāyitthāti saṃyuttabhāṇakā vadanti.
atk-s0511a:2565_0: Atha sabbalokuttaro padumuttaro bhagavā brahmāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā dhammadesanāya bhājanabhūte satte
atk-s0511a:2565_1: olokento mithilanagare devalaṃ sujātañcāti dve rājaputte upanissayasampanne disvā taṅkhaṇaññeva anilapathena
atk-s0511a:2565_2: gantvā mithiluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena dvepi rājakumāre pakkosāpesi.
atk-s0511a:2565_3: Tepi ca “amhākaṃ pitucchāputto padumuttarakumāro pabbajitvā sammāsambodhiṃ pāpuṇitvā amhākaṃ nagaraṃ sampatto,
atk-s0511a:2565_4: handa naṃ mayaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāmā”ti saparivārā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2565_5: Tadā dasabalo tehi parivuto tārāgaṇaparivuto puṇṇacando viya virocamāno tattha dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi,
atk-s0511a:2569_0: Athāparena samayena saradatāpasasamāgame mahājanaṃ nirayasantāpena santāpetvā dhammaṃ desento sattatiṃsasatasahassasaṅkhe
atk-s0511a:2573_0: Yadā pana ānandamahārājā vīsatiyā purisasahassehi vīsatiyā amaccehi ca saddhiṃ padumuttarassa sammāsambuddhassa santike mithilanagare pāturahosi.
atk-s0511a:2573_1: Padumuttaro ca bhagavā te sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā tehi parivuto gantvā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0511a:2573_2: Tattha so amhākaṃ bhagavā viya kapilapure gaganatale ratanacaṅkame caṅkamanto buddhavaṃsaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0511a:2580_0: Tattha ānandaṃ upasaṅkamīti pitaraṃ ānandarājānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2583_0: Desanākusalo buddho, tāresi janataṃ bahu”nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a:2585_0: Yadā pana satthā mithilanagare mithiluyyāne koṭisatasahassabhikkhugaṇamajjhe māghapuṇṇamāya puṇṇacandasadisavadano pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2589_0: Yadā pana bhagavā vebhārapabbatakūṭe vassāvāsaṃ vasitvā pabbatasandassanatthaṃ āgatassa mahājanassa dhammaṃ
atk-s0511a:2589_1: desetvā navutikoṭisahassāni ehibhikkhubhāvena pabbājetvā tehi parivuto pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2593_0: Puna bhagavati guṇavati tilokanāthe mahājanassa bandhanamokkhaṃ kurumāne janapadacārikaṃ caramāne asītikoṭisahassānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2598_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto anekadhanakoṭiko jaṭilo nāma mahāraṭṭhiko hutvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa sacīvaraṃ varadānamadāsi.
atk-s0511a:2598_1: Sopi taṃ bhattānumodanāvasāne “anāgate kappasatasahassamatthake gotamo nāma buddho bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a:2604_0: Satasahasse ito kappe, ayaṃ buddho bhavissati.
atk-s0511a:2610_2: Sabhattaṃ dussamadāsahanti sacīvaraṃ bhattaṃ adāsiṃ ahanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2611_0: Padumuttarassa pana bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāma nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2614_0: Na tesaṃ keci paricaranti, raṭṭhato nicchubhanti te.
atk-s0511a:2617_0: Tuvaṃ nātho mahāvīra, saraṇaṃ hohi cakkhuma.
atk-s0511a:2624_4: Tattha sassatādidiṭṭhivasena taranti etthāti titthaṃ, laddhi.
atk-s0511a:2624_7: Padumuttarassa kira bhagavato kāle titthiyā nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2624_9: tepi īdisā ahesunti dassanatthaṃ “byāhatā titthiyā”tiādi vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2624_12: Na tesaṃ keci paricarantīti tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ kecipi purisā parikammaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0511a:2624_22: ussādenti tesaṃ nivāsaṃ na dentīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2625_0: Upagañchuṃ buddhasantiketi evaṃ tehi raṭṭhavāsīhi manussehi ussādiyamānā sabbepi aññatitthiyā samāgantvā padumuttaradasabalameva saraṇamagamaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2625_1: “Tvaṃ amhākaṃ satthā nātho gati parāyanaṃ saraṇa”nti evaṃ vatvā saraṇamagamaṃsūti attho.
atk-s0511a:2625_5: Pañcasīle patiṭṭhahīti pañcasu sīlesu patiṭṭhāpesīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2625_9: Tanti taṃ bhagavato sāsananti vacanaseso daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:2626_0: Tassa pana padumuttarassa bhagavato haṃsavatī nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2626_3: devalo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2626_5: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2626_8: sarīrappabhā cassa samantā dvādasa yojanāni gaṇhi,
atk-s0511a:2626_12: Padumuttaro pana bhagavā paramābhirāme nandārāme kira parinibbuto.
atk-s0511a:2626_14: Sakalajambudīpavāsino manussā samāgamma dvādasayojanubbedhaṃ sattaratanamayaṃ cetiyamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2644_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2648_2: Dvādasayojaneti samantato dvādasayojane ṭhāne bhagavato sarīrappabhā pharitvā rattindivaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2649_0: Ito paṭṭhāya pāramipūraṇādipunappunāgatamatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā visesatthameva vatvā gamissāma.
atk-s0511a:2653_0: Padumuttare pana sammāsambuddhe parinibbute sāsanepissa antarahite sattatikappasahassāni buddhā nuppajjiṃsu,
atk-s0511a:2653_2: Ito paṭṭhāya tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ matthake ekasmiṃ kappe sumedho sujāto cāti dve sammāsambuddhā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2653_3: Tattha adhigatamedho sumedho nāma bodhisatto pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sudassananagare
atk-s0511a:2653_4: sudattassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā sudattāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2653_5: accayena sudassanuyyāne taruṇadivasakaro viya saliladharavivaragato mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2654_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sumanadeviyā punabbasumitte nāma putte jāte hatthiyānena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2654_2: So tehi parivuto aḍḍhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya nakulanigame nakulaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a:2654_3: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sirivaḍḍhājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo
atk-s0511a:2654_4: gahetvā nīpabodhimūle vīsatihatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā abhisambodhiṃ
atk-s0511a:2654_6: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā aṭṭhame sattāhe brahmuno
atk-s0511a:2654_7: dhammadesanāyācanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā bhabbapuggale olokento attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ saraṇakumārañca sabbakāmikumārañca
atk-s0511a:2654_8: attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnañca koṭisataṃ catusaccadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā
atk-s0511a:2654_9: sudassananagarasamīpe sudassanuyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena attano bhātike pakkosāpetvā tesaṃ parivārānaṃ
atk-s0511a:2667_2: dhovitvā majjitvā ṭhapitamaṇiguḷikā viya pasannāni nettāni honti.
atk-s0511a:2667_9: Ujūti brahmujugatto ujumeva uggatasarīro devanagare samussitasuvaṇṇatoraṇasadisavarasarīroti attho.
atk-s0511a:2668_0: Yadā pana bhagavā kumbhakaṇṇasadisānubhāvaṃ kumbhakaṇṇaṃ nāma manussabhakkhaṃ yakkhaṃ mahāaṭavimukhe
atk-s0511a:2668_1: sandissamānaghorasarīraṃ vattaniaṭavisañcāraṃ pacchinditvā pavattamānaṃ paccūsasamaye mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ
atk-s0511a:2668_2: samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya lokaṃ olokento disvā ekakova asahāyo tassa yakkhassa bhavanaṃ gantvā anto
atk-s0511a:2668_4: Atha kho so yakkho makkhaṃ asahamāno daṇḍāhato ghoraviso āsiviso viya saṃkuddho dasabalaṃ bhiṃsāpetukāmo
atk-s0511a:2668_5: attano attabhāvaṃ ghorataraṃ katvā pabbatasadisaṃ sīsaṃ katvā sūriyamaṇḍalasadisāni akkhīni nimminitvā
atk-s0511a:2668_7: pabbatabilasadisavipularattamukho thūlapiṅgalakharapharusakeso atibhayānakadassano hutvā āgantvā sumedhassa
atk-s0511a:2668_8: bhagavato purato ṭhatvā padhūpāyanto pajjalanto pāsāṇapabbataggijāla- salila- kaddama-
atk-s0511a:2668_10: vālukappakārā navavidhā vassavuṭṭhiyo vassetvāpi bhagavato lomaggamattampi cāletuṃ asakkonto “bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0511a:2668_11: pañhaṃ pucchitvā māressāmī”ti āḷavako viya pañhaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0511a:2668_12: Ayaṃ bhagavā pañhābyākaraṇena taṃ yakkhaṃ vinayamupanesi.
atk-s0511a:2668_13: Tato dutiyadivase kirassa raṭṭhavāsino manussā sakaṭabharitena bhattena saha rājakumāraṃ āharitvā yakkhassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2668_16: Tadā tasmiṃ samāgame dasabalo yakkhassa manonukūlaṃ dhammaṃ desento.
atk-s0511a:2672_0: Yadā pana upakārinagare sirinandanuyyāne cattāri saccāni pakāsayi,
atk-s0511a:2676_2: Puna devakūṭe pabbate kathinatthate dutiye navutikoṭiyo.
atk-s0511a:2676_3: Puna tatiye bhagavati cārikaṃ caramāne asītikoṭiyo ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2689_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto uttaro nāma sabbajanuttaro māṇavo hutvā nidahitvā ṭhapitaṃyeva asītikoṭidhanaṃ
atk-s0511a:2689_1: vissajjetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā tadā dasabalassa dhammaṃ sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0511a:2712_0: Tassa pana sumedhassa bhagavato sudassanaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2712_3: saraṇo ca sabbakāmo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2712_5: rāmā ca surāmā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2724_0: Obhāseti disā sabbā, cando tāragaṇe yathā.
atk-s0511a:2727_0: Tatheva tassa ratanaṃ, samantā pharati yojanaṃ.
atk-s0511a:2730_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2737_0: Tattha cando tāragaṇe yathāti yathā nāma gagane paripuṇṇacando tārāgaṇe obhāseti pakāseti,
atk-s0511a:2738_0: Cakkavattimaṇī nāmāti yathā nāma cakkavattirañño maṇiratanaṃ catuhatthāyāmaṃ sakaṭanābhisamapariṇāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2738_3: tassevaṃ āgacchantassa samantato yojanappamāṇaṃ okāsaṃ ābhā pharati,
atk-s0511a:2738_4: evameva tassa sumedhassāpi bhagavato sarīrato ābhāratanaṃ samantato yojanaṃ pharatīti attho.
atk-s0511a:2743_0: Tato tassāparabhāge tasmiṃyeva maṇḍakappe anupubbena aparimitāyukesu sattesu anukkamena parihāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu
atk-s0511a:2743_1: jātesu sujātarūpakāyo parisuddhajāto sujāto nāma satthā loke udapādi.
atk-s0511a:2743_2: Sopi pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sumaṅgalanagare uggatassa nāma rañño kule pabhāvatiyā
atk-s0511a:2743_3: nāma aggamahesiyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2743_4: Nāmaggahaṇadivase cassa nāmaṃ karonto sakalajambudīpe sabbasattānaṃ sukhaṃ janayanto jātoti “sujāto” tvevassa nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2743_6: Sirī upasirī sirinando cāti tassa tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2744_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā sirīnandādeviyā upasene nāma putte uppanne haṃsavahaṃ nāma varaturaṅgamāruyha mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2744_1: Taṃ pana pabbajantaṃ manussānaṃ koṭi anupabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2744_2: Atha so tehi parivuto nava māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sirīnandananagare sirīnandanaseṭṭhissa
atk-s0511a:2744_3: dhītāya dinnaṃ paramamadhuraṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye
atk-s0511a:2744_4: sunandājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā veḷubodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tettiṃsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_5: santharitvā sūriye dharamāneyeva samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ paṭivijjhitvā sabbabuddhānuciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_6: udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā brahmunā āyācito attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ sudassanakumāraṃ
atk-s0511a:2744_7: purohitaputtaṃ devakumārañca catusaccadhammapaṭivedhasamatthe disvā ākāsena gantvā sumaṅgalanagarasamīpe
atk-s0511a:2744_8: sumaṅgaluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālena attano bhātikaṃ sudassanakumāraṃ purohitaputtaṃ devakumārañca pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0511a:2744_9: tesaṃ saparivārānaṃ majjhe nisinno dhammacakkaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2745_0: Yadā pana bhagavā sudassanuyyānadvāre mahāsālamūle yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā devesu tāvatiṃsesu vassāvāsaṃ upāgami,
atk-s0511a:2745_3: Yadā pana sujāto dasabalo pitusantikaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0511a:2751_0: Evaṃ sobhati sambuddho, jalanto siriyā sadā.
atk-s0511a:2764_0: Tattha tattheva maṇḍakappamhīti yasmiṃ maṇḍakappe sumedho bhagavā uppanno,
atk-s0511a:2764_1: tattheva kappe sujātopi bhagavā uppannoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2764_2: Sīhahanūti sīhassa viya hanu assāti sīhahanu.
atk-s0511a:2764_5: Assa pana mahāpurisassa sīhassa heṭṭhimahanu viya dvepi paripuṇṇāni dvādasiyaṃ pakkhassa candasadisāni honti.
atk-s0511a:2765_0: Sudhammavatīnagare sudhammuyyāne āgatānaṃ manussānaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā saṭṭhisatasahassāni ehibhikkhubhāvena
atk-s0511a:2765_3: Tato paraṃ tidivorohaṇe bhagavato paññāsasatasahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2765_4: Puna “sudassanakumāro bhagavato santike pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto”ti sutvā “mayampi pabbajissāmā”ti
atk-s0511a:2765_5: āgatāni cattāri purisasatasahassāni gahetvā sudassanatthero sujātaṃ narāsabhaṃ upasaṅkami.
atk-s0511a:2765_6: Tesaṃ bhagavā dhammaṃ desetvā ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2779_0: Tadā kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto cakkavattirājā hutvā “buddho loke uppanno”ti sutvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a:2779_1: dhammakathaṃ sutvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa sattahi ratanehi saddhiṃ catumahādīparajjaṃ datvā
atk-s0511a:2779_3: Sakaladīpavāsino janā raṭṭhuppādaṃ gahetvā ārāmikakiccaṃ sādhetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa niccaṃ mahādānamadaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2803_0: Tattha catudīpamhīti saparivāradīpānaṃ catunnaṃ mahādīpānanti attho.
atk-s0511a:2803_4: Atha vā uttame buddheti attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0511a:2803_13: Tiṃsakappasahassamhīti ito paṭṭhāya tiṃsakappasahassānaṃ matthaketi attho.
atk-s0511a:2804_0: Tassa pana sujātassa bhagavato sumaṅgalaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2804_3: sudassano ca sudevo ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2804_5: nāgā ca nāgasamālā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2804_7: so kira mandacchiddo ghanakkhandho paramaramaṇīyo veḷuriyamaṇivaṇṇehi vimalehi pattehi sañchannavipulasākho mayūrapiñchakalāpo viya virocittha.
atk-s0511a:2804_8: Tassa pana bhagavato sarīraṃ paṇṇāsahatthubbedhaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0511a:2815_0: “So ca rukkho ghanakkhandho, acchiddo hoti pattiko;
atk-s0511a:2816_0: Uju vaṃso brahā hoti, dassanīyo manoramo.
atk-s0511a:2819_0: Yathā subaddho morahattho, evaṃ sobhati so dumo.
atk-s0511a:2821_0: “Na tassa kaṇṭakā honti, nāpi chiddaṃ mahā ahu;
atk-s0511a:2831_0: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṃ bahuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2836_0: “So ca buddho asamasamo, guṇāni ca tāni atuliyāni;
atk-s0511a:2838_8: Ekakkhandhoti avaniruho eko adutiyo cāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2838_10: Tato sākhā pabhijjatīti tato vaṃsaggato pañcavidhā sākhā nikkhamitvā pabhijjittha.
atk-s0511a:2838_13: Morahatthoti ātapasannivāraṇatthaṃ kato baddho morapiñchakalāpo vuccati.
atk-s0511a:2839_0: Na tassa kaṇṭakā hontīti tassa vaṃsassa kaṇṭakinopi rukkhassa kaṇṭakā nāhesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2839_5: Sabbākāravarūpetoti sabbena ākārena varehiyeva upeto sabbākāravarūpeto nāma.
atk-s0511a:2840_6: “iminā ca iminā ca sadiso”ti vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato anūpamoti attho.
atk-s0511a:2840_7: Guṇāni ca tānīti guṇā ca te,
atk-s0511a:2844_0: Sujātassa pana aparabhāge ito aṭṭhakappasatādhikasahassakappamatthake ekasmiṃ kappe piyadassī,
atk-s0511a:2844_3: Tattha piyadassī nāma bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā sudhaññavatīnagare
atk-s0511a:2844_4: sudattassa nāma rañño aggamahesiyā candasadisavadanāya candādeviyā nāma kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0511a:2844_5: dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena varuṇuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:2844_6: Tassa pana nāmaggahaṇadivase lokassa piyānaṃ pāṭihāriyavisesānaṃ dassitattā “piyadassī”tveva nāmamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2844_8: Tassa kira sunimmalavimalagiribrahānāmakā tayo pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2845_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā vimalādeviyā kañcanaveḷe nāma putte uppanne ājaññarathena mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:2845_2: So tehi parivuto mahāpuriso cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya varuṇabrāhmaṇagāme vasabhabrāhmaṇassa
atk-s0511a:2845_3: dhītāya dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sujātājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a:2845_4: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā kakudhabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā tepaññāsahatthavitthataṃ tiṇasantharaṃ santharitvā pallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0511a:2845_5: ābhujitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhitvā “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā tattheva sattasattāhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2845_6: vītināmetvā attanā saha pabbajitānaṃ ariyadhammapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ ñatvā ākāsena tattha gantvā usabhavatīnagarasamīpe
atk-s0511a:2846_0: Puna usabhavatiyā nāma nagarassa avidūre sudassanapabbate sudassano nāma devarājā paṭivasati.
atk-s0511a:2846_2: Sakalajambudīpe pana manussā tassa anusaṃvaccharaṃ satasahassagghanikaṃ baliṃ upasaṃharanti.
atk-s0511a:2846_3: So sudassano devarājā nararājena saddhiṃ ekāsane nisīditvā baliṃ sampaṭicchati.
atk-s0511a:2846_4: Atha piyadassī bhagavā “tassa sudassanassa devarājassa taṃ diṭṭhigataṃ vinodessāmī”ti tasmiṃ devarāje
atk-s0511a:2846_5: yakkhasamāgamaṃ gate tassa bhavanaṃ pavisitvā sirisayanaṃ āruhitvā chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo muñcanto yugandharapabbate
atk-s0511a:2846_7: Tassa parivāraparicārikā devatāyo mālāgandhavilepanādīhi dasabalaṃ pūjetvā parivāretvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2847_0: Sudassanopi devarājā yakkhasamāgamato āgacchanto attano bhavanato chabbaṇṇarasmiyo niccharante disvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a:2847_1: “aññesu pana divasesu mama bhavanassa edisī anekaraṃsijālasamujjalavibhūti na diṭṭhapubbā.
atk-s0511a:2847_2: Ko nu kho idha paviṭṭho devo vā manusso vā”ti olokento udayagirisikharamatthake saradasamayadivasakaramiva
atk-s0511a:2847_3: chabbaṇṇaraṃsijālena abhijjalantaṃ nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0511a:2847_4: “ayaṃ muṇḍakasamaṇo mama parivārena parijanena parivuto varasayane nisinno”ti kodhābhibhūtamānaso –
atk-s0511a:2847_5: “handāhaṃ imassa attano balaṃ dassessāmī”ti cintetvā sakalaṃ taṃ pabbataṃ ekajālamakāsi.
atk-s0511a:2847_6: “Iminā aggijālena chārikābhūto muṇḍakasamaṇo”ti olokento anekaraṃsijālavisaravipphuritavarasarīraṃ pasannavadanavaṇṇasobhaṃ
atk-s0511a:2847_9: handāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ udakoghena osādetvā māressāmī”ti atigambhīraṃ udakoghaṃ vimānābhimukhaṃ pavattesi.
atk-s0511a:2848_0: Tato udakoghena puṇṇe tasmiṃ vimāne nisinnassa tassa bhagavato cīvare aṃsumattaṃ vā sarīre lomamattaṃ vā na temittha.
atk-s0511a:2848_2: “iminā samaṇo nirassāso mato bhavissatī”ti mantvā udakaṃ saṅkhipitvā olokento bhagavantaṃ asitajaladharavivaragataṃ
atk-s0511a:2848_3: saradasamayarajanikaramiva vividharaṃsijālavisarena virocamānaṃ sakaparisaparivutaṃ nisinnaṃ disvā attano
atk-s0511a:2848_6: Athassa bhagavato ānubhāvena sabbāvudhāni nānāvidhaparamaruciradassanā surabhikusumamālā hutvā dasabalassa pādamūle nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2849_0: Tato taṃ acchariyaṃ disvā sudassano devarājā paramakupitamānaso bhagavantaṃ ubhohi hatthehi pādesu gahetvā
atk-s0511a:2849_1: attano bhavanato nīharitukāmo ukkhipitvā mahāsamuddaṃ atikkamitvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ gantvā –
atk-s0511a:2849_2: “kiṃ nu kho samaṇo jīvati vā mato vā”ti olokento tasmiṃyeva āsane nisinnaṃ disvā –
atk-s0511a:2849_4: nāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ ito nikkaḍḍhituṃ sakkomi.
atk-s0511a:2850_0: Atha dasabalo tassa cittācāraṃ ñatvā tathā adhiṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0511a:2850_2: Tasmiñca divase sakalajambudīpe ekasatarājāno tasseva upahāradānatthāya sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2850_3: Te bhagavato pāde gahetvā nisinnaṃ sudassanaṃ devarājānaṃ nararājāno disvā –
atk-s0511a:2850_4: “amhākaṃ devarājā munirājassa piyadassissa satthuno pādaparicariyaṃ karoti,
atk-s0511a:2850_7: pasannacittā sabbe bhagavantaṃ namassamānā sirasmiṃ añjaliṃ katvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2850_8: Tattha piyadassī bhagavā taṃ sudassanaṃ devarājānaṃ pamukhaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a:2851_0: Yadā pana navayojanappamāṇe kumudanagare buddhapaccatthiko devadatto viya soṇatthero nāma mahāpadumakumārena
atk-s0511a:2851_1: saddhiṃ mantetvā tassa pitaraṃ ghātetvā puna piyadassībuddhassa vadhāya nānappakāraṃ payogaṃ katvāpi
atk-s0511a:2851_2: ghātetuṃ asakkonto so doṇamukhanāgarājārohaṃ pakkosāpetvā taṃ palobhetvā tamatthaṃ ārocesi –
atk-s0511a:2851_3: “yadā panāyaṃ samaṇo piyadassī imaṃ nagaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
atk-s0511a:2851_4: tadā doṇamukhaṃ nāma gajavaraṃ vissajjetvā piyadassīsamaṇaṃ mārehī”ti.
atk-s0511a:2852_1: “ayaṃ samaṇo ṭhānantarāpi maṃ cāveyyā”ti mantvā “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dutiyadivase dasabalassa nagarappavesanasamayaṃ
atk-s0511a:2852_3: sundarakkhandhāsanaṃ anuvaṭṭaghanajaghanaṃ nicitagūḷhajāṇuantaraṃ īsāsadisaruciradantaṃ suvāladhiṃ apacitamecakaṃ
atk-s0511a:2852_5: sattappatiṭṭhaṃ sattadhā pabhinnaṃ sabbaso vissavantaṃ viggahavantamiva antakaṃ upasaṅkamitvā piṇḍakabaḷañjanadhūpalepādivisesehi
atk-s0511a:2852_6: bhiyyopi mattappamattaṃ katvā arivāraṇavāraṇaṃ erāvaṇavāraṇamiva arijanavāraṇaṃ munivāraṇaṃ māraṇatthāya pesesi.
atk-s0511a:2852_7: Atha so dviradavaro muttamattova gajamahiṃsaturaṅganaranāriyo hantvā hatarudhiraparirañjitasadantakarasarīro
atk-s0511a:2852_9: gijjhādīhi anupariyāyamāno hatamahiṃsanaraturaṅgadiradādīnaṃ aṅgāni ālumpitvā manussabhakkho yakkho viya
atk-s0511a:2852_10: bhakkhayanto dūratova dasabalaṃ sissagaṇaparivutaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvā anilagaruḷasadisavego vegena bhagavantamabhigañchi.
atk-s0511a:2853_0: Atha puravāsino pana janā bhayasantāpaparipūritamānasā pāsādapākāracayatarūpagatā tathāgatābhimukhamabhidhāvantaṃ disvā hāhākārasaddamakaṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2853_1: Keci pana upāsakā taṃ nānappakārehi nayehi nivārayitumārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2853_2: Atha so buddhanāgo hatthināgamāyantamoloketvā karuṇāvipphārasītalahadayo mettāya taṃ phari.
atk-s0511a:2853_3: Tato so hatthināgo mettāpharaṇena mudukatahadayasantāno attano dosāparādhaṃ ñatvā lajjāya bhagavato purato
atk-s0511a:2853_4: ṭhātuṃ asakkonto pathaviyaṃ pavisanto viya sirasā bhagavato pādesu nipati.
atk-s0511a:2853_5: Evaṃ nipanno pana so timiranikarasadisasarīro sañchāppabhānurañjitavarakanakagirisikharasamīpamupagato asitasaliladharanikaro viya virocittha.
atk-s0511a:2854_0: Athevaṃ munirājapādamūle karirājānaṃ sirasā nipatantaṃ disvā nāgarajanā paramapītipūritahadayā sādhukārasīhanādaṃ ukkuṭṭhisaddaṃ pavattayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2854_4: Atha bhagavā tamasitagirisikharamiva pādamūle nipannaṃ diradavaraṃ oloketvā aṅkusadhajajālasaṅkhacakkālaṅkatena
atk-s0511a:2854_5: karatalena gajavaramatthakaṃ parāmasitvā tassa cittācārānukūlāya dhammadesanāya taṃ anusāsi –
atk-s0511a:2855_0: “Gajavara vadato suṇohi vācaṃ, mama hitamatthayutañca taṃ bhajāhi;
atk-s0511a:2856_0: Tava vadhanirataṃ paduṭṭhabhāvaṃ, apanaya santamupehi cārudanti.
atk-s0511a:2857_0: “Lobhena dosena ca mohato vā, yo pāṇino hiṃsati vāraṇinda;
atk-s0511a:2858_0: So pāṇaghātī sucirampi kālaṃ, dukkhaṃ sughoraṃ narakenubhoti.
atk-s0511a:2859_0: “Mākāsi mātaṅga punevarūpaṃ, kammaṃ pamādena madena vāpi;
atk-s0511a:2860_0: Avīciyaṃ dukkhamasayha kappaṃ, pappoti pāṇaṃ atipātayanto.
atk-s0511a:2861_0: “Dukkhaṃ sughoraṃ narakenubhotvā, manussalokaṃ yadi yāti bhiyyo;
atk-s0511a:2863_0: “Yathā ca pāṇā paramaṃ piyā te, mahājane kuñjara mandanāga;
atk-s0511a:2864_0: Tathā parassāpi piyāti ñatvā, pāṇātipāto parivajjanīyo.
atk-s0511a:2865_0: “Dose ca hiṃsānirate viditvā, pāṇātipātā virate guṇe ca;
atk-s0511a:2866_0: Pāṇātipātaṃ parivajjaya tvaṃ, sagge sukhaṃ icchasi ce parattha.
atk-s0511a:2867_0: “Pāṇātipātā virato sudanto, piyo manāpo bhavatīdha loke;
atk-s0511a:2868_0: Kāyassa bhedā ca paraṃ panassa, saggādhivāsaṃ kathayanti buddhā.
atk-s0511a:2869_0: “Dukkhāgamaṃ nicchati koci loke, sabbopi jāto sukhamesateva;
atk-s0511a:2870_0: Tasmā mahānāga vihāya hiṃsaṃ, bhāvehi mettaṃ karuṇañca kāle”ti.
atk-s0511a:2871_0: Athevaṃ dasabalenānusāsiyamāno dantivaro saññaṃ paṭilabhitvā paramavinīto vinayācārasampanno sisso viya ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2871_1: Evaṃ so piyadassī bhagavā amhākaṃ satthā viya dhanapālaṃ doṇamukhaṃ karivaraṃ damitvā tattha mahājanasamāgame dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0511a:2890_0: Sumaṅgalanagare pālito nāma rājaputto ca purohitaputto sabbadassikumāro cāti dve sahāyakā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2890_1: Te piyadassimhi sammāsambuddhe cārikaṃ carante “attano nagaraṃ sampatto”ti sutvā koṭisatasahassaparivārā
atk-s0511a:2890_2: paccuggamanaṃ katvā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase bhagavato bhattānumodanāvasāne
atk-s0511a:2890_4: Tesaṃ pana majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:2890_6: Athāparena samayena sudassanadevarājassa samāgame navutikoṭiyo arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2890_9: Puna doṇamukhavinayane asītikoṭiyo pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:2897_0: Tadā amhākaṃ bodhisatto kassapo nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo itihāsapañcamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū hutvā satthu
atk-s0511a:2897_1: dhammadesanaṃ sutvā koṭisatasahassapariccāgena paramārāmaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ kāretvā saraṇesu ca pañcasīlesu
atk-s0511a:2897_4: “ito aṭṭhārasakappasataccayena gotamo nāma buddho loke bhavissatī”ti byākāsi.
atk-s0511a:2906_0: Saraṇe pañcasīle ca, daḷahaṃ katvā samādiyiṃ.
atk-s0511a:2915_0: Tattha saraṇe pañcasīle cāti tīṇi saraṇāni pañca sīlāni cāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2915_1: Aṭṭhārase kappasateti ito aṭṭhasatādhikassa kappasahassassa accayenāti attho.
atk-s0511a:2916_0: Tassa pana bhagavato sudhaññaṃ nāma nagaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:2916_3: pālito ca sabbadassī ca dve aggasāvakā,
atk-s0511a:2916_5: sujātā ca dhammadinnā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0511a:2931_0: Yathā ahu pabhā tassa, asamassa mahesino.
atk-s0511a:2938_0: Tattha sālarājā vāti sabbaphāliphullo paramaramaṇīyadassano samavaṭṭakkhandho sālarājā viya dissati.
atk-s0511a:2942_0: Piyadassimhi sammāsambuddhe parinibbute tassa sāsane ca antarahite parihāyitvā vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukesu
atk-s0511a:2942_1: manussesu anukkamena parihāyitvā vassasatasahassāyukesu jātesu paramatthadassī atthadassī nāma buddho
atk-s0511a:2942_3: So pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā paramasobhane sobhane nāma nagare sāgarassa nāma
atk-s0511a:2942_4: rañño kule aggamahesiyā sudassanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasa māse gabbhe vasitvā sucindhanuyyāne
atk-s0511a:2942_6: Mātukucchito mahāpurise nikkhantamatte sucirakālanihitāni kulaparamparāgatāni mahānidhānāni dhanasāmikā
atk-s0511a:2942_10: girivāhananāmakā paramasurabhijanakā tayo cassa pāsādā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:2943_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā visākhādeviyā selakumāre nāma putte uppanne sudassanaṃ nāma assarājaṃ abhiruhitvā mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.

atk-s0511a:3224_3: Yathā yojanānaṃ satānucco himavā pañcapabbato sudūre ṭhitānampi uccabhāvena ca sommabhāvena ca atiramaṇīyo hutvā dissati,
atk-s0511a:3224_8: Ussavoti himabindu valāhakaussavaandhakārā viya anilasūriyadīpehi aniccatānilasūriyadīpehi upadduto parinibbuto sasāvako bhagavāti attho.

atk-s0511a:3229_0: Tassa tissassa bhagavato aparabhāge anukkamena parihāyitvā puna vaḍḍhitvā aparimitāyukā hutvā anupubbena
atk-s0511a:3229_1: hāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu jātesu tasmiṃyeva kappe phusso nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0511a:3229_2: Sopi bhagavā pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā kāsikanagare jayasenarañño aggamahesiyā
atk-s0511a:3229_3: sirimāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā dasannaṃ māsānaṃ accayena sirimuyyāne mātukucchito nikkhami.
atk-s0511a:3230_0: So cattāri nimittāni disvā kisāgotamiyā anupame nāma putte uppanne alaṅkatagajavarakkhandhagato mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:3230_2: So tehi parivuto cha māse padhānacariyaṃ caritvā tato gaṇaṃ pahāya sattāhaṃ ekacariyaṃ anubrūhayamāno
atk-s0511a:3230_3: vasitvā visākhapuṇṇamāya aññatare nagare aññatarassa seṭṭhino dhītāya sirivaḍḍhāya nāma dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ
atk-s0511a:3230_4: paribhuñjitvā siṃsapāvane divāvihāraṃ vītināmetvā sāyanhasamaye sirivaḍḍhena nāma upāsakena dinnā aṭṭha
atk-s0511a:3230_5: tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā āmalakabodhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā samāraṃ mārabalaṃ vidhamitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ patvā –
atk-s0511a:3230_7: taṇhānaṃ khayamajjhagā”ti udānaṃ udānetvā sattasattāhaṃ bodhisamīpeyeva vītināmetvā attanā saddhiṃ pabbajitānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3230_8: bhikkhūnaṃ koṭīnaṃ dhammapaṭivedhasamatthataṃ disvā ākāsena gantvā saṅkassanagare isipatane migadāye
atk-s0511a:3240_0: Tattha tattheva maṇḍakappamhīti yasmiṃ kappe dve buddhā uppajjanti,
atk-s0511a:3240_4: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanato suttagumbajālapūvasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭāti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0511a:3240_8: Amatambunāti amatasaṅkhātena dhammakathāsalilena tappayanto pāvassīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3241_0: Yadā pana bārāṇasīnagare sirivaḍḍho nāma rājā mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya tāpasapabbajjaṃ pabbaji.
atk-s0511a:3241_1: Tena saha pabbajitānaṃ tāpasānaṃ navutisatasahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3241_4: Yadā pana attano puttassa anupamakumārassa dhammaṃ desesi,

atk-s0511a:3245_0: Tato aparena samayena kaṇṇakujjanagare surakkhito rājaputto ca purohitaputto dhammasenakumāro ca phusse
atk-s0511a:3245_1: sammāsambuddhe attano nagaraṃ sampatte saṭṭhiyā purisasatasahassehi saddhiṃ paccuggantvā vanditvā nimantetvā
atk-s0511a:3245_2: sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā dasabalassa dhammakathaṃ sutvā bhagavati pasīditvā te saparivārā pabbajitvā
atk-s0511a:3245_4: Tesaṃ saṭṭhiyā bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ majjhe bhagavā pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
atk-s0511a:3245_6: Puna kāsinagare jayasenarañño saṭṭhimattānaṃ ñātīnaṃ samāgame buddhavaṃsaṃ desesi,

atk-s0511a:3245_10: Puna mahāmaṅgalasamāgame maṅgalakathaṃ sutvā cattālīsapurisasatasahassāni pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.

atk-s0511a:3289_8: So aṭṭhavassasahassāni agāraṃ ajjhāvasi. Nanda- sunanda-
atk-s0511a:3290_0: Sudassanādevippamukhānaṃ itthīnaṃ satasahassaṃ vīsati ca sahassāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0511a:3290_2: So aṭṭhavassasahassānaṃ accayena cattāri nimittāni disvā sutanudeviyā samavaṭṭakkhandhe nāma tanaye jāte
atk-s0511a:3290_5: So tehi parivuto mahāpuriso aṭṭhamāsaṃ padhānacariyaṃ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya sudassanaseṭṭhidhītāya
atk-s0511a:3290_6: dinnaṃ madhupāyāsaṃ paribhuñjitvā kusumasamalaṅkate sālavane divāvihāraṃ katvā sujātena nāma yavapālakena
atk-s0511a:3290_7: dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā pāṭalibodhiṃ samalaṅkataṃ disvā dakkhiṇadisābhāgena taṃ upāgami.
atk-s0511a:3291_0: Tassā pana pāṭaliyā samavaṭṭakkhandho taṃ divasaṃ paṇṇāsaratano hutvā abbhuggato sākhā paṇṇāsaratanā ubbedhena ratanasataṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3291_1: Taṃdivasameva sā pāṭalī kaṇṇikābaddhehi viya pupphehi paramasurabhigandhehi mūlato paṭṭhāya sabbasañchannā ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3291_7: Mahāsamuddopi pañcavaṇṇehi padumehi kuvalayuppalakumudehi sañchanno sītalamadhurasalilo ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3291_8: Sabbampi ca dasasahassi cakkavāḷabbhantaraṃ dhajamālākulaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3291_9: Tattha tattha paṭimālāgulavippakiṇṇaṃ nānāsurabhikusumasajjitadharaṇītalaṃ dhūpacuṇṇandhakāraṃ ahosi.

atk-s0511a:3300_0: Vipassī nāma nāmena, loke uppajji cakkhumā.
atk-s0511a:3307_4: Ubho bodhesīti attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṃ khaṇḍaṃ rājaputtaṃ tissañca purohitaputtanti ubho bodhesi.
atk-s0511a:3307_5: Gaṇanāya na vattabboti devatānaṃ abhisamayavasena gaṇanaparicchedo natthīti attho.
atk-s0511a:3308_0: Athāparena samayena khaṇḍaṃ rājaputtaṃ tissañca purohitaputtaṃ anupabbajitāni caturāsītibhikkhusahassāni dhammāmataṃ pāyesi.
atk-s0511a:3312_2: sambuddhamanupabbaju”nti ettha ete pana caturāsītisahassasaṅkhātā purisā vipassissa kumārassa upaṭṭhākapurisāyeva.
atk-s0511a:3312_3: Te pātova vipassikumārassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā kumāramadisvā pātarāsatthāya gantvā bhuttapātarāsā “kuhiṃ
atk-s0511a:3312_4: kumāro”ti pucchitvā tato “uyyānabhūmiṃ gato”ti sutvā “tattheva naṃ dakkhissāmā”ti nikkhantā nivattamānaṃ
atk-s0511a:3312_5: tassa sārathiṃ disvā “kumāro pabbajito”ti sutvā sutaṭṭhāneyeva sabbābharaṇāni muñcitvā antarāpaṇato kāsāyāni
atk-s0511a:3312_7: Pabbajitvā ca te gantvā mahāpurisaṃ parivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3313_0: Tato vipassī bodhisatto “padhānacariyaṃ caranto ākiṇṇo viharāmi,
atk-s0511a:3313_1: na kho panametaṃ pātirūpaṃ yatheva maṃ ime gihibhūtā pubbe parivāretvā caranti,
atk-s0511a:3313_2: idānipi tatheva kiṃ iminā gaṇenā”ti gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ukkaṇṭhitvā “ajjeva gacchāmī”ti cintetvā puna –
atk-s0511a:3313_7: Taṃdivasañca uruvelagāmasadise ekasmiṃ gāme gāmavāsino manussā svātanāya saddhiṃ parisāya mahāpurisaṃ nimantayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3313_8: Te tesaṃ caturāsītisahassānaṃ mahāpurisassa ca pāyāsameva paṭiyādayiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3313_9: Atha vipassī mahāpuriso punadivase visākhapuṇṇamāya tasmiṃ gāme tehi pabbajitajanehi saddhiṃ bhattakiccaṃ katvā vasanaṭṭhānameva agamāsi.
atk-s0511a:3313_10: Tatra te pabbajitā mahāpurisassa vattaṃ dassetvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3314_1: “ayaṃ kālo nikkhamitu”nti nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāraṃ pidahitvā bodhimaṇḍābhimukho pāyāsi.
atk-s0511a:3314_2: Te kira pabbajitā sāyaṃ bodhisattassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā paṇṇasālaṃ parivāretvā nisinnā –
atk-s0511a:3314_3: “ativikālo jāto upadhārethā”ti vatvā paṇṇasāladvāraṃ vivaritvā taṃ apassantāpi “kuhiṃ nu gato mahāpuriso”ti nānubandhiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3314_4: “Gaṇavāse nibbinno eko viharitukāmo maññe mahāpuriso buddhabhūtaṃyeva taṃ passissāmā”ti antojambudīpābhimukhā cārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu. Atha te –
atk-s0511a:3314_5: “vipassinā kira buddhattaṃ patvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattita”nti sutvā anukkamena sabbe te pabbajitā bandhumatiyā rājadhāniyā kheme migadāye sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3321_1: sambuddhaṃ anupabbajunti ettha anunā yogato sambuddhanti upayogavacanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0511a:3321_6: Upanisādinoti gantvā upanissāya dhammadānaṃ dadatoti attho.
atk-s0511a:3321_7: Tepīti te caturāsītisahassasaṅkhātā pabbajitā vipassissa upaṭṭhākabhūtā.
atk-s0511a:3321_10: Kheme migadāye vipassīsammāsambuddhaṃ dve ca aggasāvake anupabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ aṭṭhasaṭṭhisatasahassānaṃ majjhe nisinno vipassī bhagavā –
atk-s0511a:3322_0: “Khantīparamaṃ tapo titikkhā, nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā;
atk-s0511a:3323_0: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātī, na samaṇo hoti paraṃ viheṭhayanto.
atk-s0511a:3328_0: Adhicitte ca āyogo, etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti. –
atk-s0511a:3329_1: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthāyo hontīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0511a:3329_3: Puna yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ disvā pabbajitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satasahassānaṃ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi.
atk-s0511a:3329_4: Yadā pana vipassissa vemātikā tayo bhātaro paccantaṃ vūpasametvā bhagavato upaṭṭhānakiriyāya laddhavarā
atk-s0511a:3329_5: hutvā attano nagaraṃ netvā upaṭṭhahantā tassa dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0511a:3329_6: Tesaṃ asītisatasahassānaṃ majjhe nisīditvā bhagavā kheme migadāye pātimokkhaṃ uddisi,
